description:
Genetically modified transhuman warriors, Space Marines are amongst Humanity's most elite fighting forces.
Ángeles de la Muerte kill teams are composed of elite specialists trained in myriad forms of combat, who are capable of overcoming almost any foe.
composition:
An Ángeles de la Muerte KillTeam is composed of:
 
- 1 ANGEL OF DEATH operativo selected from the following list:
  - ASSAULT INTERCESSOR SERGEANT with one option from each of the following:
    - Hand flamer or heavy bolt pistol
    - Chainsword, power fist, power weapon or thunder hammer  
    - Or the following option:
      - Plasma pistol; chainsword
  - INTERCESSOR SERGEANT with one option  from each of the following:
    - Auto bolt rifle, bolt rifle or stalker bolt rifle
    - Chainsword, fists, power fist, power weapon or thunder hammer
  - Marine Espacial CAPTAIN
- 5 ANGEL OF DEATH operativos selected from the following list:
  - ASSAULT INTERCESSOR GRENADIER
  - ASSAULT INTERCESSOR WARRIOR
  - ELIMINATOR SNIPER*
  - HEAVY INTERCESSOR GUNNER*
  - INTERCESSOR GUNNER with auxiliary grenade launcher and one of the following options:
    - Auto bolt rifle; fists
    - Bolt rifle; fists
    - Stalker bolt rifle; fists    
  - INTERCESSOR WARRIOR with one of the following options:
    - Auto bolt rifle; fists
    - Bolt rifle; fists
    - Stalker bolt rifle; fists

Other than WARRIOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  
*You cannot select more than one of these operativos combined.

Some ANGEL OF DEATH rules refer to a 'bolt weapon'. This is a ranged weapon that includes 'bolt' in its name, e.g. stalker bolt rifle, heavy bolt pistol, etc.

---

**Chapter Tactics:**  
When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.

opTypes.keywords: ANGEL OF DEATH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, LEADER, SPACE MARINE CAPTAIN

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it's two Disparar actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Once per punto de inflexión, you can do one of the following:
- Use a firefight ploy for 0CP if this is the specified ANGEL OF DEATH operativo (excluding Command Re-roll).
- Use the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy when you activate a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo if this operativo is in the zona de combate and isn't dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos (pay its CP cost as normal). Note that you cannot do so if you've already used that ploy during this punto de inflexión.
- Use the Adjust Doctrine firefight ploy for 0CP if this operativo is in the zona de combate and not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.
Once per battle, when an attack die inflicts Normal Damage on this operativo, you can ignore that inflicted damage.

options.description:
*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
This operativo's melee weapons have the Rending weapon rule.

**Rending:** If you retain any critical hits, retain 1 normal hit as a critical hit instead.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
   
Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating, each of your éxitos normales can block one unresolved éxito crítico (unless the operativo enemigo's weapon has the Brutal weapon rule).

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, dados de defensa results of 5+ are éxitos críticos. Whenever this operativo is retaliating, the first time an dados de ataque inflicts Normal Dmg of 3 or more on this operativo during that sequence, that dice inflicts 1 less damage on it.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  

- This operativo can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.
- This operativo can perform the Carga action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, and can leave that operativo's alcance de control to do so (but then normal requirements for that move apply).

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
You can ignore any changes to this operativo's APL stat and it isn't affected by operativos enemigos' Shock weapon rule.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever this operativo is shooting during an activación in which it has not performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action, its bolt weapons have the Accurate 1 and Severe weapon rules.

**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
This operativo's ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule.

**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain salvaciones de cobertura.

Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating, operativos enemigos cannot assist.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico.
This is not cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

opTypes.keywords: ANGEL OF DEATH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, LEADER, ASSAULT INTERCESSOR, SERGEANT

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it's two Disparar actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

At the end of the Select operativos step, if this operativo is selected for deployment, select one additional CHAPTER TACTIC for it to have for the battle.
Unlike primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTICS, you don't have to select the same one for each battle in a campaign or tournament.

You can do each of the following once per battle:

- Whenever you would use the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy and then select Assault, if this operativo is in the zona de combate, it costs you 0CP.
- Whenever you would use the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy and then select Tactical, if this operativo is in the zona de combate, it costs you 0CP.

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it's two Disparar actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
This operativo has the Stealthy CHAPTER TACTIC. If you selected that CHAPTER TACTIC, you can do both of its options (i.e. retain two salvaciones de cobertura - one normal and one éxito crítico).

Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico.
This is not cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

Until the start of this operativo's next activación, whenever it is shooting, operativos enemigos cannot be obscured.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

This operativo can use frag and krak grenades (see universal equipment).
Doing so does not count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other operativos).
Whenever it is doing so, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, dados de defensa results of 5+ are éxitos críticos. Whenever this operativo is retaliating, the first time an dados de ataque inflicts Normal Dmg of 3 or more on this operativo during that sequence, that dice inflicts 1 less damage on it.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  

- This operativo can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.
- This operativo can perform the Carga action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, and can leave that operativo's alcance de control to do so (but then normal requirements for that move apply).

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
You can ignore any changes to this operativo's APL stat and it isn't affected by operativos enemigos' Shock weapon rule.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever this operativo is shooting during an activación in which it has not performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action, its bolt weapons have the Accurate 1 and Severe weapon rules.

**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
This operativo's ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule.

**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain salvaciones de cobertura.

Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating, operativos enemigos cannot assist.

*When selecting your kill team, select a primary and secondary CHAPTER TACTIC for friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos to gain for the battle. Multiple instances of the same CHAPTER TACTIC are not cumulative.*  
  
Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico.
This is not cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

opTypes.keywords: ANGEL OF DEATH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, INTERCESSOR, GUNNER

abilities.description:
During each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it's two Disparar actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them, and if it's a bolt sniper rifle or heavy bolter, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action if both actions are using that weapon.  

Each friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

ploys.description: Change your secondary CHAPTER TACTIC. Note this ploy only lasts until the end of the punto de inflexión, at which point your original secondary CHAPTER TACTIC returns.

ploys.ployName: And They Shall Know No Fear
ploys.description: You can ignore any changes to the stats of friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativos from being injured.

Select one COMBAT DOCTRINE from those presented below. Whenever a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo is x, its weapons have the Balanced weapon rule. X is the COMBAT DOCTRINE you selected.  


- **Devastator Doctrine:** Shooting Un operativo more than 6" from it.
- **Tactical Doctrine:** Shooting Un operativo within 6" of it.
- **Assault Doctrine:** Fighting or retaliating.

**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a éxito normal instead.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action. If you have used the Combat Doctrine strategy ploy during this punto de inflexión, change the COMBAT DOCTRINE you selected.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo is performing the Combatir action during an activación in which it has performed the Carga action, at the start of the Resolve dados de ataque step.
Until the end of that action:

- Its melee weapon has the Shock weapon rule.
- The first time you strike during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage (to a maximum of 7).
  
**Shock:** The first time you strike with a éxito crítico in each sequence, also discard one of your opponent's unresolved éxitos normales (or a éxito crítico if there are none).

Use this firefight ploy when Un operativo is shooting a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo, in the Roll dados de defensa step.
You can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo is counteracting. It can perform an additional 1AP action for free during that contrataque, but both actions must be different.

equipments.description: You can use the Wrath of Vengeance firefight ploy for 0CP if the specified operativo amigo has an Engage order.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a éxito normal instead.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo is fighting or retaliating, after your opponent rolls their dados de ataque, you can use this rule.
If you do, your opponent cannot retain dados de ataque results of less than 6 as éxitos críticos during that sequence (e.g. as a result of the Lethal, Rending or Severe weapon rules).

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly ANGEL OF DEATH operativo performs the Disparar action and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of the activación (or contrataque), operativos enemigos within 8" of it cannot be obscured.

description:
*"Let nothing dissuade your quest for knowledge. Let none slow your pursuit and acquisition of holy technology. Let none stand between you and the procurement of that which is rightfully the machine god's due."*  
- Thusdorius Knoch, Invictus Acquisitor
composition:
A BATTLECLADE KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 BATTLECLADE TECHNOARCHEOLOGIST
- 1 BATTLECLADE SERVITOR UNDERSEER
- 8 BATTLECLADE operativos selected from the following list:
  - AUTO-PROXY SERVITOR
  - BREACHER SERVITOR
  - COMBAT SERVITOR with one of the following options:
    - Servo-claw; incendine igniter
    - Servo-claw; meltagun
    - Servo-claw; phosphor blaster
  - GUN SERVITOR with heavy arc rifle and augmetic claw
  - GUN SERVITOR with heavy bolter and augmetic claw
  - TECHNOMEDIC SERVITOR

Other than COMBAT SERVITOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.
Your kill team can only include up to one COMBAT SERVITOR operativo with meltagun, and it can only include up to three COMBAT SERVITOR operativos with incendine igniter.

opTypes.keywords: BATTLECLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, TECH-PRIEST, LEADER, TECHNOARCHEOLOGIST

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo is activated, you can TRANSFER POWER.
If you do, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of that activación.  

After that activación, you can NETWORK Contraatacar with one other friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo before your opponent activates. Whenever you NETWORK Contraatacar with a operativo amigo, first select its order.
It can then perform a 1AP action for free, but cannot move. Once it's done so, your opponent then activates as normal.  

Un operativo cannot TRANSFER POWER or NETWORK Contraatacar if it has an APL stat of less than 2 (e.g. if the stat has been changed to less than 2 by a rule).
NETWORK Contraatacar is a contrataque, but the operativo doesn't need to be expended with an Engage order to do it.
That means if they're ready when they NETWORK Contraatacar, they can still be activated as normal later in the punto de inflexión. Un operativo that does NETWORK Contraatacar cannot do so again, or Contraatacar, during the same punto de inflexión.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to or within 8" of this operativo to gain one of your Omniscanner tokens. Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that has one of your Omniscanner tokens, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: BATTLECLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, AUTO-PROXY, SERVITOR

abilities.description: Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo visible to this operativo, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule. This rule has no effect if this operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo is activated, you can TRANSFER POWER.
If you do, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of that activación.  

After that activación, you can NETWORK Contraatacar with one other friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo before your opponent activates. Whenever you NETWORK Contraatacar with a operativo amigo, first select its order.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of the punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo, you can use this effect. If you do:

- That operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: BATTLECLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, BREACHER, SERVITOR

Place one of your Breach markers within this operativo's alcance de control as close as possible to a terrain feature dentro del alcance de control of it. Whenever Un operativo is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible terrain.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a terrain feature isn't within its alcance de control.

SUPPORT. Select one friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo within 6" of either this operativo or a friendly BATTLECLADE AUTO-PROXY operativo to immediately NETWORK Contraatacar (you don't have to TRANSFER POWER to do so).
Continue this operativo's activación after doing so.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
For the purposes of the Comms Device universal equipment, the operativo the distance is being determined from must control that marker

SUPPORT. Select one friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo within 6" of either this operativo or a friendly BATTLECLADE AUTO-PROXY operativo to immediately perform a free Carrera action.
You cannot select each friendly SERVITOR operativo for this rule more than once per punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
For the purposes of the Comms Device universal equipment, the operativo the distance is being determined from must control that marker

opTypes.keywords: BATTLECLADE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, MEDIC, TECHNOMEDIC, SERVITOR

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when another friendly BATTLECLADE operativo would be incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of the action.
After that action, that operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control.
If this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends. You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado, or if it's a Disparar action and this operativo would be a primary or secondary target.

Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo is activated, you can TRANSFER POWER.
If you do, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of that activación.  

After that activación, you can NETWORK Contraatacar with one other friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo before your opponent activates. Whenever you NETWORK Contraatacar with a operativo amigo, first select its order.
It can then perform a 1AP action for free, but cannot move. Once it's done so, your opponent then activates as normal.  

Un operativo cannot TRANSFER POWER or NETWORK Contraatacar if it has an APL stat of less than 2 (e.g. if the stat has been changed to less than 2 by a rule).
NETWORK Contraatacar is a contrataque, but the operativo doesn't need to be expended with an Engage order to do it.
That means if they're ready when they NETWORK Contraatacar, they can still be activated as normal later in the punto de inflexión. Un operativo that does NETWORK Contraatacar cannot do so again, or Contraatacar, during the same punto de inflexión.

Select one friendly BATTLECLADE operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to D3+3 lost wounds. It cannot be Un operativo that the Mechanosuture Array rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

ploys.description: Once per action, you can use the Command Re-roll firefight ploy for 0CP if the attack or dados de defensa was rolled for a friendly BATTLECLADE operativo that contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly BATTLECLADE operativo, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

SUPPORT. Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo is within 6" of a friendly BATTLECLADE AUTO-PROXY or BATTLECLADE SERVITOR UNDERSEER operativo, that friendly SERVITOR operativo's weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.  

For the purposes of this SUPPORT rule and the Comms Device equipment, the AUTO-PROXY or SERVITOR UNDERSEER operativo must control your Comms Device marker to add 3" to its distance requirement for this rule.

Select one objective marker or one of your mission markers.

- Whenever determining control of that marker, treat the total APL stat of friendly BATTLECLADE operativos that contest it as 1 higher if at least one friendly BATTLECLADE operativo contests that marker. Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
- Whenever a friendly BATTLECLADE operativo is within 3" of that marker, add 1 to the Atk stat of its melee weapons (to a maximum of 4).

Use this firefight ploy when Un operativo is shooting a friendly BATTLECLADE TECH-PRIEST operativo, at the start of the Roll dados de ataque step. Until the end of the sequence, ignore the Piercing weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly BATTLECLADE TECH-PRIEST operativo's activación. Once during that activación, you can use one of the following rules:

- That operativo doesn't require a marker to be within its alcance de control to perform a mission action that usually requires this (this takes precedence over that action's conditions).
Instead, the marker must be within 4" of it and no operativos enemigos can contest that marker. However, you can ignore operativos enemigos dentro del alcance de control of other friendly BATTLECLADE operativos when determining this.
- That operativo doesn't require a hatchway's access point to be within its alcance de control to perform an Operate Hatch action. Instead, that access point must be within 4" of it.

Use this firefight ploy when you would activate a friendly BATTLECLADE operativo. Remove one rules effect or stat change your opponent has applied to it (e.g. Poison token, -1APL, cannot be activated or perform actions, etc), then activate it. This ploy cannot allow it to regain lost wounds, ignore the effects of being injured, remove mission pack rulesor remove -1APL that you have applied to it (i.e. from TRANSFER POWER).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BATTLECLADE TECH-PRIEST operativo is selected as the valid target of a Disparar action or to Combatir against during the Combatir action.
Select one friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativo visible to and within 3" of that first operativo amigo to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this).
If it's the Combatir action, treat that SERVITOR operativo as being within the fighting operativo's alcance de control for the duration of that action.
If it's the Disparar action, that SERVITOR operativo is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  

This ploy has no effect if it's the Disparar action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

equipments.description:
After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión, a number of friendly BATTLECLADE operativos equal to the result that are wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Reposicionar action, but must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.
Your TECHNOARCHEOLOGIST operativo cannot perform more than one Reposicionar action in the Strategy phase of the first punto de inflexión (i.e. as a result of the Seeker of Divine Arcana rule as well).
Friendly BATTLECLADE operativos' melee weapons have the Shock weapon rule. Whenever a ready friendly BATTLECLADE operativo is retaliating, its melee weapons also have the Severe weapon rule.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the second punto de inflexión.  

You can swap the locations of any number of friendly BATTLECLADE SERVITOR operativos with each other (excluding GUN SERVITOR), and you can swap the locations of friendly BATTLECLADE GUN SERVITOR operativos with each other (remove them from the zona de combate and set them back up again).
You cannot swap any operativos that have done any of the following during the battle:

- Used any weapons on their datacard.
- Performed any actions on their datacard.
- Used the Mechanosuture Array rule(see TECHNOMEDIC).

After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. A number of times during the battle equal to the result, whenever you TRANSFER POWER, you can use this rule. If you do, don't subtract 1 from the operativo's APL stat, but it cannot perform Disparar or Combatir actions during that activación (this takes precedence over the normal Noospheric Network rules).

description: Athletic, graceful and utterly lethal, the Aeldari warriors that comprise Blades of Khaine kill teams come together to undertake missions of utmost importance on behalf of their craftworlds. They are dispatched to sever specific strands of fate, ensuring that terrible events they have foreseen never come to pass.
composition:
A BLADES OF KHAINE KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 BLADES OF KHAINE operativo selected from the following list:
  - DIRE AVENGER EXARCH with one of the following options:
    - Shuriken catapult; fists
      - Twin shuriken catapult; gun butts  
    Or one option from each of the following:
    - Diresword or power weapon
      - Shuriken pistol or shimmershield
  - HOWLING BANSHEE EXARCH with one of the following options:
    - Mirrorswords
      - Shuriken pistol; executioner
      - Shuriken pistol; power weapon
      - Shuriken pistol; triskele
      - Triskele; power weapon
  - STRIKING SCORPION EXARCH with one of the following options:
    - Shuriken pistol; biting blade
      - Shuriken pistol; scorpion's claw & chainsword
      - Twin shuriken pistols; twin chainswords  
- 7 BLADES OF KHAINE operativos selected from the following list:
  - DIRE AVENGER WARRIOR
  - HOWLING BANSHEE WARRIOR
  - STRIKING SCORPION WARRIOR

opTypes.keywords: BLADES OF KHAINE, ALEDARI, ASURYANI, LEADER, DIRE AVENGER, EXARCH

abilities.description:
- You cannot use more than one ASPECT TECHNIQUE per activación or contrataque.
- You cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than once per punto de inflexión.
- If every friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo selected for deployment has the same Aspect keyword (e.g. STRIKING SCORPION), you cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than twice per punto de inflexión (instead of once).

##### Dire Avenger Aspect Techniques
**The Slicing Hurricane**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly DIRE AVENGER operativo is performing the Reposicionar action.
That operativo can perform the Disparar action during that action (it must do so in a location it can be placed, and any remaining move distance it had from that Reposicionar action can be used after it does so).
You must select its shuriken catapult, shuriken pistol or twin shuriken catapult for that Disparar action.
  
  

**Death Of A Thousand Blades**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly DIRE AVENGER operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a shuriken catapult or twin shuriken catapult.
Until the end of that action, that weapon has the Torrent 2" weapon rule, but you cannot select more than one secondary target.
  
  

**Vigilance Of The Avenger**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly DIRE AVENGER operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a shuriken catapult or twin shuriken catapult. Until the end of that action, that weapon has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.
  
  

**Unstinting, Immovable**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when Un operativo is shooting a friendly DIRE AVENGER operativo, and you've rolled two or more fails. You can discard one of them to retain the other as a éxito normal instead.
  
  

**Raging Heat Of The Dying Flame**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE during a friendly DIRE AVENGER operativo's activación. Until the start of that operativo's next activación, you can ignore any changes to its stats from being injured (including its weapons' stats).
Whenever this operativo contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, or whenever it's shooting an operativo enemigo that does, this operativo's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
This operativo can perform two Combatir or two Disparar actions during its activación.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo that's visible to and within 2" of this operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule. This operativo only has this rule if you select the shimmershield weapon option.

opTypes.keywords: BLADES OF KHAINE, ALEDARI, ASURYANI, LEADER, HOWLING BANSHEE, EXARCH

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo is fighting, worsen the Hit stat of the operativo enemigo's melee weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.
This operativo can perform two Combatir or two Disparar actions during its activación.

- You cannot use more than one ASPECT TECHNIQUE per activación or contrataque.
- You cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than once per punto de inflexión.
- If every friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo selected for deployment has the same Aspect keyword (e.g. STRIKING SCORPION), you cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than twice per punto de inflexión (instead of once).

##### Howling Banshee Aspect Techniques

**The Woe**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE during a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE operativo's activación, after it's performed the Carga action and incapacitado an operativo enemigo during the Combatir action, and is no longer dentro del alcance de control of
operativos enemigos. That operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carga action using any remaining move distance it had from that first Carga action. That operativo can perform two Carga actions during its activación to do so. The operativo cannot have performed any other actions
during this activación (but can do so after resolving this ASPECT TECHNIQUE).

**Rain of Tears**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE operativo is fighting, after you strike with a éxito crítico if the operativo enemigo isn't incapacitado. End that sequence (any remaining dados de ataque are discarded) and immediately perform a free Fall
Back action up to 3" with that operativo (then the Combatir action ends). That operativo can do so even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing the Retirada action.

**Shriek-That-Kills**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE operativo is performing the Disparar action. Until the end of that action, that operativo can use the following ranged weapon:
|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|Shriek-That-Kills|5|3+|1/2|
|Weapon Rules|
|Range 6", Saturate, Seek Light, Stun, Torrent 1"|

**Acrobatic**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE operativo performs an action in which it moves. Until the end of the action, that operativo:

- Can ignore all vertical distances whenever it drops and climbs.
- Can move through operativos enemigos, move dentro del alcance de control of them, and during the Carga action can leave their alcance de control (it must still end the move following all requirements for that move).
- Cannot move more than its Move stat if it's the Carga action.

**Scream-That-Steals**  

Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly HOWLING BANSHEE operativo is fighting or retaliating, at the start of the Resolve dados de ataque step. You can resolve one of your successes before the normal order.
If you do, that success must be used to block.

opTypes.keywords: BLADES OF KHAINE, ALEDARI, ASURYANI, LEADER, STRIKING SCORPION, EXARCH

abilities.description: This operativo can perform two Combatir or two Disparar actions during its activación.

- You cannot use more than one ASPECT TECHNIQUE per activación or contrataque. - You cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than once per punto de inflexión. - If every friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo selected for deployment has the same Aspect keyword (e.g. STRIKING SCORPION), you cannot use each ASPECT TECHNIQUE more than twice per punto de inflexión (instead of once).  ##### Striking Scorpion Aspect Techniques **Patient Stalk, Sudden Blow**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly STRIKING SCORPION operativo that has a Conceal order performs the Reposicionar action. During that action, that operativo can move dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos (it cannot end the move there), and you can inflict D3+2 damage on one operativo enemigo it moved dentro del alcance de control of after it has moved.   
  
 **Strike and Fade**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly STRIKING SCORPION operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo during the Combatir action, and is no longer within 3" of operativos enemigos. Change that operativo amigo's order to Conceal and it can immediately perform a free Carrera action, even if it has performed an action that prevents it from performing the Carrera action.   
  
 **Scorpion's Eye**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly STRIKING SCORPION operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a shuriken pistol. Until the end of that action, that weapon has the Seek Light weapon rule.   
  
 **Merciless Strikes**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE when a friendly STRIKING SCORPION operativo is fighting, the first time you strike with a éxito crítico during that sequence. Until the end of that sequence, that operativo's melee weapon has the Shock weapon rule.   
  
 **One with the Gloom**  
 Use this ASPECT TECHNIQUE during a friendly STRIKING SCORPION operativo's activación. Until the start of its next activación, while that operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2".

ploys.description: Select two friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativos visible to and within 6" of each other. Remove them both from the zona de combate and set them back up in each other's previous locations (in other words, swap their positions).
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a ready friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa results of one result (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo is shooting an expended operativo enemigo, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Whenever a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo is fighting a ready operativo enemigo, that operativo amigo's melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo's activación. During that activación, that operativo can perform two Combatir actions.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo is retaliating or an operativo enemigo is shooting it, after your opponent rolls their dados de ataque, but before re- rolls.
Until the end of the sequence, your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque (if your opponent declared the use of any firefight ploys during that sequence that would allow them to re-roll,
that ploy is cancelled and the CP spent on it is refunded).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action. During that activación, that operativo can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo's activación. During that activación, that operativo can perform two Disparar actions.

equipments.description: Once per battle, after rolling off to decide initiative, you can add D3 to, or subtract D3 from, your result.
Once per battle, when an dados de ataque inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo, you can ignore that inflicted damage.
When this equipment is revealed, roll one D3. In the Strategy phase of the punto de inflexión equal to the result, you gain 1 additional CP.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly BLADES OF KHAINE operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a éxito normal instead.

description:
Many Astra Militarum troops have turned to Chaos over the centuries, including entire regiments of the Astra Militarum's Imperial Army predecessors that followed the Warmaster Horus into battle against the Imperium during the Horus Heresy.
  
  

These Traitors represent the primary mortal troops available to the forces of Chaos, now known as the "Traitoris Militarum" in High Gothic to the defenders of the Imperium. Even ten millennia later, Chaos Lords are known to attract these followers of Chaos into their warbands and personal armies, which vary greatly in both size and strength.
composition:
A BLOODED killteam is composed of:
- 1 Blooded Chieftan operativo with one of the following options:
  - Autopistol or laspistol, chainsword or power weapon
  - Bolt Pistol, chainsword
  - Boltgun, bayonet
  - Plasma pistol, improvised Blade *(2)*
- 9 Blooded operativos selected from the following list:
  - Brimstone Grenadier
  - Butcher
  - Commsman
  - Corpseman
  - Flenser
  - Gunner with bayonet and Flamer *(1)*
  - Gunner with bayonet and Grenade Launcher *(1)*
  - Gunner with bayonet and Meltagun *(1)*
  - Gunner with bayonet and plasma gun *(1,2)*
  - Sharpshooter *(1)*
  - Thug
  - Trench Sweeper
  - Trooper
- 4 Blooded operativos selected from the following list:
 - Enforcer (counts as two selections)
 - Ogryn (counts as two selections)
 - Trooper

Other than Trooper operativos your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

**(1):** You cannot select more than three of these operativos combined  

**(2):** You cannot select this option and this operativo. In other words you can only have one operativo with a plasma weapon.

opTypes.keywords: BLOODED, CHAOS, CHIEFTAIN, LEADER

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly
BLOODED operativo that has one of your Blooded tokens is
incapacitado, if this operativo is within 6" of it, you can regain
that token.

You gain one Blooded token:

- In the ready step of each strategy phase.
- The first time an operativo enemigo is incapacitado during each punto de inflexión.
- The first time a operativo amigo is incapacitado within 6" of an operativo enemigo during each punto de inflexión.

As a strategic gambit, you can assign any of your unassigned blooded tokens to friendly
blooded operativos. Each operativo cannot have more than one of your blooded tokens.  

Then, if four or more operativos amigos in the zona de combate have one of your Blooded tokens,
you can select one of them to be under the GAZE OF THE GODS until the end of the
punto de inflexión.  

Whenever a friendly BLOODED operativo has one of your Blooded tokens, its weapons
have the accurate 1 weapon rule. If that friendly BLOODED operativo is under the GAZE
OF THE GODS, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a result of the Accurate
1 weapon rule as a éxito crítico instead.

Whenever this operativo has one of your
Blooded tokens or is wholly within your opponent's territory
treat it as if it is under the GAZE OF THE GODS.

opTypes.keywords: BLOODED, CHAOS, BRIMSTONE GRENADIER

abilities.description:
You gain one Blooded token:

- In the ready step of each strategy phase.
- The first time an operativo enemigo is incapacitado during each punto de inflexión.
- The first time a operativo amigo is incapacitado within 6" of an operativo enemigo during each punto de inflexión.

As a strategic gambit, you can assign any of your unassigned blooded tokens to friendly
blooded operativos. Each operativo cannot have more than one of your blooded tokens.  

Then, if four or more operativos amigos in the zona de combate have one of your Blooded tokens,

punto de inflexión.  

Whenever a friendly BLOODED operativo has one of your Blooded tokens, its weapons
have the accurate 1 weapon rule. If that friendly BLOODED operativo is under the GAZE
OF THE GODS, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a result of the Accurate
1 weapon rule as a éxito crítico instead.

If this operativo is incapacitado, before it is removed from the zona de combate, you can use this rule. If you do, roll 2d6, or 1d6 if this operativo is within control range of an operativo enemigo. If any result is a 4+, inflict d3+2 damage on each operativo visible 2 and within 2" of this operativo. If thios operativo has not used its Diabolyk Bomb during the battle, inflict d6+2 damage instead.

This operativo can use frag and krak grenades (See
universal equipment). Doing so does not count towards any limited
uses you have (i.e, if you also select those grenades from equipment
for other operativos. Whenever it is doing so, improve the Hit stat of
that weapon by 1.

opTypes.keywords: BLOODED, CHAOS, BUTCHER

if it incapacitates the operativo enemigo in that sequence, it regains d3

Equipment.

opTypes.keywords: BLOODED, CHAOS, COMMSMAN

- In the ready step of each strategy phase.

opTypes.keywords: BLOODED, CHAOS, CORPSEMAN

blooded operativos. Each operativo cannot have more than one of your blooded tokens.  

Then, if four or more operativos amigos in the zona de combate have one of your Blooded tokens,
you can select one of them to be under the GAZE OF THE GODS until the end of the
punto de inflexión.  

Whenever a friendly BLOODED operativo has one of your Blooded tokens, its weapons
have the accurate 1 weapon rule. If that friendly BLOODED operativo is under the GAZE
OF THE GODS, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a result of the Accurate
1 weapon rule as a éxito crítico instead.

At the end of the select operativo step, if this operativo is selected for deployment, you can select one other friendly BLOODED operativo to gain a STIMM rule for the battle (Excluding rejuvenated).  

**Stimm Rules**

- Rejuvenated: The operativo regains 2d3 lost wounds.
- Enraged: The operativo's melee weapons have the relentless weapon rule
- Fortified: Whenever an attack die inflicts damage of 3 or more on the operativo, roll one d6; on a 5+ subtract 1 from the inflicted damage.

Select one friendly BLOODED operativo within this operativo' alcance de control, then select the Rejuvenated STIMM RULE or one other STIMM RULE for that operativo to have for that battle.
You cannot select each STIMM rule for each operativo more than once per battle.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo

ploys.description: Whenever a friendly BLOODED operativo is incapacitado, before it is removed from the zona de combate, roll 1D3; on a 3 (or 2+ if that operativo amigo has one of your Blooded tokens), inflict damage equal to the result on one operativo enemigo visible to and within 2" of that operativo amigo.

Select one enemey operativo visible to a friendly BLOODED operativo. Until the end of the punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly BLOODED operativo is shooting against, fighting against, or retaliating against that operativo enemigo, its weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule, or Relentless if that shooting, fighting, or retaliating operativo has one of your Blooded tokens.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dados de ataque.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly BLOODED operativo that has one of your Blooded tokens or is wholly within your opponent's territory, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.

Whenever a friendly BLOODED operativo that is wholly within your opponent's territory and does not have one of your Blooded tokens is shooting or fighting, its weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.  

Whenever a friendly BLOODED operativo that has one of your blooded tokens is wholly within your opponent's territory, its weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.  
**Punishing:** If you retain any éxitos críticos, you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BLOODED operativo performs the Disparar action and you are selecting a valid target.
Having other friendly BLOODED operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control does not prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.
Until the end of that action, whenever you discard an attack die as a fail, inflict damage equal to the die result on one operativo amigo of your choice dentro del alcance de control of the target.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BLOODED operativo that has one of your Blooded tokens is selected as the valid target of a Disparar action or to Combatir against during the Combatir action. Select one other friendly BLOODED operativo visible to and within 3" of that first operativo amigo to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead, even if it normally would not be valid for this. If it is the Combatir action, treat that other operativo as being within the fighting operativo's alcance de control for the duration of that action. If it is the Disparar action, that other operativo is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  
 This ploy has no effect if it is the Disparar action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent special rule.

Use this firefight ploy during the activación fo a friendly BLOODED operativo that is under the GAZE OF THE GODS before or after it performs an action.  

Until the end of that operativo's activación, add 1 to its APL stat.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo is incapacitado by a friendly BLOODED operativo within 2" of it that has one of your Blooded tokens.  

You gain one Blooded token.

equipments.description: The Reward Earned firefight ploy costs you 0 CP.

your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque results of 1.

Add 1 to both Dmg stats of each friendly BLOODED operativo's bayonet, bayonet and shield, and improvised blade for the battle.

description:
Brood Brothers are the humans of the Genestealer Cults, who have been implanted by Genestealers and have served as hosts for their Genestealer Hybrid offspring.  

Many of these Brood Brothers may be members of the local civil or military authorities, continuing to carry out their normal duties in society. They remain hidden until the cult/clan is powerful enough to completely take control of the host society. They regard and often venerate the Genestealer Patriarch as a grandfather or deity. They are especially fanatic members of the clan, motivated by intense, instinctual bonds to their Genestealer and Hybrid relatives.
composition:
A BROOD BROTHER KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 BROOD BROTHER Commander operativo with one of the following options:
  - Bolt pistol, chainsword and claw
  - Drum-fed autogun, bayonet,
  - Laspistol, power weapon and claw=
- 9 BROOD BROTHER operativos selected from the following list:
  - Agitator
  - Gunner with Flamer and bayonet (1)
  - Gunner with Grenade Launcher and bayonet (1)
  - Gunner with Meltagun and bayonet (1)
  - Gunner with Plasma gun and bayonet (1)
  - Iconward
  - Knife Fighter
  - Medic
  - Sapper
  - Sniper (1)
  - Trooper
  - Veteran
  - Vox-Operator
- 3 Brood Brother operativos selected from the following list (3):
  - 2 Psychic Familiar operativos (Still count as one selection)
  - Magus (Count as two selections) (2)
  - Patriarch (Count as three selections) (2)
  - Primus (Count as two selections) (2)
  - Trooper

Other than Trooper operativos, your kill team can only include each option on this list once.  

(1) You cannot select more than three of these operativos combined.  

(2) Your kill team can only include up to one BROODCOVEN operativo. If one of these operativos is selected for deployment, your Commander operativo loses the Leader keyword for the battle.  

(3) Up to three times, instead of selecting one of these operativos, you can select one BROOD BROTHER ploy to cost you 0CP for the battle. Note that "count as" selections still apply; for example, if you select a Patriarch operativo, you could not do this.

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo is shooting against or fighting against an operativo enemigo, after resolving all of your dados de ataque, if that operativo enemigo is not incapacitado it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dados de ataque.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT if this operativo is in the zona de combate. Select one of the following for friendly BROOD BROTHER operativos to have until the end of the punto de inflexión or until this operativo is incapacitado (whichever comes first):  - Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo, ignore the piercing rule. - You can ignore any changes to friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo's stats from being injured (including their weapons' stats). - You can ignore any changes to the APL stats of friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one operativo enemigo that is a valid target to this operativo.
Inflict 2 damage on it, or 4 damage instead if it is within 6" of this operativo.
Then roll 1D6, if the result is higher than that enemy's APL stat, inflict an additional 2 damage on it, or 4 damage instead if it is within 6" of this operativo.
Keep rolling 1D6 in this manner until you roll equal to or less than that operativo enemigo's APL stat, until it is incapacitado, or until you inflict 8 damage on it during this action (whichever comes first).  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, subtract 1 from its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: BROOD BROTHER, GENESTEALER CULT, PSYCHIC FAMILIAR

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo is shooting against or fighting against an operativo enemigo, after resolving all of your dados de ataque, if that operativo enemigo is not incapacitado it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dados de ataque.

This operativo can perform mission actions while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo (taking precedence over those actions' normal conditions).
It can move through operativos enemigos, move dentro del alcance de control of them, and during the Carga action can leave their alcance de control (it must still end the move following all requirements for that move).

Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate any other ready friendly BROOD BROTHER PSYCHIC FAMILIAR operativo (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

This operativo cannot use any weapons that are not on its datacard, or perform unique actions. Whenever this operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (i.e, Seek, Vantage Terrain) except being within 2". This operativo can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.

opTypes.keywords: BROOD BROTHER, GENESTEALER CULT, BROODCOVEN, LEADER, PSYKER, PATRIARCH

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule.
You can activate this operativo twice during the punto de inflexión as long as it has AP to spend (it stays ready while it can still be activated a second time).
Per punto de inflexión it cannot move more than 9" and you cannot spend more than 4AP in total for it.

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo is shooting against or fighting against an operativo enemigo, after resolving all of your dados de ataque, if that operativo enemigo is not incapacitado it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dados de ataque.

This operativo cannot use any weapons that are not on its datacard, or perform unique actions (excluding Into Shadow and Mind Control).
Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, if this operativo has a conceal order, it cannot use Light terrain for cover.
While this can allow this operativo to be targeted (assuming it is visible), it does not remove its cover save (if any).

Change this operativo's order.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 2" of this operativo.
Both players roll 1D6 and add their respective operativo's APL stat to the total.
If your total is higher than your opponent's you can resolve this action's second effect.  

Until the end of the activación, that operativo enemigo is a operativo amigo (an operativo enemigo for you opponent), you can change its order and it can immediately perofrm one free action.
It cannot perform an action in which it moves other than Carrera (in which case specify the location for your opponent to move this operativo to).
You can only resolve this action's second effect once per battle.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, unless the only operativo enemigo it is dentro del alcance de control of is selected for this action.

opTypes.keywords: BROOD BROTHER, GENESTEALER CULT, BROODCOVEN, LEADER, PRIMUS

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo is shooting against or fighting against an operativo enemigo, after resolving all of your dados de ataque, if that operativo enemigo is not incapacitado it gains one of your Crossfire tokens.  

Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that has any of your Crossfire tokens, you can remove any of those tokens. For each that you do, you can re-roll one of your dados de ataque.
This operativo can perform either two Disparar or two Combatir actions during its activación.

Once per punto de inflexión, after rolling off to determine initiative, if this operativo is in the zona de combate, you can do one of the following (you cannot select each option more than once per battle):  - Add 1 to your dice result. - If you did not have initiative in the previous punto de inflexión, re-roll your dice.

You gain 1 CP.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or more than once per punto de inflexión.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo (excluding PATRIARCH) is incapacitado when fighting or retaliating,
if you have any unresolved dados de ataque, you can roll 1D6.
If the result is a success as if it were the Roll dados de ataque step of that sequence (i.e, using the same weapon, but with no re-rolls), you can strike the operativo enemigo in that sequence with one of your unresolved
éxitos normales, or any of your successes instead if the 1D6 result is a éxito crítico. In either case, that operativo amigo is removed from the zona de combate afterwards.
Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura as a result of Heavy terrain, you can retain one additional cover save.
During friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo's activación, you can ignore the first vertical distance of 2" they move during one climb up.

The first time each friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo performs either the Disparar or Combatir action during each of its activations,
if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación,
the operativo enemigo selected as the valid target or to Combatir against gains one of your Crossfire tokens as soon as it is selected (instead of after resolving your dados de ataque).  

This ploy has no effect if that operativo amigo was activated dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.  

Note this ploy cannot come into effect more than once per activación (you cannot use it during both the Disparar and the Combatir action in the same activación).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BROOD BROTHER LEADER operativo is selected as the valid target of a Disparar action or to Combatir against during the Combatir action. Select one other friendly BROOD BROTHER BROODGUARD operativo (excluding LEADER) visible to and within 3" of that LEADER operativo to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it normally would not be valid for this. If it is the Combatir action, treat that other operativo as being within the fighting operativo's alcance de control for the duration of that action. If it is the Disparar action, that other operativo is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  
 This ploy has no effect if it is the Disparar action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy when selecting a valid target for a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo. Until the end of the action, determine Visibility as normal, but you can instead determine intervening (for cover and obscured) from another friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo that both that operativo amigo and the potential valid target are visible to, but that is not itself dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.  
 Note the operativo amigo does not gain the additional benefits of Vantage terrain if the other operativo is on it (e.g, to target an operativo enemigo that has a conceal order that is in cover provided by only Light Terrain.

Use this firefight ploy after an activación. Before the next activación, you can perform a free Carrera action with one friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo, as long as it is not a valid target for an operativo enemigo when it starts and ends that action. You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo (excluding LEADER) within 6" of a friendly BROOD BROTHER LEADER or friendly BROOD BROTHER ICONWARD operativo is shooting,
fighting or retaliating, in the Roll dados de ataque Step. You can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it, or retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.

equipments.description:
After revealing this equipment option, roll 1D3.
As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión, a number of friendly BROOD BROTHER BROODGUARD operativos equal to the result that are wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free
Reposicionar action, but must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.

Friendly BROOD BROTHER BROODGUARD operativos have the following melee weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Cult Knife|3|4+|3/4|

Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo (Excluding Patriarch), in the roll dados de defensa step, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.
STRATEGIC GAMBIT: Select one operativo enemigo visible to a friendly BROOD BROTHER operativo to gain one of your Crossfire tokens.

description: Canoptek Circle kill teams comprise sinister alien constructs in thrall to their Cryptek master. The emotionless and unliving Canoptek constructs overcome obstacles to a Cryptek's ambitions, whether rock and metal or the bodies of the living, while their master accesses nodes of power and data to Carga the constructs' ancient abilities further.
composition:
A CANOPTEK CIRCLE Killteam is composed of:

- 1 CANOPTEK CIRCLE GEOMANCER operativo
- 2 CANOPTEK CIRCLE TOMB CRAWLER operativos with one of the following options (select separately for each):
  - Twin gauss reapers; claws
  - Transdimensional isolator; claws*
- 1 CANOPTEK CIRCLE ACCELERATOR operativo
- 1 CANOPTEK CIRCLE REANIMATOR operativo
- 3 CANOPTEK CIRCLE WARRIOR operativos with one of the following options (select separately for each):
  - Gauss scalpel; claws & tail
  - Tesla caster; claws & tail

*Your kill team can only include up to one transdimensional isolator.

opTypes.keywords: CANOPTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, CANOPTEK, MACROCYTE, REANIMATOR

abilities.description:
SUPPORT. Select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE CANOPTEK operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. Alternatively, you can select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE CANOPTEK operativo that's visible to this operativo and within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX (SUPPORT doesn't apply to this selection).
That selected operativo can immediately perform a 1AP action for free; it cannot move more than 2" during that action.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo

Select a point on a terrain feature; that point must be visible to and within 8" of this operativo. Separately roll 2D6 for each operativo within 2" of that point. If the result is higher than that operativo's remaining wounds, inflict damage on it equal to the difference.

This operativo cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

SUPPORT. Select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. Alternatively, you can select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo visible to this operativo and within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX (SUPPORT doesn't apply to this selection).

The next time the selected operativo performs an action in which it moves, don't move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat (or 3" if it was a Carrera) horizontally of its
original location (in a zona de combate that uses the close quarters rules, e.g. zona de combate: Tomb World, this distance can be measured over and through Wall terrain and the operativo can be set up on the other side). Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Carga action.
It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it's the Carga action, it cannot be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión, place your three OBELISK NODE markers wholly within your territory. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in each punto de inflexión after the first, you can move your OBELISK NODE markers up to 3" each.

Your OBELISK NODE markers control other markers within 1" of them that no operativos enemigos contest (treat your OBELISK NODE markers as operativos amigos for this purpose).
If more than one player would use their OBELISK NODE markers to control the same marker, no OBELISK NODE markers control it.

Whenever one of your OBELISK NODE markers is within 6" horizontally of another of your OBELISK NODE markers, those markers and the area between them create an OBELISK NODE MATRIX above and below (in other words, their height in the zona de combate is irrelevant).
If all three of your OBELISK NODE markers fulfil this, it creates a larger combined OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX:
- Weapons on its datacard have the Accurate 2 weapon rule.
- Add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3).

Whenever this operativo would perform a mission action, if it requires this operativo to control an objective marker, you can instead determine control from one of your OBELISK NODE markers (see Obelisk Node Matrix faction rule).
Whenever this operativo would perform the Operate Hatch action, you can open or close a hatchway thats access point is within 1" of one of your OBELISK NODE markers instead.
Note that you must still fulfil the Operate Hatch action's conditions.

opTypes.keywords: CANOPTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, CANOPTEK, MACROCYTE, ACCELERATOR

abilities.description:
Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 3" of this operativo. Alternatively, if this operativo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, you can select one operativo enemigo within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
Until the end of that operativo enemigo's next activación, subtract 1 from its APL stat.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Select one other friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE CANOPTEK operativo visible to and within 3" of this operativo. Alternatively, if this operativo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, you can select one other friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE CANOPTEK operativo within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
Until the end of that selected operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
