Your OBELISK NODE markers control other markers within 1" of them that no operativos enemigos contest (treat your OBELISK NODE markers as operativos amigos for this purpose).
If more than one player would use their OBELISK NODE markers to control the same marker, no OBELISK NODE markers control it.

Whenever one of your OBELISK NODE markers is within 6" horizontally of another of your OBELISK NODE markers, those markers and the area between them create an OBELISK NODE MATRIX above and below (in other words, their height in the zona de combate is irrelevant).
If all three of your OBELISK NODE markers fulfil this, it creates a larger combined OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX:
- Weapons on its datacard have the Accurate 2 weapon rule.
- Add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3).

opTypes.keywords: CANOPTEK CIRCLE , NECRON, CANOPTEK, MACROCYTE, REANIMATOR

abilities.description:
Select one friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. Alternatively, if this operativo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, you can select one other friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
The selected operativo regains up to 3D3 lost wounds. It cannot be Un operativo that the Reanimate rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or more than once per punto de inflexión.

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión, place your three OBELISK NODE markers wholly within your territory. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in each punto de inflexión after the first, you can move your OBELISK NODE markers up to 3" each.

Your OBELISK NODE markers control other markers within 1" of them that no operativos enemigos contest (treat your OBELISK NODE markers as operativos amigos for this purpose).
If more than one player would use their OBELISK NODE markers to control the same marker, no OBELISK NODE markers control it.

Whenever one of your OBELISK NODE markers is within 6" horizontally of another of your OBELISK NODE markers, those markers and the area between them create an OBELISK NODE MATRIX above and below (in other words, their height in the zona de combate is irrelevant).
If all three of your OBELISK NODE markers fulfil this, it creates a larger combined OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX:
- Weapons on its datacard have the Accurate 2 weapon rule.
- Add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3).

Once per punto de inflexión, when another friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo would be incapacitado, if that operativo is visible to and within 6" of this operativo, or if this and that operativo are within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX,
you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of the action.
After that action, that operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action. If this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends.

You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado, or if it's a Disparar action and this operativo would be a primary or secondary target.

opTypes.keywords: CANOPTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, CANOPTEK, MACROCYTE, WARRIOR

abilities.description: If this operativo is incapacitado by an operativo enemigo within 2" of it, before this operativo is removed from the zona de combate, roll one D3: on a 2+, inflict damage on that operativo enemigo equal to the result.

This operativo is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it's incapacitado, and when determining your starting number of operativos).
It's also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require operativos to 'escape', 'survive' or be incapacitado by operativos enemigos (if it escapes/survives/is incapacitado, determining how many operativos must escape/survive/be incapacitado, etc.).

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión, place your three OBELISK NODE markers wholly within your territory. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in each punto de inflexión after the first, you can move your OBELISK NODE markers up to 3" each.

Your OBELISK NODE markers control other markers within 1" of them that no operativos enemigos contest (treat your OBELISK NODE markers as operativos amigos for this purpose).
If more than one player would use their OBELISK NODE markers to control the same marker, no OBELISK NODE markers control it.

Whenever one of your OBELISK NODE markers is within 6" horizontally of another of your OBELISK NODE markers, those markers and the area between them create an OBELISK NODE MATRIX above and below (in other words, their height in the zona de combate is irrelevant).
If all three of your OBELISK NODE markers fulfil this, it creates a larger combined OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX:
- Weapons on its datacard have the Accurate 2 weapon rule.
- Add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3).

opTypes.keywords: CANOPTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, CANOPTEK, TOMB CRAWLER

abilities.description:
As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión, place your three OBELISK NODE markers wholly within your territory. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in each punto de inflexión after the first, you can move your OBELISK NODE markers up to 3" each.

Your OBELISK NODE markers control other markers within 1" of them that no operativos enemigos contest (treat your OBELISK NODE markers as operativos amigos for this purpose).
If more than one player would use their OBELISK NODE markers to control the same marker, no OBELISK NODE markers control it.

Whenever one of your OBELISK NODE markers is within 6" horizontally of another of your OBELISK NODE markers, those markers and the area between them create an OBELISK NODE MATRIX above and below (in other words, their height in the zona de combate is irrelevant).
If all three of your OBELISK NODE markers fulfil this, it creates a larger combined OBELISK NODE MATRIX.
Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX:
- Weapons on its datacard have the Accurate 2 weapon rule.
- Add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3).

Whenever determining control of a marker, you can treat this operativo's APL stat as 3. If you do, this takes precedence over all other rules, meaning any changes to its APL stat are ignored for this.

Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, if this operativo has a Conceal order, it cannot use Light terrain for cover. While this can allow this operativo to be targeted (assuming it's visible), it doesn't remove its cover save (if any)

ploys.description: Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo, if your OBELISK NODE MATRIX is intervening, or that operativo amigo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa results of one result (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo is shooting, if your OBELISK NODE MATRIX is intervening, or the target is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

Once per action, the first time an operativo enemigo would move within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, the distance is treated as an additional 1". Note this means if that operativo enemigo doesn't have sufficient move distance (e.g. it's at the end of its move), that operativo cannot move within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, or whenever it's fighting or retaliating against a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo that's within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, subtract 1 from both Dmg stats of that operativo enemigo's melee weapons (to a minimum of 2) until the end of the activación/contrataque. Note this means if the operativo enemigo moves through your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, apply this change at the end of that move action until the end of the activación/contrataque.

Use this firefight ploy when an dados de ataque inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo. If your OBELISK NODE MATRIX is intervening, or that operativo amigo is within your OBELISK NODE MATRIX, ignore that inflicted damage. Note your opponent determines intervening (i.e. where on their operativo's base to draw the targeting lines from).

Use this firefight ploy when it's your turn to activate or Contraatacar. Move any number of your OBELISK NODE markers instead. They can move up to 6" combined, and distances are always rounded up to the nearest inch (so if you move a marker 1.5", it's treated as moving it 2"). For example, you could move one marker 6", three markers 1" each, or any combination that doesn't exceed 6" in total. You can also move them 0" (to effectively skip an activación). In any case, your opponent activates as normal afterwards.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action. You can either change one of the strategy ploys you used during this punto de inflexión (only pay additional CP if that ploy costs more), or use a strategy ploy now (pay its CP cost as normal).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE GEOMANCER operativo is selected as the valid target of a Disparar action or to Combatir against during the Combatir action.
Select one other friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE CANOPTEK operativo visible to and within 3" of that first operativo amigo to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this).
If it's the Combatir action, treat that other operativo as being within the fighting operativo's alcance de control for the duration of that action. If it's the Disparar action, that other operativo is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.

This ploy has no effect if it's the Disparar action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

equipments.description: Once per battle, during a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo's activación or contrataque, you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that activación/contrataque, a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE GEOMANCER operativo is treated as your fourth OBELISK NODE marker.
After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. You can use the Animate Obelisk Nodes firefight ploy for 0CP a number of times during the battle equal to the result.
Whenever a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE operativo is activated, it regains up to D3 lost wounds.

Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly CANOPTEK CIRCLE GEOMANCER operativo, at the start of the Roll dados de defensa step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

description: Wherever bitterness and discontent fester, so does the worship of the Dark Gods take hold. Zealous bands of cultists throng to the banners of malefic powers. The most monstrous of these zealots are warped beyond recognition, sprouting chitinous claws, leathery wings and all manner of mutations with which to slaughter their enemies.
composition:
A CHAOS CULT killteam is composed of:
 
- 1 CULT DEMAGOGUE operativo
- 2 BLESSED BLADE operativos
- 9 CHAOS DEVOTEE operativos
- 1 ICONARCH operativo
- 1 MINDWITCH operativo

opTypes.keywords: CHAOS CULT, CHAOS, LEADER, DARK COMMUNE, CULT DEMAGOGUE

abilities.description:
ACCURSED GIFTS are rules that friendly CHAOS CULT operativos gain when they turn into another operativo type (see Mutation faction rule).
The first time a friendly DEVOTEE operativo turns into a MUTANT operativo during the battle, select your primary ACCURSED GIFT.
The first time a friendly MUTANT operativo turns into a TORMENT operativo during the battle, select your secondary ACCURSED GIFT.  

All friendly MUTANT operativos have your primary ACCURSED GIFT, and all friendly TORMENT operativos have your primary and secondary ACCURSED GIFTS. You cannot select the same ACCURSED GIFT more than once per battle.

During the battle, friendly CHAOS CULT operativos can MUTATE as follows:

- As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, you can MUTATE a number of friendly CHAOS CULT operativos based on the punto de inflexión as follows: TP1 = 2, TP2 = 2, TP3 = 3, TP4+ = 4.
- Whenever a friendly DEVOTEE operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo within its alcance de control, it can MUTATE.
- ach operativo cannot MUTATE more than once per punto de inflexión.


Whenever a operativo amigo MUTATES, select one of the following:

- If it's a DEVOTEE operativo, turn it into a MUTANT operativo.
- If it's a MUTANT operativo, turn it into a TORMENT operativo (max twice per punto de inflexión).
- It can regain up to D3+1 lost wounds.


You cannot have more than five MUTANT operativos and three TORMENT operativos at once. Whenever a operativo amigo turns into a new operativo:

- Swap the miniatures, ensuring the centre of the new miniature's base is as close as possible to where the centre of the old miniature's base was. This can put it dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, and if the old miniature was, the new miniature must be if possible.
- The new operativo type loses a number of wounds equal to the lost wounds of its preceding operativo type.
- It's still the same operativo for any rules it's already been selected for. The operativo is simply a new operativo type and will use that new type's miniature and datacard rules.

**SUPPORT** One other friendly CHAOS CULT operativo visible to and within 9" of this operativo can immediately perform a free Combatir action.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**SUPPORT** One other friendly CHAOS CULT operativo visible to and within 9" of this operativo can immediately perform a free Carga or Carrera action (for the former, it cannot move more than 3").  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Select one of the following effects to last until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it's incapacitado or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first):

opTypes.keywords: CHAOS CULT, CHAOS, TORMENT

abilities.description:
ACCURSED GIFTS are rules that friendly CHAOS CULT operativos gain when they turn into another operativo type (see Mutation faction rule).
The first time a friendly DEVOTEE operativo turns into a MUTANT operativo during the battle, select your primary ACCURSED GIFT.
The first time a friendly MUTANT operativo turns into a TORMENT operativo during the battle, select your secondary ACCURSED GIFT.  

All friendly MUTANT operativos have your primary ACCURSED GIFT, and all friendly TORMENT operativos have your primary and secondary ACCURSED GIFTS. You cannot select the same ACCURSED GIFT more than once per battle.
This operativo cannot use any weapons that are not on its datacard, or perform the Recoger Marcador, unique or mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).

Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, if this operativo has a Conceal order, it cannot use Light terrain for cover.
While this can allow this operativo to be targeted (assuming it's visible), it doesn't remove its cover save (if any).
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on this operativo, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

Add 1" to this operativo's Move stat.
Improve this operativo's Save stat by 1.
Whenever this operativo ends its move during the Carga action, you can inflict  D3 damage on one operativo enemigo within its alcance de control.
You can ignore any changes to the Hit stat of this operativo's

Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating:- operativos enemigos cannot assist.- Each time you strike, also inflict D3 damage on each other operativo enemigo within this operativo's alcance de control.

ploys.description:
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of operativos enemigos that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those operativos enemigos is within 2" of friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT operativos.  

Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

You can ignore any changes to the Hit stat of friendly CHAOS CULT operativos' weapons from being injured. Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly CHAOS CULT operativo that's wounded, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.

Friendly CHAOS CULT operativos' melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule, or the Accurate 2 weapon rule if that operativo amigo is a MUTANT or TORMENT operativo.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 2" of friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT operativos, worsen the Hit stat of that operativo enemigo's weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CHAOS CULT operativo (excluding DARK COMMUNE) is activated.
Select an ACCURSED GIFT for that operativo to gain. This is in addition to any ACCURSED GIFTS it already has.
Each operativo amigo cannot be selected for this ploy more than once per battle, and if that operativo turns into a different one (see Mutation faction rule), it still has that ACCURSED GIFT.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT operativo is incapacitado, before it is removed from the zona de combate. Inflict D3 damage (or D6 damage instead if that operativo amigo is a TORMENT) on one operativo enemigo visible to and within 2" of that operativo amigo.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly CHAOS CULT DARK COMMUNE operativo is selected as the valid target of a Disparar action or to Combatir against during the Combatir action. Select one other friendly CHAOS CULT operativo (excluding DARK COMMUNE) visible to and within 3" of that DARK COMMUNE operativo to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this). If it's the Combatir action, treat that other operativo as being within the fighting operativo's alcance de control for the duration of that action. If it is the Disparar action, that other operativo is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  
 This ploy has no effect if it's the Disparar action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly CHAOS CULT MUTANT or CHAOS CULT TORMENT operativo's activación. During that activación, that operativo can perform two Combatir actions, and one of them can be free.

equipments.description: Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Change one of your ACCURSED GIFTS. Note that if it is an ACCURSED GIFT Un operativo has from the Abhorrent Mutation firefight ploy, only that operativo benefits from this.

After revealing this equipment option, roll one D3. As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión, a number of friendly CHAOS CULT DEVOTEE operativos equal to the result that are wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform
a free Reposicionar action, but must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.
Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly CHAOS CULT operativo, in the Roll dados de defensa step, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.

Once per battle, when an dados de ataque inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly CHAOS CULT operativo (excluding DEVOTEE), you can ignore that inflicted damage.
If that operativo amigo is a MUTANT or TORMENT operativo, you cannot roll for the Unnatural Regeneration rule for that dados de ataque then decide to use this rule on the same dice - you must use one or the other.

description:
Aeldari Corsairs or Anhrathe are bands of piratical Aeldari Outcasts. They are a constant threat to merchant shipping, though very rarely pose a threat to a major Imperial battlefleet.
  
  

There are many bands of so-called Corsairs scattered across the galaxy, and all are savage and deadly raiders. Outcasts from the strict confines of the Craftworlds, the Corsairs live in self-imposed exile, seeking to explore the galaxy and experience the full gamut of emotion and sensation accessible to the Eldar's sensitive psyche.
composition:
A CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED killteam is composed of:
- 1 CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED Felarch operativo with one of the following options:
  - Shuriken rifle, shuriken pistol, power weapon
  - Neuro Disruptor, Power weapon
- 8 CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativos selected from the following list:
  - Fate Dealer
  - Gunner with one of the following options:
  - Blaster (X), Shuriken pistol, fists
    - Shredder, Shuriken pistol, fists
  - Heavy Gunner with one of the following options:
    - Shuriken Cannon, Shuriken pistol, fists
    - Wraithcannon (X), Shuriken pistol, fists  
  - Kurnathi
  - Kurnite Hunter
  - Shade Runner
  - Soul Weaver
  - Starstorm Duelist
  - Warrior with one of the following options:
    - Shuriken pistol, power weapon
  - Shuriken rifle, fists  
  - Way Seeker

Other than Warrior operativos your kill team can only include each operativo on this lists once.  

(X) Your kill team cannot include both a blaster and a wraithcannon.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, FELARCH, LEADER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

Once per battle, after an operativo enemigo performs an action during its activación, if this operativo is ready, you can use this rule.
If you do so, roll 1D6, if the result is higher than that operativo enemigo's APL stat, you can interrupt that activación and immediately perform either a free Disparar or a free Combatir action with this operativo,
but other operativos enemigos cannot be selected as a valid target or to Combatir against during that action (Note that secondary targets from the blast weapon rule can still be targeted).
After you perform that action, subtract 1 from this operativo's APL stat until the end of its next activación.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo is shooting with a shuriken rifle or ranger long rifle during an activación in which it has not performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action,
that operativo has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that operativo is not restricted from performing those actions after shooting.
This operativo can perform a 1AP action for free during their activación as a result of the Aeldari Raiders rule (instead of the Carrera action).

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, GUNNER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, HEAVY GUNNER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, FATE DEALER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead.

This is not cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from vantage terrain.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo is shooting with a shuriken rifle or ranger long rifle during an activación in which it has not performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action,
that operativo has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that operativo is not restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, KURNATHI

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

This operativo can perform the Carrera action during an activación in which it has performed the Carga action, but can only use any remaining move distance it had from that Carga action (to a maximum of 3").
Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating, you can resolve one of your successes before the normal order. If you do, that success must be used to block.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, KURNITE HUNTER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**    Select one operativo enemigo within 9" of this operativo. Once during this punto de inflexión, during that operativo enemigo's activación, after it performs an action in which it moves, you can interrupt that activación and perform either a free Reposicionar action with this operativo (it cannot end that move further from that operativo enemigo) or a free Carga action with this operativo (you can change its order to do so, and it must end that move dentro del alcance de control of that operativo enemigo).

The first time during each punto de inflexión that this operativo is retaliating, if it is ready, in the Resolve dados de ataque step of that sequence, you resolve the first dados de ataque (i.e, defender instead of attacker).

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, SOUL WEAVER, PSYKER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one other friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. That operativo regains 2D3 lost wounds.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, SHADE RUNNER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

Whenever this operativo performs the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action, it can Warp Jump. If it does, do not move it, instead remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up wholly within 7" of its original location, measuring the Horizontal distance only (in zona de combate Gallowdark, this distance can be measured through walls). It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it is the Carga action, it cannot be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. This operativo cannot Warp Jump during the same activación in which it performed the Carrera action (or vice-versa).

Whenever this operativo performs the Reposicionar action with a Warp Jump (See Blink Pack), you can use this rule. If you do, after it moves, draw an imaginary line 1mm in diameter and up to 7" long between it and its previous location. Note this does not have to be a straight line. Inflict 1D3+2 damage on one operativo enemigo that line crosses. You cannot inflict damage on an operativo enemigo that was not visible to this operativo at the start of that action. A 28mm round marker can be temporarily placed underneath this operativo before it moves to help determine this.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, STARSTORM DUELLIST

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

This operativo can perform the Disparar action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
If it does, when selecting a valid target, you can only select an operativo enemigo within this operativo's alcance de control, and can do so even if other operativos amigos are within that operativo enemigo's alcance de control.

Perform 2 free Disparar actions with this operativo (this takes precedence over action restrictions). You must select its fusion pistol for one action and its shuriken pistol for the other (in any order).  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or during an activación in which it performed the Disparar action (or vice versa).

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, PSYKER, WAY SEEKER

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.

*PSYCHIC*  
 Select 2 Friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativos visible to and within 5" of this operativo. Remove them both from the zona de combate and set them back up in each other's locations (in other words, swap their positions). If one of them performed a Carga, Retirada, or Reposicionar option during this punto de inflexión and the other is ready, the other cannot perform any of those actions in its activación during this punto de inflexión.  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

*PSYCHIC*  
  Select one Friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo.  Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it is incapacitado, or until it performs this action again (Whichever comes first), the first time an dados de ataque inflicts normal damage on that operativo amigo, ignore that inflicted damage.  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED, AELDARI, ANHRATHE, WARRIOR

abilities.description: Each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo can perform a free Carrera action during their activación.
You can use the Capricious Flight and Light Fingers firefight ploys for 0cp each if a friendly WARRIOR is the specified CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo is shooting with a shuriken rifle or ranger long rifle during an activación in which it has not performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action,
that operativo has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that operativo is not restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

ploys.description: Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo that performed an action in which it moved during this punto de inflexión, you can re-roll one of your dice.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo is more than 5" from other operativo amigo, its weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.  
**Punishing:** If you retain any éxitos críticos, you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.

Up to 1D3 friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativos can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice.
This punto de inflexión, each that does so cannot perform the Carrera action during their activación. You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.

Whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if it or the operativo enemigo in that sequence contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, that operativo's weapons have the Balanced special rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this firefight ploy when you activate your first friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo during the punto de inflexión, if it is more than 5" from other operativos amigos.
The first time that operativo performs either the Disparar or Combatir action during that activación, its weapons have the relentless rule.
Note this ploy cannot come into effect more than once per activación (You cannot use it during both the Disparar and Combatir action in the same activación).  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dados de ataque.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action. During that activación, that operativo can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo's activación.
Until the end of that activación, having an operativo enemigo within its alcance de control does not prevent that operativo amigo from performing the Recoger Marcador or mission actions.

Use this Firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo performs the Retirada action. Before it moves, inflict 2D3 damage on that operativo for each friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo within its alcance de control.

equipments.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
In addition, friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativos are not affected by the X" Devastating X weapon rule (i.e, Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operativo more than 3" from it, at the start of the Roll dados de defensa step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the X of the piercing weapon rule by 1 (If any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

Once per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED WAY SEEKER or CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED SOUL WEAVER operativo is performing a PSYCHIC unique action (excluding Warp Fold),
you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, add 3" to its distance requirement. Note this has no effect on PSYCHIC weapons (e.g, the Devastating distance requirement of Lightning Strike).

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**  

Roll 1D3, if the result is higher than the number of current punto de inflexión, you gain 1CP and cannot use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT for the rest of the battle.

description:
Grim, fatalistic and utterly uncompromising, the Death Korps of Krieg are famed for their endurance and ability to do
battle in the most horrific conditions. Death Korps kill teams are made up of veteran specialists who have seen more fighting that many Astra Militarum soldiers will experience in their entire lifetime.
composition:
A DEATH KORPS KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER operativo with the following:
  - Boltgun; bayonet  
  Or one option from each of the following:
  - Bolt pistol, plasma pistol or relic laspistol
  - Chainsword or power weapon
- 4 TROOPER operativos*
- 9 DEATH KORPS operativos selected from the following list:
  - BRUISER
  - CONFIDANT with one of the following options:
    - Boltgun or lasgun; bayonet
    - Bolt pistol or relic laspistol; chainsword    
  - GUNNER with bayonet and flamer
  - GUNNER with bayonet and grenade launcher
  - GUNNER with bayonet and meltagun
  - GUNNER with bayonet and plasma gun
  - MEDIC
  - SAPPER
  - SNIPER
  - SPOTTER
  - TROOPER
  - VETERAN
  - VOX-OPERATOR
  - ZEALOT

Other than TROOPER operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

*Up to four times, instead of taking one of these TROOPER operativos, you can select one DEATH KORPS ploy to cost you 0CP for the battle.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, LEADER, WATCHMASTER

abilities.description: If this operativo doesn't issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, you can use the Inspirational Leadership firefight ploy for 0CP during this operativo's activación.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** and **SUPPORT**
 A friendly DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER operativo can issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER.
 Whenever it does, select one GUARDSMAN ORDER for all friendly DEATH KORPS operativos within 6" of it to receive.
 Whenever a operativo amigo receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, apply its rules until the end of the punto de inflexión.
 operativos cannot benefit from more than one GUARDSMAN ORDER at once; they only benefit from the most recent order they received during the punto de inflexión.
 
 - **Take Aim!**  

 Ranged weapons of operativos that received this order (excluding mortar barrage and remote detonator) have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
 - **Fix Bayonets!**  

 Melee weapons of operativos that received this order have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
 - **Dig In!**  

 Whenever Un operativo is shooting a operativo amigo that has received this order, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
 - **Move! Move! Move!**  

 Whenever Un operativo that's received this order is performing the Reposicionar action, add 1" to its Move stat.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, BRUISER

abilities.description: Once per punto de inflexión, when this operativo is fighting or retaliating, in the Resolve dados de ataque step, you can ignore the damage inflicted on it from one éxito normal.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, CONFIDANT

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is activated, if you have not used the Second in Command rule during the battle, you can select one other ready friendly DEATH KORPS operativo visible to and within 6" of it.
When this operativo is expended, activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates (if that operativo is a TROOPER, ignore its Group activación rule).

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** and **SUPPORT**
 A friendly DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER operativo can issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER.
 Whenever it does, select one GUARDSMAN ORDER for all friendly DEATH KORPS operativos within 6" of it to receive.
 Whenever a operativo amigo receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, apply its rules until the end of the punto de inflexión.
 operativos cannot benefit from more than one GUARDSMAN ORDER at once; they only benefit from the most recent order they received during the punto de inflexión.
 
 - **Take Aim!**  

 Ranged weapons of operativos that received this order (excluding mortar barrage and remote detonator) have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
 - **Fix Bayonets!**  

 Melee weapons of operativos that received this order have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
 - **Dig In!**  

 Whenever Un operativo is shooting a operativo amigo that has received this order, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
 - **Move! Move! Move!**  

 Whenever Un operativo that's received this order is performing the Reposicionar action, add 1" to its Move stat.

If a friendly WATCHMASTER operativo is incapacitado and removed from the zona de combate, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of the battle, this operativo can issue a GUARDSMAN ORDER as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT (even though it is not a WATCHMASTER operativo).

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, GUNNER
DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, MEDIC

abilities.description:
The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly DEATH KORPS operativo would be incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining, and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of that action.After that action, that operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control. Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends.  
 You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado, or if it is a Disparar action and this operativo would be a primary or secondary target.

Select one friendly DEATH KORPS operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SAPPER

abilities.description: This operativo is carrying your Mine marker. It can perform the Recoger Marcador action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Colocar Marcador action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Carrera action.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SNIPER
DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SPOTTER

abilities.description:
**SUPPORT**
Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of the punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly HUNTER CLADE operativo within 3" of this operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo, you can use this effect. If you do:

- That operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TROOPER

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly DEATH KORPS TROOPER operativo (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operativos in succession with this rule).

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VETERAN

abilities.description: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on this operativo.
Whenever this operativo is activated, it can receive one GUARDSMAN ORDER.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VOX-OPERATOR

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when this operativo receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, if it's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, it can relay that order.
Whenever an order is relayed, all friendly DEATH KORPS operativos in the zona de combate receive that order, then subtract 1 from this operativo's APL stat until the end of its next activación.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly DEATH KORPS operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: DEATH KORPS, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, ZEALOT

abilities.description: Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa.

**SUPPORT**
Whenever a friendly DEATH KORPS operativo is within 3" of this operativo, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.

ploys.description:
Friendly DEATH KORPS operativos' melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Whenever a friendly DEATH KORPS operativo is fighting wholly within your territory, or whenever it's retaliating, its melee weapons also have the Severe weapon rule.  
 **Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.  
 **Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. The Devastating and Piercing Crits weapon rules still take effect, but Punishing and Rending don't.

**SUPPORT**
Select one friendly DEATH KORPS operativo that is more than 3" from operativos enemigos.
Each other friendly DEATH KORPS operativo within 5" of that operativo and not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice,
but each that does so must end that move closer to that operativo.
Note that a Comms Device from universal equipment only affects the second distance of this rule.  

You cannot use this ploy and the Chronometer faction equipment STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the same punto de inflexión.

Friendly DEATH KORPS operativos' ranged weapons have the Saturate and Accurate 1 weapon rules.  
**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain salvaciones de cobertura.  
**Accurate x:** You can retain up to x dados de ataque as éxitos normales without rolling them.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly DEATH KORPS operativo, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, improve that operativo amigo's Save stat by 1.

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dados de ataque for a friendly DEATH KORPS operativo, if it is shooting an operativo enemigo that has been shot by another friendly DEATH KORPS operativo during this punto de inflexión. You can re-roll any of your dados de ataque.

Use this firefight ploy when a ready friendly DEATH KORPS operativo is incapacitado, if it is not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos. Before it is removed from the zona de combate, it can immediately perform one free action. Unless otherwise specified, the operativo would be injured for this. Note that that operativo amigo is injured for the duration of that action.

**SUPPORT**
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER or DEATH KORPS CONFIDANT operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action.
It issues a GUARDSMAN ORDER.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly DEATH KORPS operativo is activated and given an Engage order.
It receives every GUARDSMAN ORDER. This takes precedence over the normal rule that operativos cannot benefit from more than one GUARDSMAN ORDER at once.

equipments.description:
Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first or second punto de inflexión.
Each friendly DEATH KORPS operativo wholly within your territory can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice, but each that does so must end that move closer to an opponent's drop zone or zona de combate edge.  

You cannot use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT and the Regroup strategy ploy during the same punto de inflexión.

Whenever a friendly DEATH KORPS WATCHMASTER or friendly DEATH KORPS CONFIDANT operativo issues a GUARDSMAN ORDER, you can use this rule.
If you do, instead of each friendly DEATH KORPS operativo within 6" of it receiving that order, you can select one friendly DEATH KORPS operativo to receive that order.

Friendly DEATH KORPS operativos have the following melee weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Hand Axe|3|4+|3/4|

Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Place your Gas marker in the zona de combate; it cannot be placed underneath Vantage terrain.
Whenever Un operativo is within 3" of that marker, subtract 1 from its APL stat. In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.
Note that Un operativo's APL stat is only changed while it is within 3" of that marker. If it moves more than 3" from that marker, its APL stat is no longer changed by this rule.

description:
Deathwatch kill teams combat the xenos foes of the Imperium with adaptive expertise and specialist weaponry.  

They wield some of Humanity's most highly advanced weapons alongside more esoteric equipment. Besides their superhuman strength and speed, the Deathwatch bring to the battlefield their hatred of the xenos in all its forms.
composition:
A DEATHWATCH Killteam is composed of 5 DEATHWATCH operativos selected from the following list:
- WATCH SERGEANT
- AEGIS
- BLADEMASTER
- BOMBARD
- BREACHER
- DEMOLISHER
- DISRUPTOR
- GUNNER
- HEADTAKER
- HORDE-SLAYER
- MARKSMAN

Your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once, and can only include up to one GRAVIS operativo.

opTypes.keywords: DEATHWATCH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, LEADER, WATCH SERGEANT

abilities.description: You can select one additional equipment option.

You can do each of the following once per battle if this operativo is in the zona de combate:
- Use a DEATHWATCH strategy ploy for 0CP.
- Use a DEATHWATCH firefight ploy for 0CP.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo is performing the Disparar action, in the Select Weapon step, you can use this rule. If you do, select one of the following weapon rules for that operativo's ranged weapons to have until the end of the action.
This rule cannot be used with explosive grenades (see universal equipment) or melta bombs.

- Blast 1" (you cannot select this if the weapon profile being used has the Torrent weapon rule)
- Devastating 1
- Lethal 5+
- Piercing 1
- Rending
- Saturate
- Severe

During each friendly DEATHWATCH operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions. If it's two Disparar actions and an auxiliary grenade launcher, frag cannon, heavy plasma incinerator, infernus heavy bolter, plasma pistol or stalker bolt rifle is selected for both, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action.

Each friendly DEATHWATCH operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order. Whenever it does, it can perform an additional 1AP action for free during that contrataque, but both actions must be different.

opTypes.keywords: DEATHWATCH, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, AEGIS

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating with this weapon, each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo is performing the Disparar action, in the Select Weapon step, you can use this rule. If you do, select one of the following weapon rules for that operativo's ranged weapons to have until the end of the action.
This rule cannot be used with explosive grenades (see universal equipment) or melta bombs.

- Blast 1" (you cannot select this if the weapon profile being used has the Torrent weapon rule)
- Devastating 1

- Severe

abilities.description:
STRATEGIC GAMBIT.
Select one operativo enemigo visible to or within 6" of this operativo, then roll one D6. In the following Firefight phase, that operativo enemigo cannot be activated or perform actions until one of the following is true:
- Your opponent has activated a number of operativos enemigos equal to the result of the D6.
- It's the last operativo enemigo to be activated.

The Advanced Auspex Scan firefight ploy costs you 0CP when both of the following are true:
- This operativo isn't dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.
- The target of that Disparar action (primary target, if relevant) is visible to this operativo.

Note that it doesn't have to be this operativo performing the Disparar action.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo is performing the Disparar action, in the Select Weapon step, you can use this rule. If you do, select one of the following weapon rules for that operativo's ranged weapons to have until the end of the action.

During each friendly DEATHWATCH operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions. If it's two Disparar actions and an auxiliary grenade launcher, frag cannon, heavy plasma incinerator, infernus heavy bolter, plasma pistol or stalker bolt rifle is selected for both, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action.

Each friendly DEATHWATCH operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order. Whenever it does, it can perform an additional 1AP action for free during that contrataque, but both actions must be different.

Whenever this operativo is fighting against Un operativo it wasn't visible to at the start of the activación/contrataque, the first time you strike during that sequence, you can immediately resolve another of your successes as a strike (before your opponent).

Whenever this operativo is climbing, treat the vertical distance as 2" (regardless of how far the operativo actually moves vertically). Whenever this operativo is dropping, ignore the vertical distance.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo is performing the Disparar action, in the Select Weapon step, you can use this rule. If you do, select one of the following weapon rules for that operativo's ranged weapons to have until the end of the action.
This rule cannot be used with explosive grenades (see universal equipment) or melta bombs.

- Blast 1" (you cannot select this if the weapon profile being used has the Torrent weapon rule)

ploys.description: Select Conceal or Engage. Whenever a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo is shooting against or fighting against an operativo enemigo that has that order, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo that's within your territory, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
Whenever a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo is within your opponent's territory, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

ploys.ployName: And They Shall Know No Fear
ploys.description: You can ignore any changes to the stats of friendly DEATHWATCH operativos from being injured (including their weapons' stats).

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dados de ataque for a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo, if it's shooting against or fighting against Un operativo that doesn't have the CHAOS or IMPERIUM keyword. You can re-roll any of your dados de ataque.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo is counteracting, before it performs any actions. You can change its order.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo performs the Disparar action. Until the end of the activación/contrataque, its ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule and operativos enemigos cannot be obscured.
Use this firefight ploy when Un operativo is shooting a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo, in the Roll dados de defensa step. You can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.

Once per punto de inflexión, during a friendly DEATHWATCH operativo's activación, you can use this rule. If you do, during that activación, that operativo can perform a mission action for 1 less AP.
Having an operativo enemigo within its alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo amigo from performing that mission action.
However, in such an instance, after it does so, you and your opponent roll-off. If your opponent wins, you cannot use this equipment for the rest of the battle.

Once during each friendly DEATHWATCH operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action, if it's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you can use this rule. If you do, select one of the following:
- That operativo amigo regains up to D3 lost wounds.
- Remove any changes to that operativo amigo's APL stat.
- Remove one of the following tokens that operativo amigo has (before that token's activación effects are resolved, if relevant): Neutron Fragment, Poison, Terrorchem.

Once per battle, you can use the Special Issue Ammunition faction rule for up to two Disparar actions during one punto de inflexión, but you must select different weapon rules for both uses. This takes precedence over the normal Special Issue Ammunition rules.

description: Elucia Vhane is a scion of a noble mercantile dynasty. Leaving behind her family's operations in the galactic north, Vhane led her Elucidian Starstriders to the Eastern Fringe. Alongside her esoteric crew, the bold Rogue Trader seeks to eclipse the rich history of her ancestors with her own rise to glory - or die trying.
composition:
Note that you do not select your operativos from a list.
This kill team's operativos are specified.

An ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDERS killteam is composed of every ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo in the following list:

- 1 ELUCIA VHANE
- 1 CANID
- 1 DEATH CULT EXECUTIONER
- 1 LECTRO-MAESTER
- 1 REJUVENAT ADEPT
- 1 VOIDMASTER
- 3 VOIDSMAN with lasgun and gun butt
- 1 VOIDSMAN with rotor cannon and gun butt

abilities.description: Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule.
Whenever this operativo performs the Combatir action, at the start of the Roll dados de ataque step, you can use this rule. If you do, inflict 1 damage on the operativo enemigo in that sequence.

Whenever this operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that was already wounded when the action started, this operativo's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule; if the weapon already has that weapon rule, it has the Ceaseless weapon rule instead of Balanced.

Once per firefight phase, when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS or ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER ELUCIA VHANE operativo performs the Disparar action, you can select one of the following PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET ranged weapons for it to use. You cannot use each PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET more than once per battle.  
 
Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo is using a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET, determine salvaciones de cobertura differently. Instead, the target has a cover save if any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain. Note that while this can affect the target's cover save, you must still select a valid target as normal. In other words, the shot is guided by Un operativo in the zona de combate, but it comes from above.

The first time this operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo during the battle, you can either gain 1 additional CP or use an additional WARRANT OF TRADE rule
(up to four uses per battle, instead of three). Note that you still cannot use the same WARRANT OF TRADE rule more than once per battle.

Up to three times per battle, you can use a WARRANT OF TRADE rule (below). Each one specifies when it can be used, and you cannot use the same WARRANT OF TRADE rule more than once per battle.  
  

**Consideration**
- When: In the Select operativos step, after revealing your equipment options.
- Effect: Select one additional equipment option. It cannot be an option you have previously selected.
  

**Coordinate**  

- When: At the end of the Select operativos step.
Effect: You gain 1 additional CP.
  

**Coerce**
- When: At the start of the Set Up operativos step.
- Effect: Select one of the following options:

- Your opponent must set up all of their equipment before you set up any.
- You can set up all of your equipment before your opponent sets up any.
- Your opponent must set up all of their operativos before you set up any.

  


**Explore**  

- When: STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión.
- Effect: Perform a free Reposicionar action with one friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo that's wholly within your drop zone. It must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.
  


**Bribe**  

- When: It's your turn to activate Un operativo.
- Effect: You can skip that activación.
  


**Seize**  

- When: In the Strategy phase, after rolling off to decide initiative.
- Effect: You can re-roll your dice.
  


**Adaptable Terms (Approved Ops only)**  

- When: At the end of the second punto de inflexión.
- Effect: Select a new tac op or a new primary op. If you select a new tac op, any points scored from the previous tac op are discarded.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo is shooting Un operativo within 6" of it, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons (excluding PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET weapons) have the Balanced weapon rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo performs the Reposicionar action during its activación, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1" to its Move stat until the end of that activación, but it must end that move closer to your opponent's drop zone and cannot use a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET during that activación.

Place your Claim marker in the zona de combate. Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that's within 3" of that marker, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule. In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.

The first time an dados de ataque inflicts damage on each friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo during the punto de inflexión in the Resolve dados de ataque step, you can halve that inflicted damage (rounding up, to a minimum of 2).

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dados de ataque for a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo, if it's shooting an operativo enemigo that's been shot by another friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo during this punto de inflexión. You can re-roll any of your dados de ataque. You cannot use this ploy while shooting with a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET.
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS operativo's activación. Until the end of the activación, add 1 to its APL stat.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo is activated that's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos. That operativo amigo regains up to D3+2 lost wounds. You cannot use this ploy for each operativo amigo more than once per battle.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS operativo is activated. Select one other ready friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS operativo visible to and within 3" of that operativo.
When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates.
When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

equipments.description: Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo that has a 5+ Save stat (excluding CANID), you can retain one of your dados de defensa results of 4 as a éxito normal.

Up to twice per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a laspistol or lasgun, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of the punto de inflexión, add 1 to both Dmg stats of that weapon and it has the Hot and Piercing Crits 1 weapon rules. Note that relic laspistols are excluded from this rule.

Whenever a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER operativo is using a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET, if the target is within 6" of a friendly ELUCIDIAN STARSTRIDER NAVIS operativo, the target cannot be obscured and that weapon has the Saturate weapon rule.
Once per battle, when selecting a PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET, you can select one that has already been used during the battle. This takes precedence over the normal PRIVATEER SUPPORT ASSET rules.

description:
It is the responsibility of the Adeptus Arbites to enforce Imperial law. Exaction Squads are formed from the most
highly skilled and experienced Arbitrators. They are tasked with hunting down and securing the most heinous of
criminals, returning them alive to face the full extent of the Emperor's justice.
composition:
An EXACTION SQUAD KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 EXACTION SQUAD PROCTOR-EXACTANT operativo with one of the following options:
  - Combat shotgun; repression baton
  - Shotpistol; dominator maul & assault shield
- 10 EXACTION SQUAD operativos selected from the following list:
  - CASTIGATOR
  - CHIRURGANT
  - LEASHMASTER
  - R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF
  - MALOCATOR
  - MARKSMAN
  - REVELATUM
  - SUBDUCTOR
  - VIGILANT
  - VOX-SIGNIFIER
  - GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Grenade launcher; repression baton
    - Heavy stubber; repression baton
    - Webber; repression baton
        

  

Other than GUNNER, SUBDUCTOR and VIGILANT operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to two GUNNER operativos (each must have a different option) and up to four SUBDUCTOR operativos.

opTypes.keywords: EXACTION SQUAD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, LEADER, ARBITES, PROCTOR-EXACTANT

abilities.description: If this operativo has a dominator maul & assault shield, it has a 3+ Save stat.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select one operativo enemigo to be your mark for the punto de inflexión.
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against your mark, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.
Whenever your mark is incapacitado, you can select a new operativo enemigo to be your mark for the punto de inflexión (and can continue to do so during this punto de inflexión).

- Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 3" of your Nuncio-aquila marker (or this operativo if your Nuncio-aquila marker isn't in the zona de combate), your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that operativo enemigo to perform the Recoger Marcador and mission actions.
- Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of operativos enemigos that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those operativos enemigos is within 3" of your Nuncio-aquila marker
(or this operativo if your Nuncio-aquila marker isn't in the zona de combate). Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

If your Nuncio-aquila marker isn't in the zona de combate, place it within 6" horizontally of this operativo; otherwise, move your Nuncio-aquila marker up to 6" horizontally.
If this operativo is removed from the zona de combate, remove your Nuncio-aquila marker from the zona de combate.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: EXACTION SQUAD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, CASTIGATOR

abilities.description: Whenever an operativo enemigo is dentro del alcance de control of this operativo, if no other operativos enemigos are within this operativo's alcance de control, that operativo enemigo cannot perform the Retirada action.
You can ignore any changes to this operativo's stats (including its weapons' stats, but excluding its Save stat).

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select one operativo enemigo to be your mark for the punto de inflexión.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is fighting or retaliating, if it hasn't moved more than its Move stat during the activación, or if it's a contrataque, its melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Whenever you're selecting a valid target for a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo, operativos enemigos within 4" of it cannot be in cover (instead of 2").
While this can allow such operativos to be targeted (assuming they're visible), it does not remove their cover save (if any), unless the friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is within 2" as normal.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo that's within 2" of an objective marker or an operativo enemigo, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo within 6" of it, or whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD GUNNER operativo is shooting, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action.
Select one operativo enemigo within its alcance de control. One other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo can immediately perform a free Combatir action, but it can only Combatir against that operativo enemigo.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo performs a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch). Alternatively, use it at the end of the Firefight phase and select one operativo enemigo that controls an objective marker.  
 In either case, the next time your opponent would activate that operativo enemigo, you can interrupt that activación and activate a ready friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo. If you do, during that activación, that operativo amigo must Combatir against or Disparar against that operativo enemigo, and cannot do so against any other operativos enemigos until it does (if this isn't possible, that operativo amigo's activación is cancelled).  
 After completing that operativo amigo's activación, continue that operativo enemigo's activación (if possible). You cannot use this firefight ploy again until that operativo enemigo is activated or incapacitado.

Use this firefight ploy after an operativo enemigo shoots against or fights against a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo within 6" of it, and that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado as a result.
That operativo amigo can immediately perform either a free Disparar or a free Combatir action, but other operativos enemigos cannot be selected as a valid target or to Combatir against during that action
(note that secondary targets from the Blast weapon rule can still be targeted).

ploys.ployName: Long Arm Of The Emperor's Law
ploys.description: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a weapon with the Range x weapon rule (excluding frag or krak grenade). Until the end of that action, add 3" to x.

equipments.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo would perform the Retirada action while dentro del alcance de control of a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo, if no other operativos enemigos are within that operativo amigo's alcance de control,
you can use this rule.
If you do, roll two D6, or one D6 if that operativo enemigo has a higher Wounds stat than that operativo amigo.
If any result is a 4+, that operativo enemigo cannot perform that action during that activación or contrataque (no AP are spent on it).

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo within 2" of it, your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque results of 1.

Up to twice per punto de inflexión, when a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a combat shotgun, executioner shotgun, scoped shotpistol or shotpistol, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one of the following weapon rules for that weapon to have until the end of that action:

- Saturate.
- Piercing 1, but only if the target has a Save stat of 3+ or better.
- Torrent 1", but you cannot select more than one secondary target.
You can ignore any changes to the APL stats of friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos, and they aren't affected by operativos enemigos' Shock weapon rule.

description: Farstalker Kinbands operate as scouts for the Kroot species. They range far and wide throughout the galaxy, seeking new and valuable genetic material to return to their Shapers. Farstalker Kinbands contain expert trackers, hunters and guerrilla fighters who are capable of matching far more technologically advanced foes.
composition:
A FARSTALKER KINBAND killteam is composed of:

- 1 FARSTALKER KINBAND KILL-BROKER operativo with one of the following options:
  - Kroot rifle; ritual blade
  - Pulse weapon; ritual blade
- 11 FARSTALKER KINBAND operativos selected from the following list:
  - BOW-HUNTER
  - COLD-BLOOD
  - CUT-SKIN
  - HOUND
  - LONG-SIGHT
  - PISTOLIER
  - STALKER
  - TRACKER
  - HEAVY GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Dvorgite skinner; blade
    - Londaxi tribalest; blade    
  - WARRIOR with one of the following options:
    - Kroot rifle; blade
    - Kroot scattergun; blade
        
Other than HOUND and WARRIOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to two HOUND operativos.

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, LEADER, KROOT, KILL-BROKER

abilities.description: **STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select one operativo enemigo to be your mark for the punto de inflexión. Whenever a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against your mark, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule. Whenever your mark is incapacitado, you can select a new operativo enemigo to be your mark for the punto de inflexión (and can continue to do so during this punto de inflexión).

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativos that are not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contraatacar, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo that's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activación alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that operativo amigo's contrataque for this punto de inflexión.

Whenever your mark is incapacitado, you can select one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo within 6" of this operativo. Until the end of the battle, that operativo's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule. Each operativo amigo can only be selected for this rule once per battle.
