In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativos that are not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contraatacar, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo that's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activación alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that operativo amigo's contrataque for this punto de inflexión.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Remove your Pech'ra marker from the zona de combate (if any). Then place your Pech'ra marker visible to this operativo, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that's visible to this operativo.
Whenever a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo that has that marker within its alcance de control, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.  

At the start of this operativo's next activación or if it's removed from the zona de combate (whichever comes first), remove your Pech'ra marker from the zona de combate.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: FARSTALKER KINBAND, T'AU EMPIRE, KROOT, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can change the order of up to three friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativos that are not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.  

Whenever it's your turn to Contraatacar, you can change the order of one friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo that's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos instead.
This still counts as you counteracting (so activación alternates back to your opponent afterwards), but doesn't count as that operativo amigo's contrataque for this punto de inflexión.

Once per punto de inflexión, during a friendly WARRIOR operativo's activación, you can use the Meat, Piercing Shot or Toxin Shot rule (see faction equipment) for that operativo. Doing so doesn't count for its once per punto de inflexión limit.

ploys.description: During each friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo's activación, you can ignore the first vertical distance of 2" they move during one climb up.
Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativos' melee weapons (to a maximum of 5).

Whenever a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo is shooting during an activación in which it hasn't performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action, its ranged weapons have the Balanced and Severe weapon rules; if the weapon already has the Balanced weapon rule, it has the Ceaseless and Severe weapon rules instead. Note that operativo isn't restricted from performing those actions after shooting.  
**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead. This isn't cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.
  
**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain salvaciones de cobertura.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo's activación. Until the end of that activación, that operativo doesn't have to control a marker to perform the Recoger Marcador or mission actions that usually require this (taking precedence over that action's conditions - it only needs to contest the marker).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action. During that activación, that operativo can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.

Use this firefight ploy during the Combatir action when a ready friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo that has Light or Heavy terrain within its alcance de control is selected to Combatir against.
In the Resolve dados de ataque step of that sequence, you resolve the first dados de ataque (i.e. defender instead of attacker).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo is incapacitado by an operativo enemigo.
Until the end of the battle, whenever another friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against that operativo enemigo, that other operativo amigo's weapons have the Relentless weapon rule.
You cannot use this ploy again during the battle until that operativo enemigo is incapacitado.  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dados de ataque.

equipments.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a Kroot rifle, Kroot scattergun or dual Kroot pistols (focused), you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Piercing 1 weapon rule.  
You cannot use the Piercing Shot and Toxin Shot rules during the same action.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a Kroot rifle, Kroot scattergun or dual Kroot pistols (focused), you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Lethal 5+ and Stun weapon rules.  
You cannot use the Piercing Shot and Toxin Shot rules during the same action.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo (excluding HOUND) is activated, if it's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you can use this rule. If you do, that operativo amigo regains D3+1 lost wounds.

Once per battle, during a friendly FARSTALKER KINBAND operativo's activación (excluding HOUND), before or after it performs an action, if it's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1 to that operativo amigo's APL stat until the end of its activación.

description:
Of all the mutant Beastmen in thrall to the Dark Gods, Fellgor Ravagers believe themselves the greatest and most powerful.
They stalk space hulks, underhives and warp-tainted ruins, using their keen senses to track unsuspecting prey through the darkness before striking and butchering their foes with savage glee.
composition:
A FELLGOR RAVAGERS KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 FELLGOR RAVAGER IRONHORN operativo with one of the following options:
  - Corrupted pistol; corrupted chainsword
  - Plasma pistol; bludgeon
- 9 FELLGOR RAVAGER operativos selected from the following list:
  - DEATHKNELL
  - FLUXBRAY
  - GNARLSCAR
  - GOREHORN
  - HERD-GOAD
  - MANGLER
  - SHAMAN
  - TOXHORN
  - VANDAL
  - WARRIOR with one of the following options:
    - Autopistol; bludgeon
    - Autopistol; cleaver

Other than WARRIOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, CHAOS, LEADER, IRONHORN

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** if this operativo doesn't have one of your Frenzy tokens. Select one friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo.
That selected operativo, and each other friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo visible to and within 2" of it, can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice.

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo that does not have one of your Frenzy tokens would be incapacitado during the battle, it is not incapacitado and it gains one of your Frenzy tokens.
All remaining dados de ataque are discarded (including yours if this operativo is fighting or retaliating).
If it has a Conceal order, change it to Engage.  

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo has one of your Frenzy tokens:

- It's only incapacitado as detailed below.
- It cannot have a Conceal order.
- It's injured.
- It cannot perform the Recoger Marcador, unique (excluding Sweeping Blow, see VANDAL) or mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).
- For the purpose of determining control of markers, treat its APL stat as 1. This takes precedence over any stat changes.


A friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo that has one of your Frenzy tokens is incapacitado when one of the following is met:

- Its activación or contrataque ends.
- An operativo enemigo is fighting against or retaliating against it and your opponent strikes with a éxito crítico.
- An operativo enemigo is fighting against or retaliating against it and your opponent strikes it for a second time with a éxito normal. Note this can be strikes from two different Combatir actions.
- An operativo enemigo is shooting it and Critical Dmg is inflicted on it.
- The battle ends (resolve this before any victory conditions that resolve at the end of the battle).


Your opponent treats a FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo as being incapacitado (instead of when it would be incapacitado normally) when it gains one of your Frenzy
tokens for the purposes of scoring VPs (e.g. kill op) and faction rules that require it to be incapacitado (e.g. HAND OF THE ARCHON Power From Pain, CHAOS CULT Mutation, etc.).

- It cannot have a Conceal order.
- It's injured.
- It cannot perform the Recoger Marcador, unique (excluding Sweeping Blow, see VANDAL) or mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).
- For the purpose of determining control of markers, treat its APL stat as 1. This takes precedence over any stat changes.


A friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo that has one of your Frenzy tokens is incapacitado when one of the following is met:

- Its activación or contrataque ends.
- An operativo enemigo is fighting against or retaliating against it and your opponent strikes with a éxito crítico.
- An operativo enemigo is fighting against or retaliating against it and your opponent strikes it for a second time with a éxito normal. Note this can be strikes from two different Combatir actions.
- An operativo enemigo is shooting it and Critical Dmg is inflicted on it.
- The battle ends (resolve this before any victory conditions that resolve at the end of the battle).


Your opponent treats a FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo as being incapacitado (instead of when it would be incapacitado normally) when it gains one of your Frenzy
tokens for the purposes of scoring VPs (e.g. kill op) and faction rules that require it to be incapacitado (e.g. HAND OF THE ARCHON Power From Pain, CHAOS CULT Mutation, etc.).

Inflict D3+1 damage on each other operativo visible to and within 2" of this operativo.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order.

opTypes.keywords: FELLGOR RAVAGER, CHAOS, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo that does not have one of your Frenzy tokens would be incapacitado during the battle, it is not incapacitado and it gains one of your Frenzy tokens.
All remaining dados de ataque are discarded (including yours if this operativo is fighting or retaliating).
If it has a Conceal order, change it to Engage.  

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo has one of your Frenzy tokens:

- It's only incapacitado as detailed below.
- It cannot have a Conceal order.
- It's injured.
- It cannot perform the Recoger Marcador or mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).
- For the purpose of determining control of markers, treat its APL stat as 1. This takes precedence over any stat changes.


A friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo that has one of your Frenzy tokens is incapacitado when one of the following is met:

- Its activación or contrataque ends.
- An operativo enemigo is fighting against or retaliating against it and your opponent strikes with a éxito crítico.
- An operativo enemigo is fighting against or retaliating against it and your opponent strikes it for a second time with a éxito normal. Note this can be strikes from two different Combatir actions.
- An operativo enemigo is shooting it and Critical Dmg is inflicted on it.
- The battle ends (resolve this before any victory conditions that resolve at the end of the battle).


Your opponent treats a FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo as being incapacitado (instead of when it would be incapacitado normally) when it gains one of your Frenzy
tokens for the purposes of scoring VPs (e.g. kill op) and faction rules that require it to be incapacitado (e.g. HAND OF THE ARCHON Power From Pain, CHAOS CULT Mutation, etc.).
Whenever this operativo has one of your Frenzy tokens, it cannot be injured. This takes precedence over the normal Frenzy rules.

ploys.description: Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo is activated, if its order is changed from Conceal to Engage, it's ambushing for that activación. Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo that's ambushing is fighting, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead. Note that Un operativo that has one of your Frenzy tokens cannot ambush.

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo that's been shot by another friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo during this punto de inflexión, that first operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the
Ceaseless weapon rule; if the operativo enemigo has been shot by more than one other friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo during this punto de inflexión, that first operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Relentless weapon rule instead.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dados de ataque.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting an expended friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo, if you cannot retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one of your dados de defensa as a éxito normal without rolling it.

Whenever a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo is fighting or retaliating, after rolling your dados de ataque, you can use this rule. If you do, you must re-roll all of your dados de ataque (you cannot only re-roll some).
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo is fighting or retaliating and you strike with a éxito crítico. Inflict 1 additional damage with that strike.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo's activación, when it incapacitates an operativo enemigo within its alcance de control. Select one other ready
friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo that's visible to and within 3" of the incapacitado operativo enemigo. When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that
other operativo amigo before your opponent activates. When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Use this firefight ploy after a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo performs the Combatir action, if it's no longer dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos. That operativo amigo can
immediately perform a free Carga action (even if it's already performed the Carga action during that activación), but cannot move more than 3" during that action.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo is activated. Until the end of that operativo's activación, add 1" to its Move stat.

equipments.description: Once per battle, you can use the Animalistic Fury and Wild Rage firefight ploys for 0CP each.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo is fighting or retaliating, you can use this rule.
If you do, inflict 1 damage on that operativo amigo and re-roll one of your dados de ataque. If the result is a fail, inflict 1 additional damage on that operativo amigo.

Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativo, at the start of the Roll dados de defensa step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.
You can ignore any changes to the Move stat of friendly FELLGOR RAVAGER operativos from being injured.

description:
Corrupted by a gruesome techno-organic affliction, the Gellerpox Infected are nightmarish meldings of flesh,
machinery and rampant disease. Most of these hideous beings began as loyal servants of the God-Emperor. Those
origins are long gone, however, wiped away by supernatural sickness and a compulsion to spread their infection
across the stars.
composition:
Note that other than MUTOID VERMIN, you do not select your operativos from a list.  

This kill team's operativos are specified.  

A GELLERPOX INFECTED killteam is composed of every GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo in the following list:

- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED
- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED BLOATSPAWN
- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED FLESHSCREAMER
- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED LUMBERGHAST
- 4 GELLERPOX INFECTED GLITCHLING
- 1 GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTANT with frag grenade and heavy axe
- 2 GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTANT with frag grenade and improvised weapon

If you selected the Mutoid Vermin faction equipment:  

Specified number of GELLERPOX INFECTED operativos selected from the following list:

- CURSEMITE
- EYESTINGER SWARM
- SLUDGE-GRUB

opTypes.keywords: GELLERPOX INFECTED, CHAOS, NIGHTMARE HULK, LEADER, VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED

abilities.description:
Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK operativos cannot use Light terrain for cover.
While this can allow such operativos to be targeted (assuming they're visible), it doesn't remove their cover save (if any).  

Friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK operativos cannot perform unique actions.
You must spend 1 additional AP for friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK operativos (excluding VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED) to perform the Recoger Marcador and mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).

Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK or GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTANT operativo, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one objective marker this operativo controls to gain one of your Techno-curse tokens.
It cannot be an objective marker dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
Whenever that objective marker is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, that operativo is affected by your selected TECHNO-CURSE rule and an additional rule determined by your TECHNO-CURSE, as shown below.
You cannot use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT while this operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

- Barrelwarp: No additional effect.
- Screaming Rustspikes: This TECHNO-CURSE inflicts 2 damage on that operativo enemigo (instead of 1).
- Viral Vox-static: Whenever that operativo enemigo is activated, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of its activación.

At the end of the Select operativos step, select one TECHNO-CURSE for friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativos to gain for the battle.
 Whenever an operativo enemigo is within your selected TECHNo_CURSE's infection range,
 that operativo enemigo is affected by the symptom of the selected TECHNO-CURSE. Each TECHNO-CURSE, its infection range, and its symptom is listed below:  

 Each TECHNO-CURSE is listed below:
 
 - 
 		**Barrelwarp**  

        Infection Range: Within 2" of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo (excluding MUTOID VERMIN), or within 3" of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED GLITCHLING operativo.   

        Symptom: Subtract 1 from the Atk stat of that operativo enemigo's ranged weapons.
 	
     - 
 		**Screaming Rustspikes**
		Infection Range: dentro del alcance de control of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo (excluding MUTOID VERMIN).  

		Symptom: Whenever that operativo enemigo is fighting or retaliating against a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo, if your opponent discards any dados de ataque as a fail, inflict 1 damage on that operativo enemigo.
 	
     - 
 		**Viral Vox-static**
		Infection Range: Within 3" of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo (excluding MUTOID VERMIN), or within 4" of a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED GLITCHLING operativo.  

		Symptom: That operativo enemigo's APL stat cannot be added to (remove all positive APL stat changes it has).

Subtract 1 from the Atk stat of that operativo enemigo's ranged weapons.

**Techno-Curse**  

Whenever that operativo enemigo is fighting or retaliating against a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo, if your opponent discards any dados de ataque as a fail, inflict 1 damage on that operativo enemigo.

**Techno-Curse**  

That operativo enemigo's APL stat cannot be added to (remove all positive APL stat changes it has).

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTOID VERMIN operativo (if able) before your opponent activates. When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operativos in succession with this rule).

MUTOID VERMIN operativos cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Carrera, Retirada, Combatir, Reposicionar and Disparar, or use any weapons that aren't on their datacard.
They can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.  

MUTOID VERMIN operativos cannot contest markers or areas of the zona de combate, and are ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when they are incapacitado, and when determining your starting number of operativos).
They are also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require operativos to 'escape', 'survive' or be incapacitado by operativos enemigos (if they escape/survive/are incapacitado, determining how many operativos must escape/survive/be incapacitado, etc.).  

operativos can move through MUTOID VERMIN operativos, and operativos enemigos can move dentro del alcance de control of them.
Having only MUTOID VERMIN operativos within their alcance de control does not prevent operativos enemigos from performing the Carga, Carrera and Reposicionar action, and operativos enemigos can leave MUTOID VERMIN operativos' alcance de control when performing the Carga action.

**Techno-Curse**  

Whenever that operativo enemigo is fighting or retaliating against a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo, if your opponent discards any dados de ataque as a fail, inflict 1 damage on that operativo enemigo.

**Techno-Curse**  

That operativo enemigo's APL stat cannot be added to (remove all positive APL stat changes it has).

opTypes.keywords: GELLERPOX INFECTED, CHAOS, MUTOID VERMIN, FLY, EYESTINGER SWARM

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTOID VERMIN operativo (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operativos in succession with this rule).

MUTOID VERMIN operativos cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Carrera, Retirada, Combatir, Reposicionar and Disparar, or use any weapons that aren't on their datacard.
They can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.  

MUTOID VERMIN operativos cannot contest markers or areas of the zona de combate, and are ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when they are incapacitado, and when determining your starting number of operativos).
They are also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require operativos to 'escape', 'survive' or be incapacitado by operativos enemigos (if they escape/survive/are incapacitado, determining how many operativos must escape/survive/be incapacitado, etc.).  

operativos can move through MUTOID VERMIN operativos, and operativos enemigos can move dentro del alcance de control of them.
Having only MUTOID VERMIN operativos within their alcance de control does not prevent operativos enemigos from performing the Carga, Carrera and Reposicionar action, and operativos enemigos can leave MUTOID VERMIN operativos' alcance de control when performing the Carga action.

**Techno-Curse**

**Techno-Curse**

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo is fighting or retaliating, you can do one of the following:

- If you roll three or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a éxito normal instead.
- If you roll three or more successes, you can discard one of your fails to retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.

Select one objective marker. Whenever a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo performs the Reposicionar or Carga action during its activación, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1" to its Move stat until the end of that activación, but it must end that move within 2" of that objective marker.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo (excluding MUTOID VERMIN) that has an Engage order, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
Whenever a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK operativo is fighting, your opponent cannot retain results of 3 as successes.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK operativo's activación or contrataque, before or after it performs an action.
During that activación/contrataque:

- It can move through operativos enemigos and dentro del alcance de control of them.
- It can perform the Carga and Reposicionar actions while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, and can leave that operativo's alcance de control to do so (but then normal requirements for that move apply).

Use this firefight ploy after a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK operativo performs the Combatir action, if it is not incapacitado.
It can immediately perform a free Combatir action (you do not have to select the same operativo enemigo to Combatir against). This takes precedence over action restrictions.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo (excluding MUTOID VERMIN) is incapacitado, before it is removed from the zona de combate. Inflict 1 damage (or D3 damage instead if that operativo amigo is a NIGHTMARE HULK) on each operativo enemigo visible to and within 2" of that operativo amigo.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo.
That operativo's ranged weapons have the Hot weapon rule until the end of that sequence; if the weapon already has that weapon rule, when your opponent rolls one D6 for that weapon rule,
you can add or subtract 1 from the result. Note that for the latter you can see the result of your opponent's roll for the Hot weapon rule before deciding to use this ploy.  

**Hot:** After using this weapon, roll 1D6. If the result is less than the weapon's HIT stat, inflict Damage on that operativo equal to the result multiplied by 2. If it is used multiple times in one action (e.g. Blast), roll only 1D6.

equipments.description: After revealing this equipment option, add two GELLERPOX INFECTED MUTOID VERMIN operativos to your kill team for the battle.

After revealing this equipment option, roll 2D6: on a 7+, remove one of your opponent's selected equipment options; otherwise, that player removes one of their own selected equipment options.
They cannot select that equipment again during the game sequence (e.g. in the Scouting step of Approved Ops). You cannot select this equipment option after the Select operativos step.

Once per battle, when you activate a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED operativo, you can select one additional TECHNO-CURSE for that operativo to gain until the end of the punto de inflexión (it must be different from your existing TECHNO-CURSE). Note that if a rule refers to an operativo enemigo being affected by your selected TECHNO-CURSE rule (e.g. VULGRAR THIRCE-CURSED operativo''s Spread The Glorious Gifts rule), it is affected by your additional TECHNO-CURSE rule too.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED NIGHTMARE HULK operativo that's more than 6" from it, you can retain one of your dados de defensa results of 3 as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.

description: Goremongers are among the most lucid and reliable of Khorne's troops, pumping a constant flow of combat stimms mixed with drops of their masters' blood into their systems while still retaining a modicum of cunning and level-headedness. The first thing they do is to cut off their own legs and graft on a new mechanical pair that brings them closer to the ideal physical form, armed with blood letting chainweapons and ritual daggers..
composition:
A GOREMONGER kill team is composed of:

- 1 GOREMONGER BLOOD HERALD
- 7 GOREMONGER operativos selected from the following list:
  - ASPIRANT
  - BLOODTAKER
  - IMPALER
  - INCITER
  - SKULLCLAIMER
  - STALKER

Other than ASPIRANT operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: GOREMONGER, CHAOS, LEADER, BLOOD HERALD

abilities.description:
Each friendly GOREMONGER operativo has a GORE TANK that has three levels: full, half and empty.
They start the battle at half. Whenever a GORE TANK increases, it goes up one level; whenever it decreases, it goes down one level.
A GORE TANK cannot increase when it's already full, or decrease when it's already empty.  

Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER operativo incapacitates Un operativo within its alcance de control, or visible to and within 2" of it, you can increase its GORE TANK.  

Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER operativo uses a SANGUAVITAE rule, you must decrease its GORE TANK.
Once per battle, when an dados de ataque inflicts Normal damage on this operativo, you can ignore that inflicted damage.
Once during each of this operativo's activations, if its GORE TANK is empty, you can increase its GORE TANK.
Each friendly GOREMONGER operativo cannot lose more than 8 wounds per Disparar action.

Each SANGUAVITAE rule specifies when it can be used, and you must decrease the operativo's GORE TANK to do so.  

You cannot use the same SANGUAVITAE rule more than once per activación or contrataque, and you cannot use more than two SANGUAVITAE rules per activación or contrataque.  

You cannot use Mania and Fury during the same activación.  
  

**Rejuvenate:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER operativo's activación or contrataque, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: That operativo regains D3+1 lost wounds.
  

**Mania:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: Until the start of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.
  

**Fury:**  

WHEN: During a friendly GOREMONGER operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action.  

EFFECT: That operativo can perform two Combatir actions during that activación, and the second one is free.
  

**Rake:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER operativo performs the Carga action during its activación.  

EFFECT: When that operativo finishes moving during that action, you can inflict D3 damage on one operativo enemigo within its alcance de control.
  

**Surge:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER operativo performs the Carga or Reposicionar action.  

EFFECT: Until the end of that action, add 1" to that operativo's Move stat.
  

**Rage:**  

WHEN: When a friendly GOREMONGER operativo performs the Combatir action.  

EFFECT: Until the end of that action, add 1 to the Atk stat of that operativo's melee weapons.

Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER operativo's GORE TANK is:

- Half, its melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
- Full, its melee weapons have the Relentless weapon rule.
Whenever a friendly GOREMONGER operativo is fighting or retaliating, the first time your opponent strikes it during that sequence, halve the damage inflicted (rounding up and to a minimum of 2).
Select one friendly GOREMONGER operativo. If it has a Conceal order, change it to Engage. Then it can immediately perform a free Carga action, but cannot move more than 3" during that action.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly GOREMONGER operativo is incapacitado, before it's removed from the zona de combate. Inflict damage determined by that operativo amigo's GORE TANK on one operativo enemigo within that operativo amigo's alcance de control.
  
Inflict:

- D3 if empty.
- D3+1 if half.
- D3+2 if full.

Use this firefight ploy when you would Contraatacar. You can do so with one friendly GOREMONGER operativo that has a Conceal order, but you must change its order to Engage and it cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Disparar or Combatir during that contrataque.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly GOREMONGER operativo with an empty GORE TANK is activated or counteracts. Increase that operativo's GORE TANK.
At the end of that activación/contrataque, decrease its GORE TANK (you cannot use this decrease to use a SANGUAVITAE rule); if you cannot decrease its GORE TANK, inflict D3 damage on it.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly GOREMONGER operativo is fighting during an activación in which it performed the Carga action, at the end of the Roll dados de ataque step.
Until the end of that sequence, that operativo's melee weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

equipments.description:
Before the battle, you can set up one of your Gory Totem markers wholly within your territory and more than 2" from other markers (excluding your Bloody Cadaver marker).
Whenever an operativo enemigo within 3" of your Gory Totem marker is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque.

Before the battle, you can set up one of your Bloody Cadaver markers wholly within your territory and more than 2" from other markers (excluding your Gory Totem marker).
Friendly GOREMONGER operativos can perform the Recoger Marcador action on that marker. In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you can increase the GORE TANK of one friendly GOREMONGER operativo that controls that marker, unless that operativo amigo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly GOREMONGER operativo, at the start of the Roll dados de defensa step, you can use this rule. If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly GOREMONGER operativo performs the Disparar action and you're selecting a ranged weapon, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, the following melee weapons are treated as ranged weapons with the Range 2" weapon rule: chainblade, chainglaive, great chainaxe (ignore its Brutal weapon rule), pickrippers.

description:
The Archons of the Drukhari Kabals are forever plotting to expand their sprawling criminal empires. Should their
schemes require a subtle touch, they may turn to Hand of the Archon kill teams. These bands of assassins, thieves,
torturers and worse wield an array of esoteric and macabre weapons to aid them in their diabolical missions.
composition:
A HAND OF THE ARCHON KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 HAND OF THE ARCHON ARCHSYBARITE operativo with one of the following options:
  - Blast pistol; venom blade
  - Splinter pistol; venom blade
  - Splinter pistol; agoniser
  - Splinter pistol; power weapon
  - Splinter rifle; array of blades
- 8 HAND OF THE ARCHON operativos selected from the following list:
  - AGENT
  - CRIMSON DUELLIST
  - DISCIPLE OF YAELINDRA
  - ELIXICANT
  - FLAYER
  - GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Blaster; array of blades
    - Shredder; array of blades
  - HEAVY GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Dark lance; array of blades
    - Splinter cannon; array of blades
  - SKYSPLINTER ASSASSIN

Other than AGENT operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to two darklight weapons (blast pistol, blaster and dark lance are darklight weapons).

opTypes.keywords: HAND OF THE ARCHON, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, LEADER, ARCHSYBARITE

abilities.description: In the Gambit step of each Strategy phase, if you pass at the first opportunity, you gain 1CP. Ignore each STRATEGIC GAMBIT from the mission pack (if any) when determining this.

After a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo performs an action, it gains one of your Pain tokens if:

- An operativo enemigo was injured during that action, but was not incapacitado.
- An operativo enemigo was incapacitado during that action. If that operativo enemigo had a Wounds stat of 12 or more, that operativo amigo gains two of your Pain tokens instead.

You can spend operativos amigos' Pain tokens on the invigorations below when the "when" condition is met.
You cannot use more than one invigoration per activación or contrataque, except Stimulated Senses, which can be used in addition to other invigorations.  
  

**Dark Animus**

- When: During the operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action.
- Effect: Until the start of the operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.

**Accelerated Rejuvenation**

- When: During the operativo's activación or contrataque, before or after it performs an action.
- Effect: The operativo regains D3+1 lost wounds.

**Vitalised Surge**

- When: After the operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo and that operativo enemigo is removed from the zona de combate.
- Effect: The operativo can immediately perform a free Carrera action, even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing the Carrera action.

**Stimulated Senses**

- When: After rolling your attack or dados de defensa for the operativo.
- Effect: any of your dice results of one result (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo is shooting with a splinter rifle during an activación in which it has not performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action,
that weapon has the Accurate 1 weapon rule. Note that operativo isn't restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. That operativo and each other operativo within 1" of it takes a poison test.  

For Un operativo to take a poison test, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that operativo has a Save stat of 4+ or worse:
on a 3+, inflict D3 damage on that operativo and it gains one of your Poison tokens (if it does not already have one). Whenever Un operativo that has one of your Poison tokens is activated, inflict D3 damage on it.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

abilities.description:
At the end of the Select operativos step, if this operativo is selected for deployment, select one of the following COMBAT DRUG rules for friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativos to have for the battle:

- **Painbringer:** Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on this operativo, roll one D6: on a 6, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.
- **Adrenalight:** STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one operativo amigo that has this COMBAT DRUG to gain one of your Pain tokens.
- **Hypex:** You can ignore any changes to this operativo's Move stat from being injured.

Select one friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo visible to and within 3" of this operativo, then select one of the following for that operativo amigo:

- It regains 2D3 lost wounds.
- Select a different COMBAT DRUG rule for it to have for the battle (this replaces its previous one).

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

abilities.description: If this operativo does not perform the Mark unique action (see right) during its activación, it can perform two Disparar actions during its activación, but a razorwing must be selected for one (and only one) of those actions.

In the Select operativos step, when you're selecting equipment, you can select one operativo enemigo or one other friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo (reveal your selection when you reveal equipment).  

Whenever attack or dados de defensa are rolled for that operativo:

- If it's an operativo enemigo, your opponent must re-roll their dice results of 6.
- If it's a operativo amigo, you can re-roll any of your dice results of 1.

- An operativo enemigo was injured during that action, but was not incapacitado.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of the punto de inflexión, whenever this operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo you can use this effect. If you do:

- This operativo's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

ploys.description:
Friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativos' melee weapons have the Rending weapon rule.  
**Rending:** If you retain any critical hits, retain 1 normal hit as a critical hit instead.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo that's more than 2" from operativos enemigos, if Heavy or Light terrain is intervening,
or any part of that operativo amigo's base is underneath Vantage terrain, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.

Whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo is activated, before you determine its order, you can select one operativo enemigo that operativo amigo isn't a valid target for.
Until the end of that activación, the first time that operativo amigo is shooting against or fighting against that operativo enemigo, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.

Whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo is shooting against or fighting against a wounded operativo enemigo, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action. During that activación, that operativo can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.

Use this firefight ploy after an opponent uses a firefight ploy (excluding one that costs 0CP).
The next time they would use that ploy, they must spend 1 additional CP to do so (at which point this effect ends).
You cannot use this ploy again during the battle until its effect has ended.
Use this firefight ploy when it's your turn to activate a operativo amigo. You can skip that activación.

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dados de ataque for a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo, if it's shooting against or fighting against a wounded operativo enemigo. You can re-roll any of your dados de ataque.

equipments.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo would perform the Retirada action while dentro del alcance de control of a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo, if no other operativos enemigos are within that operativo amigo's alcance de control,
you can use this rule.
If you do, roll two D6, or one D6 if that operativo enemigo has a higher Wounds stat than that operativo amigo.
If any result is a 4+, that operativo enemigo cannot perform that action during that activación or contrataque (no AP are spent on it).
Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativos' array of blades.

Up to twice per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo is fighting or retaliating and you're selecting a melee weapon, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that sequence, that operativo's melee weapon has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.

Up to twice per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly HAND OF THE ARCHON operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a shardcarbine, splinter cannon, splinter pistol, splinter rifle or stinger pistol,
you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, add 1 to the Normal Dmg stat of that weapon.

description:
Highly adept warriors and explorers of wrecked voidships and abandoned space stations, Hearthkyn Salvagers are tasked with identifying valuable material and marking it for later retrieval.
Heavily armed and utterly resolute, Hearthkyn Salvager kill teams seize and defend such claims with the steadfast determination typical of the Kin.
composition:
A HEARTHKYN SALVAGERS KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 HEARTHKYN SALVAGER THEYN operativo with one option from each of the following:
  - Autoch-pattern bolt pistol, Autoch-pattern bolter, bolt revolver, EtaCarn plasma pistol, ion blaster or ion pistol
  - Concussion gauntlet or plasma weapon
- 9 HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativos selected from the following list:
  - DOZR
  - FIELD MEDIC
  - GRENADIER
  - JUMP PACK WARRIOR
  - KINLYNK*
  - KOGNITAAR*
  - LOKATR*
  - LUGGER*
  - WARRIOR*
  - GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - EtaCarn plasma beamer; fists
    - HYLas auto rifle; fists
    - HYLas rotary cannon; fists
    - L7 missile launcher; fists
    - Magna rail rifle; fists

Other than GUNNER and WARRIOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to three GUNNER operativos (each must have a different option).

*With one of the following options:

- Autoch-pattern bolter; fists
- Ion blaster; fists

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, LEADER, THEYN

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select one operativo enemigo, or up to two operativos enemigos if three or more friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativos are incapacitado.
Each of those operativos enemigos gains one of your Grudge tokens.

Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.
Once per battle, when an dados de ataque inflicts Normal Dmg on this operativo, you can ignore that inflicted damage

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, DOZR

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating:

- operativos enemigos cannot assist.
- If it is incapacitado, you can strike the operativo enemigo in that sequence with one of your unresolved successes before it's removed from the zona de combate.
- Normal Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Select one operativo enemigo within this operativo's alcance de control.
You can move that operativo enemigo up to 3" to a location it can be placed.
Then inflict D3+1 damage on it (even if you don't move it); if the D3 result is a 3, also subtract 1 from that operativo enemigo's APL stat until the end of its next activación.
This operativo can then immediately perform a free Carga action (even if it's already performed the Carga action during that activación), but cannot move more than 3" during that action.  

This operativo cannot perform this action unless an operativo enemigo is within its alcance de control.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, MEDIC, FIELD MEDIC

abilities.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo would be removed from the zona de combate as incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo,
you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
If you do, that operativo amigo is not incapacitado and has 1 wound remaining.
That operativo amigo can then immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control.
Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends.
You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado.

Select one friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, GRENADIER

abilities.description:
This operativo can use frag, krak, smoke and stun grenades (see universal equipment).
Doing so doesn't count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other operativos).
Whenever this operativo is using a frag or krak grenade, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1.

Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

- Place one of your Smoke Grenade markers within 6" of this operativo. It must be visible to this operativo, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that is visible to this operativo. The marker creates an area of smoke 1" horizontally and unlimited height vertically from (but not below) it. - While Un operativo is wholly within an area of smoke, it is obscured to operativos more than 2" from it, and vice versa. In addition, whenever Un operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo wholly within an area of smoke, ignore the Piercing weapon rule unless they are within 2" of each other. - In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, roll one D3. Remove that Smoke Grenade marker after a number of activations equal to that D3 have been completed or at the end of the punto de inflexión (whichever comes first). - Un operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if you have reached the total number of times your kill team can perform it.

Place one of your Utility Grenade markers within 6" of this operativo.
It must be visible to this operativo, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that's visible to this operativo.
Whenever Un operativo is within 3" of that Utility Grenade marker, its controlling player must spend 1 additional AP for that operativo to perform the Recoger Marcador and mission actions.  

In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, roll one D3. Remove that Utility Grenade marker after a number of activations equal to the result have been completed, or at the end of the punto de inflexión (whichever comes first).


This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, GUNNER

Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, FLY, JUMP PACK WARRIOR

abilities.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Whenever this operativo performs an action in which it moves, it can FLY. If it does, don't move it.
Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat (or 3" if it was a Carrera) of its original location,
measuring the horizontal distance only (in a zona de combate that uses the close quarters rules, e.g. zona de combate: Gallowdark, this distance cannot be measured over or through Wall terrain,
and that operativo cannot be set up on the other side of an access point - in other words it cannot FLY through an open hatchway).
Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Carga action.
It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it's the Carga action, it cannot be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, KINLYNK

abilities.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Select one operativo enemigo that's a valid target for this operativo and that doesn't have one of your System Jam tokens; it gains one.
Until the end of the battle, whenever an operativo enemigo has one of your System Jam tokens, it cannot be activated until each operativo enemigo without one is expended.
When an operativo enemigo that has one of your System Jam tokens is activated, remove that token.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo in the zona de combate. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, KOGNITAAR

abilities.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**
Place either your Attack or Defence marker in the zona de combate. Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo
that is within 3" of your Attack marker, you can re-roll one of your dados de ataque.
Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo that is within 3" of your Defence marker, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.

If your Attack or Defence marker is in the zona de combate, remove it.  

Place your Attack or Defence marker in the zona de combate.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, LOKATR

abilities.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Place your Pan Spectral Scan marker in the zona de combate.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo that's within 3" of that marker, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Accurate 1 and Saturate weapon rules.
When this operativo is next activated, is incapacitado or performs this action again (whichever comes first), remove that marker.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**SUPPORT**
Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of the punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo within 3" of this operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo you can use this effect.
If you do:

- That operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, LUGGER

abilities.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.
Once during each of this operativo's activations, it can perform a mission action for 1 less AP.
You can select one additional equipment option.

opTypes.keywords: HEARTHKYN SALVAGER, VOTANN, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo incapacitates a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, that operativo enemigo gains one of your Grudge tokens for the battle.
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo,
for each of your Grudge tokens that operativo enemigo has, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead (including any éxitos normales already retained as a result of the Accurate weapon rule).  

Note that Grudge tokens are not removed when you do this.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against this operativo, if this operativo contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, in the Resolve dados de ataque
step, you can subtract 1 from the damage inflicted on it from one success.

ploys.description:
Select one objective marker or one of your mission markers.

- Whenever determining control of that marker, treat the total APL stat of friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativos that contest it as 1 higher if at least one friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo contests that marker.
Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
- Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is within 3" of that marker, add 1 to the Atk stat of its melee weapons (to a maximum of 4).
Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo within 6" of it, improve the Hit stat of that operativo amigo's ranged weapons by 1 (to a maximum of 3+).

Select one objective marker or one of your mission markers.
Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 3" of that marker, treat it as having one additional Grudge token.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, if you rolled one or less successes (including any re-rolls), you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.
Use this firefight ploy during a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo's activación. Until the end of that activación, that operativo can perform either a free Disparar or a free Combatir action.

Use this firefight ploy when Un operativo is shooting a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, when you collect your dados de defensa. Change the attacker's retained éxitos críticos to éxitos normales
(any weapon rules they've already resolved aren't affected, e.g. Piercing Crits).

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dados de ataque for a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo, if it's shooting against or fighting against an operativo enemigo that controls
an objective marker or one of your mission markers. You can re-roll any of your dados de ataque.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is incapacitado. It can perform a free mission action before it's removed from the zona de combate.

equipments.description:
Friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativos have the following melee weapon. Note that the FIELD MEDIC operativo already has this weapon but with better stats; in that instance, use the better version.

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Plasma Knife|3|4+|3/5|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Lethal 5+|

Whenever a friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativo is climbing, treat the vertical distance as 1" less (to a minimum of 2").
Note this has no effect when using ladder equipment terrain, which treats the vertical distance as 1" (but would have an effect if the operativo then continued climbing another terrain feature).

Friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativos can perform the Recoger Marcador action for 1 less AP, and don't have to control the marker to do so (taking precedence over that action's conditions - they only need to contest the marker).
Once per battle, if friendly HEARTHKYN SALVAGER operativos contest two or more objective markers, after rolling off to decide initiative, you can re-roll your dice.

description: The Hernkyn are those Kin who serve as the Leagues of Votann's explorers, scouts, prospectors and pioneers. To the Kin, any region of blank space upon their star charts is a mystery in need of solving. The desire to plumb the depths of the void, to discover its secrets and claim its riches is deeply ingrained in their psyche, as is the need to know what -- if any -- sources of peril might lurk amidst the shadows.
composition:
A HERNKYN YAEGIR killteam is composed of:

- 1 HERNKYN YAEGIR Theyn operativo
- 9 HERNKYN YAEGIR operativos selected from the following list:
  - Bladekyn
  - Bombast
  - Gunner
  - Ironbreak
  - Riflekyn
  - Tracker
  - Warrior with one of the following options:
    - Bolt Revolver, plasma knife
    - Bolt Shotgun, Fists
Other than Warrior operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: HERNKYN YAEGIR, VOTANN, LEADER, THEYN

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** in the first punto de inflexión.  

Each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Reposicionar action. Each that does so must end that move wholly within 4" of your drop zone.

The first time this operativo would be incapacitado during the battle, it is not incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of the action.
All remaining dados de ataque are discarded (including yours, if this operativo is fighting or retaliating).

In the Ready step of each Strategy Phase after the first, you gain Resourceful points determined by the number of friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativos in the zona de combate that aren't dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.
At the end of each punto de inflexión, discard your Resourceful points.

| **operativos** | **Resourceful Points** |
|:---:|:---:|
|5+|2|
|1-4|1|

You can spend 1 of your Resourceful points during each activación of each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo to do one of the following:

- Before or after it performs an action, if it's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you can use this rule. If you do, add 1 to that operativo amigo's APL stat until the end of its activación.
- When it's activated, if it's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, it regains up to D3+1 lost wounds.
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase after the first, if this operativo is not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you gain 1 Resourceful point.

Whenever one of your reverse-side down Minefield markers is both within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control and not within a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo's alcance de control, flip the marker over.
If it is blank, there is no effect.
If it is a Hy-Pex mine, inflict 3 Damage on that operativo enemigo and roll 1D6. If the result is less than that operativo enemigo's Save stat, inflict additional damage on it equal to the dice result.
If it is not incapacitado, end its action (if any), even if that action's effects are not fulfilled.
If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount of distance to do so. Regardless, that marker is not removed.

You have five Minefield markers for the battle. On the reverse side, three of them are Hy-Pex mines and two are blank. Set up all your Minefield markers as if they were one item of equipment. Each must be set up reverse-side down (their specifics are not revealed), more than 2" from other markers, access points, and Accessible terrain, and more than 6" from your opponent's drop zone and your other Minefield markers. Whenever this operativo is readied, if it is not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you can reset one of your flipped Minefield markers that is within its alcance de control (flip the marker back over again).
