ploys.description: Whenever a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo has a conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage Terrain) except being within 2".

The first time an dados de ataque inflicts damage on each friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo during the punto de inflexión in the Resolve dados de ataque step, you can halve that inflicted damage (rounding up, to a minimum of 2).

Whenever a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo is shooting, if it is in Cover from the target's perspective, its weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
Note that your opponent still determines the targeting lines for this (i.e, they decide on a which point of their operativo's base targeting lines are drawn from).  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo, when you collect your dados de defensa.
Change the attacker's retained éxitos críticos to éxitos normales (any weapon rules they have already resolved are not affected, e.g, Piercing crits).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo is activated.
Select one other ready friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo visible to and within 3" of that operativo.
When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates.
Neither operativo can be a BOMBAST operativo if its Wroughtlock Negotiation STRATEGIC GAMBIT has been used this punto de inflexión.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo is incapacitado.
Before that operativo is removed from the zona de combate, remove your Fallen Kin marker from the zona de combate (if any), then place it within that operativo's alcance de control.
That operativo is then incapacitado as normal.  

Whenever a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo within 3" of your Fallen Kin marker is shooting, fighting or retaliating, in the Roll dados de ataque step,
you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it, or retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo ends a move dentro del alcance de control of a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo. Select one other friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo visible to and within 6" of that operativo amigo, but that is not itself dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos. The selected operativo can perform a Disparar action. During that action:  - It can target that operativo enemigo even though it is dentro del alcance de control of a operativo amigo. - Other operativos enemigos cannot be selected as a valid target. - You cannot select a frag or krak grenade, or a weapon with the Blast or x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e, Devastating with a distance)

equipments.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a bolt shotgun (short range), you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Blast 1" weapon rule.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
In addition, friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativos are not affected by the X" Devastating X weapon rule (i.e, Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativos have the following melee weapon. Note that some operativos already have this weapon but with better stats; in that instance use the better version, and that weapon has the Balanced weapon rule for the battle..

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Plasma Knife|3|4+|3/5|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Lethal 5+|

Up to twice per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly HERNKYN YAEGIR operativo is performing the Disparar action and you selected a bolt shotgun (long range), you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1 and add 1 to both of its damage stats.

description:
Led by ambitious and devious Crypteks, Hierotek Circles employ Necron soldiery and unique Canoptek constructs
to further the rise of their own dynasties. They achieve this by learning of their lords' enemies and undermining the
power of these rivals through artifice, sabotage, theft and murder.
composition:
A HIEROTEK CIRCLE KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo selected from the following list:
  - CHRONOMANCER operativo with one of the following options:
    - Aeonstave
    - Entropic lance
  - PSYCHOMANCER
  - TECHNOMANCER
- 1 PLASMACYTE ACCELERATOR operativo
- 1 PLASMACYTE REANIMATOR operativo
- 5 HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativos selected from the following list:
  - APPRENTEK
  - DEATHMARK
  - DESPOTEK with one of the following options:
    - Gauss blaster; bayonet
    - Tesla carbine; bayonet    
  - GUARDIAN with one of the following options:
    - Gauss blaster; bayonet
    - Tesla carbine; bayonet
        
Other than DEATHMARK and GUARDIAN operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: HIEROTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, LEADER, CRYPTEK, CHRONOMANCER

abilities.description: In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, after resolving all other rules in this step (e.g. Reanimation Protocols faction rule), each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo regains 1D3+1 lost wounds (roll separately for each).

The first time each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo is incapacitado, before it's removed from the zona de combate, place one of your Reanimation markers within its alcance de control.
Then remove it as incapacitado, also removing any tokens and rules effects it had (e.g. CHRONOMANCER operativo's Chronometron action, Poison tokens, APL stat changes, being implanted, etc.).  

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, select one of your Reanimation markers and roll one 1D6:
On a 1-2, leave that Reanimation marker in the zona de combate and repeat this process with a different one of your Reanimation markers (if any);
on a 3+, Un operativo is REANIMATED.  

You can only select each of your Reanimation markers once per punto de inflexión, and once you roll a 3+, you do not select any more for that punto de inflexión.  

Whenever Un operativo is REANIMATED:

- Set up the operativo that Reanimation marker was placed for (it's no longer incapacitado). It must be placed within 3" of that Reanimation marker and not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos (if you cannot do so, treat the roll as 1-2 instead).
- It has 1 Wound remaining.
- It has an order of your choice and is ready.
- Remove that Reanimation marker.

For the purposes of the kill op, your opponent treats your starting number of HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativos as 5 (in other words, their kill grade goes up whenever a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo is incapacitado, to a maximum kill grade of 5). REANIMATED operativos don't retroactively change any other VPs your opponent has scored, e.g. from tac ops...

**SUPPORT**
Select one friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo.
Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until this operativo is incapacitado or until this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first),
subtract 1 from the Atk stat of Un operativo's weapons whenever it is shooting that selected operativo.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Place your Countertemporal Nanomine marker visible to this operativo, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that is visible to this operativo. Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 4" of your Countertemporal Nanomine marker, subtract 2" from its Move stat. When this operativo is next activated, is incapacitado or this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first), remove that marker.  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo (excluding APPRENTEK and CRYPTEK) visible to and within 6" of this operativo, or within 6" of a friendly DESPOTEK operativo that is visible to this operativo. That selected operativo can immediately perform a 1AP action for free (excluding Accelerate); it cannot move more than 2" during that action, perform an action it has already performed during this punto de inflexión, or perform that action again during this punto de inflexión.    This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or while counteracting.

**SUPPORT** Select one expended friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo visible to and within 5" of this operativo. Remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up visible to and within 5" of this operativo, measuring the horizontal distance only, in a location it can be placed. Each operativo amigo can only be selected for this rule once per punto de inflexión. Note that a Comms device from universal equipment only affects the first distance of this rule.    This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, during the first punto de inflexión, or if a operativo amigo has already performed this action during this punto de inflexión.

opTypes.keywords: HIEROTEK CIRCLE, NECRON, LEADER, CRYPTEK, PSYCHOMANCER

abilities.description: In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, after resolving all other rules in this step (e.g. Reanimation Protocols faction rule), each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo regains 1D3+1 lost wounds (roll separately for each).

The first time each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo is incapacitado, before it's removed from the zona de combate, place one of your Reanimation markers within its alcance de control.
Then remove it as incapacitado, also removing any tokens and rules effects it had (e.g. CHRONOMANCER operativo's Chronometron action, Poison tokens, APL stat changes, being implanted, etc.).  

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, select one of your Reanimation markers and roll one 1D6:
On a 1-2, leave that Reanimation marker in the zona de combate and repeat this process with a different one of your Reanimation markers (if any);
on a 3+, Un operativo is REANIMATED.  

You can only select each of your Reanimation markers once per punto de inflexión, and once you roll a 3+, you do not select any more for that punto de inflexión.  

Whenever Un operativo is REANIMATED:

- Set up the operativo that Reanimation marker was placed for (it's no longer incapacitado). It must be placed within 3" of that Reanimation marker and not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos (if you cannot do so, treat the roll as 1-2 instead).
- It has 1 Wound remaining.
- It has an order of your choice and is ready.
- Remove that Reanimation marker.

As REANIMATED operativos are no longer incapacitado, for the purposes of the kill op, this means your opponent's kill grade can go down during the battle (they lose VP accordingly).
However, it won't retroactively change any other VPs your opponent has scored, e.g. from tac ops.

Place your Despair marker visible to this operativo, or on Vantage terrain of a terrain feature that is visible to this operativo.
When this operativo is next activated, is incapacitado or this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first), remove that marker.  

Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 2" of your Despair marker, your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that operativo enemigo to perform the Recoger Marcador and mission actions.
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of operativos enemigos that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those operativos enemigos is within 2" of your Despair marker.
Note this is not a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it is incapacitado or until this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first), whenever an operativo enemigo within 4" of this operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque and cannot retain dados de ataque results of less than 6 as éxitos críticos (e.g. as a results of the Lethal, Rending, or Severe weapon rules).  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo (excluding APPRENTEK and CRYPTEK) visible to and within 6" of this operativo, or within 6" of a friendly DESPOTEK operativo that is visible to this operativo. That selected operativo can immediately perform a 1AP action for free (excluding Accelerate); it cannot move more than 2" during that action, perform an action it has already performed during this punto de inflexión, or perform that action again during this punto de inflexión.    This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or while counteracting.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo.
Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it is incapacitado or until this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first),
that selected operativo gains one of your Madness tokens.  

Whenever your opponent would activate an operativo enemigo that has one of your Madness tokens, you can roll one D6: if the result is equal to or higher than that operativo enemigo's APL,
they cannot activate it during this activación. If that operativo is successfully activated, or there are no other operativos enemigos eligible to be activated, remove its Madness token.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

 Saturate

Note that if you select a staff of light or arcane conduit, you only select the additional weapon rules for either the ranged or melee profile of that weapon.

**SUPPORT** Select one friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.

**SUPPORT**
Select one friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo.
Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it is incapacitado or until this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first),
whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on that operativo, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo (excluding APPRENTEK and CRYPTEK) visible to and within 6" of this operativo. That selected operativo can immediately perform a 1AP action for free (excluding Accelerate); it cannot move more than 2" during that action, perform an action it has already performed during this punto de inflexión, or perform that action again during this punto de inflexión.    This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or while counteracting.

abilities.description: In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, after resolving all other rules in this step (e.g. Reanimation Protocols faction rule), each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo regains 1D3+1 lost wounds (roll separately for each).

The first time each friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo is incapacitado, before it's removed from the zona de combate, place one of your Reanimation markers within its alcance de control.
Then remove it as incapacitado, also removing any tokens and rules effects it had (e.g. CHRONOMANCER operativo's Chronometron action, Poison tokens, APL stat changes, being implanted, etc.).  

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, select one of your Reanimation markers and roll one 1D6:
On a 1-2, leave that Reanimation marker in the zona de combate and repeat this process with a different one of your Reanimation markers (if any);
on a 3+, Un operativo is REANIMATED.  

You can only select each of your Reanimation markers once per punto de inflexión, and once you roll a 3+, you do not select any more for that punto de inflexión.  

Whenever Un operativo is REANIMATED:

- Set up the operativo that Reanimation marker was placed for (it's no longer incapacitado). It must be placed within 3" of that Reanimation marker and not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos (if you cannot do so, treat the roll as 1-2 instead).
- It has 1 Wound remaining.
- It has an order of your choice and is ready.
- Remove that Reanimation marker.

For the purposes of the kill op, your opponent treats your starting number of HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativos as 5 (in other words, their kill grade goes up whenever a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo is incapacitado, to a maximum kill grade of 5). REANIMATED operativos don't retroactively change any other VPs your opponent has scored, e.g. from tac ops.

Whenever determining control of a marker, you can treat this operativo's APL stat as 3. If you do, this takes precedence over all other rules, meaning any changes to its APL stat are ignored for this.

ploys.description:
Select one of the following:

- **SUPPORT** Each other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo visible to and within 6" of a friendly CRYPTEK operativo can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice.
- **SUPPORT** Each other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo (excluding CRYPTEK) visible to and within 3" of a friendly APPRENTEK operativo can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice.

Friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativos' melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.
Whenever a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo is fighting during an activación in which it has not moved more than its Move stat, or whenever it is retaliating, its melee weapons have the Accurate 2 weapon rule instead.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.

Whenever a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo is shooting Un operativo within 8" of it, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
Note that when you are using the Magnify weapon rule, this operativo must still be within 8" of the target to use this rule (not the other operativo amigo from which you're determining a valid target).  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo, if you cannot retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one of your dados de defensa as a éxito normal without rolling it.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE APPRENTEK or HIEROTEK CIRCLE CRYPTEK operativo performs a SUPPORT unique action.
Until the end of that action, for the purposes of selecting another operativo amigo, ignore the distance requirement (only visibility is a requirement).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE DEATHMARK operativo's activación, if it has a Conceal order.
During that activación, that operativo can perform the Vigilancia action (see close quarters rules, kill team Core Book) in any zona de combate and while it has a Conceal order,
but when you perform the free Combatir or Disparar action during the interruption, you must change its order to Engage.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE IMMORTAL operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a tesla carbine.
Until the end of that action, that weapon doesn't have the 2" from its Devastating weapon rule but has the Blast 2" weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy when determining control of a marker.
Select one of your Reanimation markers. Until the start of the next punto de inflexión, whenever determining control of a marker, treat that Reanimation marker as a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo that has an APL stat of 1. For the purposes of the Martyrs tac op (Approved Ops 2025), this ploy has no effect.

equipments.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE APPRENTEK or HIEROTEK CIRCLE CRYPTEK operativo is performing the Disparar action, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one other friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativo (excluding PLASMACYTE) that has an Engage order and is visible to that operativo amigo.
Until the end of that action, that other operativo amigo can be treated as el operativo activo for the Magnify weapon rule.

Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly CRYPTEK operativo, at the start of the Roll dados de defensa step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence.
Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, when you gain CP, if a friendly CRYPTEK operativo is not incapacitado, is not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, and has not been REANIMATED this punto de inflexión,
you can use this rule.
If you do, roll one D6: on a 1, you cannot use this rule for the rest of the battle; on a 4+, you gain 1CP.
Once you have gained 2CP from this rule, you cannot use it for the rest of the battle.

Once per punto de inflexión, when an operativo enemigo ends the Carga action with friendly HIEROTEK CIRCLE operativos within its alcance de control, you can use this rule. If you do, inflict D3+1 damage on that operativo enemigo.

description:
To the techno-zealots of the Adeptus Mechanicus, the galaxy is a complex mechanism, its workings the creation of
their Machine God. They see the acquisition of knowledge as holy work, and task their cybernetically altered servants
with carrying it out, no matter the cost.
composition: A HUNTER CLADE killteam is composed of:  - 1 HUNTER CLADE operativo selected from the following list:   - SICARIAN INFILTRATOR PRINCEPS with one option from each of the following:     - Flechette blaster or stubcarbine     - Power weapon or taser goad   - SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER PRINCEPS   - SKITARII RANGER ALPHA with one of the following options:     - Galvanic rifle; gun butt       - Master-crafted radium pistol; power weapon       Or one option from each of the following:     - Arc pistol or phosphor blast pistol     - Arc maul or taser goad   - SKITARII VANGUARD ALPHA with one of the following options:     - Radium carbine; gun butt     - Master-crafted radium pistol; power weapon       Or one option from each of the following:     - Arc pistol or phosphor blast pistol     - Arc maul or taser goad - 9 HUNTER CLADE operativos selected from the following list:   - SICARIAN INFILTRATOR WARRIOR* with one option from each of the following:     - Flechette blaster or stubcarbine     - Power weapon or taser goad   - SICARIAN RUSTSTALKER WARRIOR* with one of the following options:     - Chordclaw & transonic razor     - Transonic blades   - SKITARII RANGER DIKTAT   - SKITARII RANGER GUNNER* with gun butt and one of the following options:     - Arc rifle, plasma caliver or transuranic arquebus   - SKITARII RANGER SURVEYOR   - SKITARII RANGER WARRIOR   - SKITARII VANGUARD DIKTAT   - SKITARII VANGUARD GUNNER* with gun butt and one of the following options:     - Arc rifle, plasma caliver or transuranic arquebus       - SKITARII VANGUARD SURVEYOR   - SKITARII VANGUARD WARRIOR   *You cannot select more than 7 of these operativos combined.    Other than GUNNER and WARRIOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to one DIKTAT operativo, up to one SURVEYOR operativo and up to five SICARIAN operativos.    Your kill team can only include up to one arc rifle, up to one plasma caliver and up to one transuranic arquebus.

opTypes.keywords: HUNTER CLADE, ADEPTUS MECHANICUS, LEADER, SICARIAN, RUSTSTALKER, PRINCEPS

abilities.description: Whenever a friendly HUNTER CLADE RUSTSTALKER operativo within 3" of this operativo is fighting, the first time you strike with a éxito crítico during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage.
You can use the Command Override firefight ploy for 0CP if the specified friendly HUNTER CLADE operativo is visible to this operativo.

*At the end of the Select operativos step, select one DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE to be a Primary Mode for your kill team until the end of the battle (note that selecting a Primary Mode doesn't automatically give you the effects of that DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for the battle; you must still select it as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, as below).*  
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**  

Select a DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos to have until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.
Each DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE has both an Optimisation and a Deprecation rule. Both are in effect while your kill team has that DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE.  
  

**Protector Imperative**
- Optimisation: Friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos' ranged weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Hit stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos' melee weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**Conqueror Imperative**
- Optimisation: Friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos' melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Hit stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos' ranged weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**Bulwark Imperative**
- Optimisation: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on HUNTER CLADE operativos amigos.
- Deprecation: Subtract 1" from the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos.

**Aggressor Imperative**
- Optimisation: Add 1" to the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Save stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos by 1.

**Neutral Imperative**
- Optimisation: None.
- Deprecation: None.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, if you
can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you
can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead. This isn't cumulative
with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

abilities.description:
*At the end of the Select operativos step, select one DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE to be a Primary Mode for your kill team until the end of the battle (note that selecting a Primary Mode doesn't automatically give you the effects of that DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for the battle; you must still select it as a STRATEGIC GAMBIT, as below).*  
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**  

Select a DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos to have until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.
Each DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE has both an Optimisation and a Deprecation rule. Both are in effect while your kill team has that DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE.  
  

**Protector Imperative**
- Optimisation: Friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos' ranged weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Hit stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos' melee weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**Conqueror Imperative**
- Optimisation: Friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos' melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Hit stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos' ranged weapons by 1. This isn't cumulative with being injured.

**Bulwark Imperative**
- Optimisation: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on HUNTER CLADE operativos amigos.
- Deprecation: Subtract 1" from the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos.

**Aggressor Imperative**
- Optimisation: Add 1" to the Move stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos.
- Deprecation: Worsen the Save stat of friendly HUNTER CLADE operativos by 1.

**Neutral Imperative**
- Optimisation: None.
- Deprecation: None.

Whenever this operativo is shooting, if it hasn't moved during the activación, or if it's a contrataque, ranged weapons on its datacard have the Lethal 5+ weapon rule. Note this operativo isn't restricted from moving after shooting.

ploys.description: During each friendly HUNTER CLADE RUSTSTALKER operativo's activación, it can perform two Combatir actions, and one of them can be free.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly HUNTER CLADE VANGUARD operativo, if that operativo enemigo is under the effects of the Rad-Saturation rule
(see VANGUARD operativos), subtract 1 from the Normal Dmg stat of its weapons (to a minimum of 3).
Whenever an operativo enemigo within 6" of a friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque.

Each friendly HUNTER CLADE RANGER operativo that has a Conceal order and is more than 6" from operativos enemigos can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice. You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.

Use this firefight ploy when you activate a friendly HUNTER CLADE operativo. Select a DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE for that operativo to have instead of its current one (if any) until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly HUNTER CLADE operativo's activación. Alternatively, use it when an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly HUNTER CLADE operativo, at the end of the Roll dados de ataque step. Until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, that operativo amigo has an additional rule determined by its current DOCTRINA IMPERATIVE as follows: <uL> - **Protector:** This operativo's ranged weapons have the Severe weapon rule. - **Conqueror:** Whenever this operativo is fighting, after resolving your first dados de ataque during that sequence, you can immediately resolve another (before your opponent). - **Bulwark: Improve this operativo's Save stat by 1. In addition, whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, you can collect and roll an additional dados de defensa. If you use this ploy during a Disparar action, this operativo's Save stat is changed immediately (this takes precedence over the core rules). - **Aggressor: You can ignore the first vertical distance of 2" this operativo moves during one climb up. - **Neutral: None.  Note that you can use this ploy after rolling attack or dados de defensa for this operativo, or before or after retaining or re-rolling those dice.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR operativo is activated. Alternatively, use this firefight ploy when a friendly HUNTER CLADE INFILTRATOR operativo, or an operativo enemigo within 3" of that friendly
operativo, would perform the Recoger Marcador or a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch). Until the start of that operativo amigo's next activación, whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of enemy
operativos that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those operativos enemigos is within 3" of that operativo amigo. Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this, and this can change control of a marker before performing the action.

equipments.description:
Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT in any punto de inflexión after the first. Select one objective marker or your opponent's drop zone.
Roll one D6 separately for each operativo enemigo dentro del alcance de control of that selected objective marker or within that drop zone, and subtract 1 if any part of that operativo enemigo's base is underneath Vantage terrain:  

on a 4+, subtract 1 from that operativo's APL stat until the end of its next activación;  

on a 6, also inflict D3 damage on it (roll separately for each).

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly HUNTER CLADE operativo is activated, if it's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you can use this rule.
If you do, that operativo amigo regains up to D3+2 lost wounds.

Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly HUNTER CLADE operativo, at the start of the Roll dados de defensa step, you can use this rule.
If you do, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any) until the end of that sequence. Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.

Once per battle, you can use the Control Edict firefight ploy for 0CP, but instead of activating the selected operativos amigos in succession, activate them at the same time.
Complete their activations action by action in any order.

description: Counted amongst the complement of many Navis Imperialis vessels, Navy Breachers are elite Voidsmen who are outfitted, trained and endlessly drilled in boarding actions and void-based combat. Wielding a wide array of cutting gear, boarding shields and close-range weapons, they are well-suited to deadly combat in close confines.
composition:
An IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHERS killteam is composed of:
- 1 IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER SERGEANT-AT-ARMS operativo with the following:  
  - Navis shotgun and Navis hatchet  
  Or one option from each of the following:  
  - Bolt pistol or heirloom autopistol
  - Chainsword or power weapon
- 10 IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos selected from the following list:
  - ARMSMAN
  - AXEJACK
  - C.A.T. UNIT
  - ENDURANT
  - GHEISTSKULL
  - GRENADIER
  - GUNNER with Navis las-volley and gun butt
  - GUNNER with meltagun and gun butt
  - GUNNER with plasma gun and gun butt
  - HATCHCUTTER
  - SURVEYOR
  - VOID-JAMMER

Other than ARMSMAN operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to two GUNNER operativos.  

Your kill team can only include a GHEISTSKULL operativo if it also includes a VOID-JAMMER operativo, and it can only include a C.A.T. UNIT operativo if it also includes a SURVEYOR operativo.  

These operativos count as half a selection each, meaning you can select both of them and it's treated as one selection in total.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, LEADER, NAVIS, SERGEANT-AT-ARMS

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is activated, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo visible to and within 3" of that operativo.
When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates. When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Whenever you would use the Attack Order or Defence Order strategy ploy, if this operativo is in the zona de combate, it costs you 0CP.
Once during each of this operativo's activations, before or after it performs an action, if your Attack Order or Defence Order marker is in the zona de combate (see relevant strategy ploy), you can either:

- Remove that marker and place it again.
- Change the selected ploy to the other (e.g. your Attack Order becomes a Defence Order).

You cannot do both, and you don't need to spend any CP to change the ploy.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, ARMSMAN

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is activated, you can use this rule.

When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates. When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER ARMSMAN operativo (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operativos in succession with this rule).
Ignore this rule when you are using the Breach and Clear faction rule.

abilities.description:

When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates. When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

This operativo is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it's incapacitado, and when determining your starting number of operativos). It's also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require operativos to 'escape', 'survive' or be incapacitado by an operativo enemigo (if it escapes/survives/is incapacitado, determining how many operativos must escape/survive/be incapacitado, etc.).

- This operativo cannot be activated or perform actions if it's dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER SURVEYOR operativo has been incapacitado. The punto de inflexión can end even if this operativo is still ready. - This operativo cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Carrera, Retirada, Reposicionar and Spot. - It cannot retaliate, assist in a Combatir, climb or jump. - Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this. - Whenever this operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2". - Whenever determining what's visible to this operativo, draw the line from any part of the miniature.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo, you can use this effect.
