abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is activated, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo visible to and within 3" of that operativo.
When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates. When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Place one of your Breach markers within this operativo's alcance de control as close as possible to a terrain feature dentro del alcance de control of it.
Whenever Un operativo is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible terrain.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a terrain feature isn't within its alcance de control.

Select a closed hatchway (e.g. zona de combate: Gallowdark) within this operativo's alcance de control. 1 additional AP must be spent for other operativos to perform the Operate Hatch action to open that hatchway.
This effect ends when that hatchway is opened. Note this operativo isn't affected by this effect.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if it isn't within 1" of a closed hatchway.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, SURVEYOR

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is activated, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo visible to and within 3" of that operativo.
When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates. When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT operativo. That operativo can immediately perform one free action, but it cannot move more than 3" during that action.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT operativo isn't in the zona de combate.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo (excluding C.A.T. UNIT or GHEISTSKULL) visible to and within 6" of this operativo, or visible to and within 6" of a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT operativo.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat. For the purposes of the Comms Device universal equipment, the operativo the distance is being determined from must control that marker.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, VOID-JAMMER

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is activated, you can use this rule.
If you do, select one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo visible to and within 3" of that operativo.
When that first operativo amigo is expended, you can activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates. When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

Don't select a valid target. Instead, a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER GHEISTSKULL operativo is always the primary target and cannot be in cover or obscured. If that operativo isn't in the zona de combate, you cannot select this weapon.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 8" of a friendly GHEISTSKULL operativo. Roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that operativo enemigo is a valid target for that friendly GHEISTSKULL operativo:
on a 3+, subtract 1 from that operativo enemigo's APL stat until the end of its next activación.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a friendly GHEISTSKULL operativo isn't in the zona de combate.

ploys.description:
Place your Attack Order marker in the zona de combate. Whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo within 3" of that marker is shooting, fighting or retaliating, its weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker. You cannot use this ploy and the Defence Order strategy ploy in the same Strategy phase.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Whenever Un operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo that is within your territory or that hasn't performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action during this punto de inflexión, Normal and Critical Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on that operativo amigo.

Whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is fighting or shooting Un operativo within 3" of it, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.  
**Punishing:** If you retain any éxitos críticos, you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.

Place your Defence Order marker in the zona de combate. Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo that's within 3" of that marker, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker. You cannot use this ploy and the Attack Order strategy ploy in the same Strategy phase.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo performs the Disparar or Combatir action, and you select an operativo enemigo within 6" of it as a valid target or to Combatir against.
If it's the first operativo amigo to perform either of those actions during this punto de inflexión, its weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule for that action.
If it's the first operativo amigo to be activated during this punto de inflexión, its weapons also have the Severe weapon rule for that action.  
**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action. That operativo can move through one Accessible terrain feature without it counting as an additional 1" and/or perform a free Operate Hatch action during its activación, and can do so during the Carga or Retirada action. You cannot use this ploy if the access point has been welded shut (see HATCHCUTTER operativo) unless it's a friendly HATCHCUTTER operativo's activación.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is activated. Select one objective marker.
Until the end of the battle or until you use this ploy again (whichever comes first), when determining control of that objective marker, treat that operativo amigo's APL stat as 1 higher.
Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

Use this firefight ploy when you use the Breach and Clear faction rule. Select one of those friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos. Until the end of that operativo's activación, add 1 to its APL stat.

equipments.description: You can ignore any changes to the APL stats of friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos, and they aren't affected by operativos enemigos' Shock weapon rule.

Up to three times per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a navis shotgun (long range), you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1 and add 1 to both of its Dmg stats.
You can ignore any changes to the Move stat of friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos from being injured.
Once per punto de inflexión, one friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo can perform the Operate Hatch action for 1 less AP.

description: The reach of the Inquisition extends across the vastness of the Imperium. Inquisitorial kill teams bring together agents from all strata of Imperial society, from elite soldiers to zealous priests. Together, these disparate elements combine their skills to deadly effect, enabling them to root out and destroy heretics, aliens and the servants of Chaos.
composition:
An INQUISITORIAL AGENTS killteam is composed of:

- 1 INQUISITORIAL AGENT INTERROGATOR operativo
- 1 INQUISITORIAL AGENT TOME-SKULL operativo
- 5 INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativos selected from the following list:
  - AUTOSAVANT
  - QUESTKEEPER
  - DEATH WORLD VETERAN
  - ENLIGHTENER
  - HEXORCIST
  - MYSTIC
  - PENAL LEGIONNAIRE
  - PISTOLIER
  - GUN SERVITOR with one of the following options:
    - Heavy bolter; servo-claw
    - Multi-melta; servo-claw
    - Plasma cannon; servo-claw
- 5 INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativos selected from the list above, or REQUISITIONED operativos from one group in the Inquisitorial Requisition faction rule (you cannot select REQUISITIONED operativos from different groups).
  
Your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once, unless you're not including any REQUISITIONED operativos, in which case you can include up to two GUN SERVITOR operativos, but each one must have different options.  

Your kill team (including any REQUISITIONED operativos) cannot include more than one weapon with the Piercing 2 weapon rule, and cannot include more than three weapons with the Piercing X (excluding Piercing Crits X) weapon rule combined.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, LEADER, INTERROGATOR

abilities.description: STRATEGIC GAMBIT and/or when this operativo is activated. Select one of the following INQUISITORIAL TOME rules for this operativo to have, and one for a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT TOME-SKULL operativo to have (they can be the same, and ignore the rule you didn't select for each operativo):  - **Denunciation:** Whenever a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo within 2" of operativos with this rule, add 1 to the Atk stat of that operativo amigo's weapons. - **Sanctification:** Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo within 2" of operativos amigos with this rule, subtract 1 from the Atk stat of that operativo enemigo's weapons.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, TOME-SKULL

abilities.description: This operativo can have an INQUISITORIAL TOME rule (see INTERROGATOR). Note it keeps that rule even if that friendly INTERROGATOR operativo is removed from the zona de combate.

This operativo is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it's incapacitado, and when determining your starting number of operativos). It's also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require operativos to 'escape', 'survive' or be incapacitado (if it escapes/survives/is incapacitado by operativos enemigos, determining how many operativos must escape/survive/be incapacitado, etc.).

Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate a ready friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT INTERROGATOR operativo (if able) before your opponent activates.
The same is true in reverse (INTERROGATOR followed by TOME-SKULL). When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal.

- This operativo cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Carrera, Retirada and Reposicionar. - It cannot retaliate or assist in a Combatir. - Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this. - Whenever this operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2".

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, AUTOSAVANT

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo contests an objective marker or one of your mission markers, it always controls that marker. This takes precedence over all other rules.
This operativo cannot use any weapons that aren't on its datacard, or perform unique actions.
Each subsequent time your opponent uses each ploy during the battle (excluding Command Re-roll), you gain 1CP (to a maximum of 2CP per punto de inflexión).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, QUESTKEEPER

abilities.description: If this operativo is incapacitado while fighting or retaliating, you can strike the operativo enemigo in that sequence with one of your unresolved successes before it's removed from the zona de combate.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on this operativo, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, DEATH WORLD VETERAN

abilities.description: This operativo can perform the Carga action while it has a Conceal order.
Once per punto de inflexión, when this operativo is fighting or retaliating, in the Resolve dados de ataque step, you can ignore the damage inflicted on it from one éxito normal.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, ENLIGHTENER

abilities.description: Whenever an operativo enemigo is incapacitado within this operativo's alcance de control, you gain 1CP.

Whenever an operativo enemigo would perform the Retirada action while dentro del alcance de control of this operativo, you can use this rule.
If you do, roll one D6, subtracting 1 from the result if that operativo enemigo has a higher Wounds stat than this operativo, and adding 1 if that operativo enemigo is wounded:
on a 4+, that operativo enemigo cannot perform that action during that activación/contrataque (the AP spent on it isn't refunded).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, GUN SERVITOR

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo is activated, if it's visible to and within 3" of another friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo (excluding GUN SERVITOR) or vice versa, add 1 to this operativo's APL stat until the end of that activación.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, HEXORCIST

abilities.description: Whenever an operativo enemigo is visible to and within 6" of this operativo, your opponent cannot re-roll their attack or dados de defensa for that operativo.

Select one operativo enemigo that is a valid target for this operativo and within 6" of it, then select one additional rule (including a unique action) that operativo enemigo has on its datacard (excluding a weapon rule).
Until the end of that operativo enemigo's next activación, it's treated as not having that additional rule.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, MYSTIC

abilities.description: Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 higher. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
This operativo cannot use any weapons that aren't on its datacard.

**PSYCHIC** Select one friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo within 6" of this operativo, then select one of the following effects to last until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it's incapacitado or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first):  - **Guidance:** PSYCHIC. Whenever the selected operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, in the Roll dados de ataque step, you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it, or retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead. - **Protection:** PSYCHIC. Whenever Un operativo is shooting the selected operativo, in the Roll dados de defensa step, you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it, or retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.  This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, PENAL LEGIONNAIRE

abilities.description: You can ignore any changes to this operativo's APL stat, and any changes to its stats from being injured. This operativo isn't affected by operativos enemigos' Shock and Stun weapon rules.
Whenever this operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a wounded operativo enemigo, this operativo's weapons have the Relentless weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, INQUISITION, PISTOLIER

abilities.description: You can ignore any changes to the Hit stat of this operativo's ranged weapons.

Perform two free Disparar actions with this operativo (this takes precedence over action restrictions). You must select a profile of its scoped plasma pistol for one action and its suppressed autopistol for the other (in any order).  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or during an activación in which it performed the Disparar action (or vice versa).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ANATHEMA PSYKANA, SISTER OF SILENCE, PROSECUTOR

abilities.description:
PSYCHIC ranged weapons cannot inflict damage on this operativo. For the effects of PSYCHIC actions, this operativo cannot be selected and is never treated as being within those actions' required distances.
Whenever Un operativo is within 6" of this operativo:

- That operativo cannot perform PSYCHIC actions or use PSYCHIC additional rules.
- That operativo cannot use PSYCHIC ranged weapons.
- PSYCHIC melee weapons have no weapon rules and cannot have Dmg stats higher than 3/4.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ANATHEMA PSYKANA, SISTER OF SILENCE, VIGILATOR

abilities.description:
PSYCHIC ranged weapons cannot inflict damage on this operativo. For the effects of PSYCHIC actions, this operativo cannot be selected and is never treated as being within those actions' required distances.
Whenever Un operativo is within 6" of this operativo:

- That operativo cannot perform PSYCHIC actions or use PSYCHIC additional rules.
- That operativo cannot use PSYCHIC ranged weapons.
- PSYCHIC melee weapons have no weapon rules and cannot have Dmg stats higher than 3/4.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ANATHEMA PSYKANA, SISTER OF SILENCE, WITCHSEEKER

abilities.description:
PSYCHIC ranged weapons cannot inflict damage on this operativo. For the effects of PSYCHIC actions, this operativo cannot be selected and is never treated as being within those actions' required distances.
Whenever Un operativo is within 6" of this operativo:

- That operativo cannot perform PSYCHIC actions or use PSYCHIC additional rules.
- That operativo cannot use PSYCHIC ranged weapons.
- PSYCHIC melee weapons have no weapon rules and cannot have Dmg stats higher than 3/4.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, BRUISER

abilities.description: Once per punto de inflexión, when this operativo is fighting or retaliating, in the Resolve dados de ataque step, you can ignore the damage inflicted on it from one éxito normal.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, CONFIDANT

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is activated, if you have not used the Second in Command rule during the battle, you can select one other ready friendly DEATH KORPS operativo visible to and within 6" of it.
When this operativo is expended, activate that other operativo amigo before your opponent activates (if that operativo is a TROOPER, ignore its Group activación rule).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, GUNNER
INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, MEDIC

abilities.description:
The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly DEATH KORPS operativo would be removed from the zona de combate as incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo, you can use this rule,
providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado and has 1 wound remaining.
That operativo amigo can then immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control.
Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends.  

You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado.

Select one friendly DEATH KORPS operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SAPPER

abilities.description:
Do not select a valid target. Instead, Disparar against each operativo within 2" of your Mine marker, unless Heavy terrain is wholly intervening between that operativo and that marker.
Each of those operativos cannot be in cover or obscured. Roll each sequence separately in an order of your choice.
This weapon cannot be selected if your Mine marker isn't in the zona de combate. At the end of the action, remove your Mine marker from the zona de combate.

This operativo is carrying your Mine marker. It can perform the Recoger Marcador action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Colocar Marcador action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Carrera action.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SNIPER
INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TROOPER

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly DEATH KORPS TROOPER operativo (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operativos in succession with this rule).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VETERAN

abilities.description: Normal Dmg of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on this operativo.
Whenever this operativo is activated, it can receive one GUARDSMAN ORDER.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VOX-OPERATOR

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when this operativo receives a GUARDSMAN ORDER, if it's not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, it can relay that order.
Whenever an order is relayed, all friendly DEATH KORPS operativos in the zona de combate receive that order, then subtract 1 from this operativo's APL stat until the end of its next activación.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly DEATH KORPS operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, ZEALOT

abilities.description: Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa.

**SUPPORT**
Whenever a friendly DEATH KORPS operativo is within 3" of this operativo, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TEMPESTUS SCION, COMMS

abilities.description:
SUPPORT. Select one other friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo in the zona de combate. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo can perform this action twice during its activación, but cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TEMPESTUS SCION, GUNNER
INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TEMPESTUS SCION, MEDIC

abilities.description: The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo would be incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining, and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of the action. After that action, that operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control. Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends. You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado or if it is a Disparar action and this operativo would be a primary or secondary target.

Select one friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds. It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TEMPESTUS SCION, TROOPER

abilities.description:
You can do each of the following once per punto de inflexión:

- One friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT TEMPESTUS SCION TROOPER operativo can perform the Smoke Grenade action.
- One friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT TEMPESTUS SCION TROOPER operativo can perform the Stun Grenade action.

The rules for these actions are found in universal equipment. Performing these actions using this rule doesn't count towards their action limits (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, CASTIGATOR

abilities.description: Whenever an operativo enemigo is dentro del alcance de control of this operativo, if no other operativos enemigos are within this operativo's alcance de control, that operativo enemigo cannot perform the Retirada action.
You can ignore any changes to this operativo's stats (including its weapons' stats, but excluding its Save stat).

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on this operativo, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, MEDIC, ARBITES, CHIRURGANT

abilities.description:
The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo would be removed from the zona de combate as incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo,
you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado and has 1 wound remaining. That operativo amigo can then immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's
alcance de control. Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that
operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends. You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

Select one friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, GUNNER

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, LEASHMASTER

abilities.description:
STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión. Select one of the following attack patterns for a friendly EXACTION SQUAD R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF operativo to have for the battle:

- Aggressive: Its melee weapons have the Relentless weapon rule.
- Swift: Add 2" to its Move stat.
- Defensive: Improve its Save stat by 1.
Whenever this operativo is activated, you can activate a ready friendly EXACTION SQUAD R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF operativo at the same time. Complete their activations action by action in any order.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.
Select one friendly EXACTION SQUAD R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF operativo and change its attack pattern.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, R-VR CYBER-MASTIFF

abilities.description: This operativo cannot perform any actions other than Apprehend, Carga, Carrera, Retirada, Combatir, Vigilancia, Reposicionar, Recoger Marcador and Colocar Marcador. It cannot use any weapons that aren't on its datacard.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

Select one operativo enemigo within this operativo's alcance de control.
Until that operativo enemigo is no longer within this operativo's alcance de control, or until this operativo performs this action again (whichever comes first),
worsen the Hit stat of that operativo enemigo's weapons by 1 (this isn't cumulative with being injured);
in addition, that operativo enemigo cannot perform the Retirada action.  

This operativo cannot perform this action unless an operativo enemigo is within its alcance de control.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, MALOCATOR

abilities.description: Once during each of this operativo's activations, it can perform the Recoger Marcador, Colocar Marcador, Veriscant or a mission action for 1 less AP.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it's incapacitado or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first),
whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against that operativo enemigo, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Severe weapon rule;
if the weapon already has that weapon rule, it has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, MARKSMAN

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

Until the start of this operativo's next activación:

- The concealed and stationary profiles of its executioner shotgun have the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.
- Whenever it's shooting with its executioner shotgun, operativos enemigos cannot be obscured.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, REVELATUM

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** in the first punto de inflexión.
If this operativo is wholly within your drop zone, it can immediately perform a free Reposicionar action.

Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

**SUPPORT**
Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of the punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo within 3" of this operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo,
you can use this effect. If you do:

- That operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, SUBDUCTOR

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

Whenever this operativo is using this weapon:

- Each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).
- If this operativo is retaliating, you resolve the first dados de ataque (i.e. defender instead of attacker).
You can ignore any changes to the Hit stat of this operativo's melee weapons.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, VIGILANT

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

This operativo can perform the Disparar action (excluding Vigilancia) while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, but only if it hasn't performed the Carga action during the activación,
or if it's a contrataque. Note this operativo isn't restricted from performing the Carga action after performing the Disparar action.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ARBITES, ARBITES, VOX-SIGNIFIER

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo is shooting (excluding with frag or krak grenades) and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, having other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly EXACTION SQUAD operativo visible to this operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, ARMSMAN

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER ARMSMAN operativo (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operativos in succession with this rule).
Ignore this rule when you are using the Breach and Clear faction rule.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, AXEJACK

abilities.description: Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on this operativo during a punto de inflexión in which it performed the Carga action, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, C.A.T. UNIT

abilities.description:
This operativo is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it's incapacitado, and when determining your starting number of operativos).
It's also ignored for victory conditions that require operativos to 'escape', 'survive' or be incapacitado (if it escapes/survives/is incapacitado, determining how many operativos must escape/survive/be incapacitado, etc.).

- This operativo cannot be activated or perform actions if it's dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER SURVEYOR operativo has been incapacitado. The punto de inflexión can end even if this operativo is still ready.
- This operativo cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Carrera, Retirada, Reposicionar and Spot.
- It cannot retaliate, assist in a Combatir, climb or jump.
- Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
- Whenever this operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Vantage terrain).
- Whenever determining what's visible to this operativo, draw the line from any part of the miniature.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of the punto de inflexión, until that operativo enemigo is no longer visible to this operativo or until this operativo performs this action again (whichever comes first),
whenever a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo, you can use this effect.
If you do:

- That operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Seek Light weapon rule.
- That operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, ENDURANT

abilities.description:
Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, they cannot select another friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo whose base is touching this operativo's if this operativo has an Engage order and is intervening.
This rule has no effect if more than one other operativo amigo's base is touching this operativo's.
This operativo can perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.
Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating with this weapon, each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, FLY, NAVIS, GHEISTSKULL

It's also ignored for victory conditions that require operativos to 'escape', 'survive' or be incapacitado (if it escapes/survives/is incapacitado, determining how many operativos must escape/survive/be incapacitado, etc.).

- This operativo cannot perform any actions other than Boost, Carga, Carrera, Retirada and Reposicionar.
- It cannot retaliate or assist in a Combatir.
- Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
- Whenever this operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Vantage terrain).

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Until the end of the activación, add 6" to this operativo's Move stat.  

This operativo can only perform this action once per battle, and cannot perform it during the first punto de inflexión.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, GRENADIER

abilities.description:
This operativo can use frag, krak and stun grenades (see universal equipment). Doing so doesn't count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other operativos).
Whenever this operativo is using a frag or krak grenade, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, GUNNER

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, HATCHCUTTER

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Place one of your Breach markers within this operativo's alcance de control as close as possible to a terrain feature dentro del alcance de control of it.
Whenever Un operativo is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible terrain.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a terrain feature isn't within its alcance de control.

Select a closed hatchway (e.g. zona de combate: Gallowdark) within this operativo's alcance de control. 1 additional AP must be spent for other operativos to perform the Operate Hatch action to open that hatchway.
This effect ends when that hatchway is opened. Note this operativo isn't affected by this effect.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if it isn't within 1" of a closed hatchway.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, SURVEYOR

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT operativo. That operativo can immediately perform one free action, but it cannot move more than 3" during that action.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT operativo isn't in the zona de combate.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo (excluding C.A.T. UNIT or GHEISTSKULL) visible to and within 6" of this operativo, or visible to and within 6" of a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER C.A.T. UNIT operativo.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat. For the purposes of the Comms Device universal equipment, the operativo the distance is being determined from must control that marker.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER, IMPERIUM, NAVIS, VOID-JAMMER

abilities.description: Don't select a valid target. Instead, a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER GHEISTSKULL operativo is always the primary target and cannot be in cover or obscured. If that operativo isn't in the zona de combate, you cannot select this weapon.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativo, if the ranged weapon in that sequence has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule (excluding weapons that have a sweeping profile),
you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa, or up to two of your dados de defensa if that operativo amigo is a GRENADIER.  

Friendly IMPERIAL NAVY BREACHER operativos aren't affected by the x" Devastating x weapon rule (i.e. Devastating with a distance) unless they are the target during that sequence.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 8" of a friendly GHEISTSKULL operativo. Roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if that operativo enemigo is a valid target for that friendly GHEISTSKULL operativo:
on a 3+, subtract 1 from that operativo enemigo's APL stat until the end of its next activación.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a friendly GHEISTSKULL operativo isn't in the zona de combate.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, MEDIC, COMBAT MEDIC

abilities.description:
The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly KASRKIN operativo would be removed from the zona de combate as incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo,
you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado and has 1 wound remaining. That operativo amigo can then immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control.
Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends.  

You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado.

Select one friendly KASRKIN operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, DEMO-TROOPER

abilities.description:
This operativo is carrying your Melta Mine marker.
It can perform the Recoger Marcador action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Colocar Marcador action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Carrera action.
That marker cannot be placed within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control (if this operativo is incapacitado while carrying that marker and that marker cannot be placed, it's removed with this operativo).

The first time your Melta Mine marker is within another operativo's alcance de control, remove that marker and inflict 2D6+3 damage on that operativo;
if it is not incapacitado, end its action (if any), even if that action's effects are not fulfilled.
If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount to do so.
Note that this operativo is ignored for these effects (i.e. it cannot set it off or take damage from that marker).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, GUNNER
INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, RECON-TROOPER

abilities.description:
Until the start of this operativo's next activación or until it is incapacitado (whichever comes first),
whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo within 8" of this operativo, that operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SHARPSHOOTER

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead.]
This is not cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, TROOPER

abilities.description:
You can do each of the following once per punto de inflexión:

- One friendly KASRKIN TROOPER operativo can perform the Smoke Grenade action.
- One friendly KASRKIN TROOPER operativo can perform the Stun Grenade action.

The rules for these actions are found in universal equipment. Performing these actions using this rule does not count towards their action limits (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment).

opTypes.keywords: INQUISITORIAL AGENT, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, VOX-TROOPER

abilities.description:
Select one other friendly KASRKIN operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3 after all APL stat changes have been totalled).


This operativo can perform this action twice during its activación, but cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

ploys.description:
Select one operativo enemigo and roll one D3. In the Firefight phase of this punto de inflexión, that operativo enemigo cannot be activated or perform actions until it is the last operativo enemigo to be activated,
or your opponent has activated a number of operativos enemigos equal to the result of the D3 (whichever comes first).
This ploy costs you 1 additional CP for each previous time you've used it during the battle (e.g. 1CP the first time you would use it, 2CP the second time, etc.).

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo that's within 3" of an objective marker, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
If that operativo amigo contests that marker, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa results of one result instead (e.g. results of 2).

Whenever you're selecting a valid target for a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo, operativos enemigos within 4" of it cannot be in cover (instead of 2").
While this can allow such operativos to be targeted (assuming they're visible), it doesn't remove their cover save (if any), unless the friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo is within 2" as normal.

Select one operativo enemigo to be your quarry for the punto de inflexión. Whenever a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against your quarry,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule. Whenever your quarry is incapacitado, you can select a new operativo enemigo to be your quarry (and can continue to do so during this punto de inflexión).  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Use this firefight ploy during the battle, when an opponent uses a strategy or firefight ploy (excluding Command Re-roll or one that costs 0CP).
Their ploy isn't used, the CP spent on it is refunded and they cannot use that ploy again during this punto de inflexión. This ploy cannot be used to stop the same ploy more than once per battle.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo visible to and within 3" of a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo, or visible to and within 6" of a friendly MYSTIC operativo, performs the Recoger Marcador or a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch).
Your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that operativo enemigo to perform that action (if they cannot or choose not to, the AP spent on it is refunded).

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo within 2" of a ready friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo performs an action in which it moves.
After it moves, that friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo can either perform a free Reposicionar action, but must end that move within 2" of that operativo enemigo, or a free Carga action, but must end that move dentro del alcance de control of that operativo enemigo.
If neither is possible, that operativo amigo cannot perform those actions, this ploy isn't used and the CP spent on it is refunded.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo is activated. Until the end of that operativo's activación, you can ignore any changes to its stats (including its weapons' stats).

equipments.description:
Once per battle, when a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo is activated, if you've used the Quarry strategy ploy during this punto de inflexión, you can use this rule.
If you do, you can select a new operativo enemigo to be your quarry until the end of the punto de inflexión.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo (excluding TOME-SKULL) that has a 5+ Save stat, you can retain one of your dados de defensa results of 4 as a éxito normal.

Friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativos have the following melee weapon. Whenever a friendly SISTER OF SILENCE operativo is using it, add 1 to its Atk stat. 

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Combat Dagger|3|4+|3/4|
Once per battle, one friendly INQUISITORIAL AGENT operativo can perform a mission action for 1 less AP.

description:
Amongst Cadia's most elite warriors, the Kasrkin are trained from birth in the art of war.
Clad in carapace armour and bearing a wide range of specialist wargear, they are the special forces of the Cadian regiments, tasked with completing nigh impossible missions in the defence and furtherance of the Imperial cause.
composition:
A KASRKIN KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 KASRKIN SERGEANT operativo with one of the following options:
  - Bolt pistol; power weapon
  - Hot-shot lasgun; gun butt
  - Hot-shot laspistol; power weapon
  - Plasma pistol; chainsword
- 9 KASRKIN operativos selected from the following list:
  - COMBAT MEDIC
  - DEMO-TROOPER
  - GUNNER with flamer and gun butt*
  - GUNNER with grenade launcher and gun butt*
  - GUNNER with hot-shot volley gun and gun butt*
  - GUNNER with meltagun and gun butt*
  - GUNNER with plasma gun and gun butt*
  - Reconocimiento-TROOPER
  - SHARPSHOOTER*
  - TROOPER
  - VOX-TROOPER

Other than TROOPER operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

*You cannot select more than four of these operativos combined.  

Some KASRKIN rules refer to a 'hot-shot weapon'. This is a ranged weapon that includes 'hot-shot' in its name, e.g. hot-shot lasgun, all profiles of a hot-shot marksman rifle, etc.

opTypes.keywords: KASRKIN, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, LEADER, SERGEANT

abilities.description:
**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select a SKILL AT ARMS for friendly KASRKIN operativos to have until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase.

- **Light 'Em Up**  
 Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is shooting , its ranged weapons have the Severe weapon rule if any of the following are true for the target:

- It's ready.
- It's not in cover.
- It's being scanned (see Reconocimiento-TROOPER).


- **Strike Fast**  
 Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is performing the Reposicionar action, add 1" to its Move stat.
- **Ice In Your Veins**  
 Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is fighting or retaliating, or Un operativo is shooting it, the first time an attack die inflicts Normal Dmg of 3 or more on this operativo during that sequence, that dice inflicts 1 less damage on it.
- **For Cadia!**  
 Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly KASRKIN operativos' melee weapons (to a maximum of 4). Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is fighting, the first time you strike during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage.

Select one friendly KASRKIN operativo, then select one SKILL AT ARMS for that operativo to have until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase. This can be in addition to any SKILL AT ARMS it already has, but they cannot be the same.  

Alternatively, instead of resolving the above effect, if your Clearance Sweep marker is in the zona de combate, you can remove it and place it again.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: KASRKIN, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, MEDIC, COMBAT MEDIC

abilities.description:
The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly KASRKIN operativo would be incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining, and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of that action. After that action, that operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control. Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends.  
 You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado, or if it is a Disparar action and this operativo would be a primary or secondary target.

 Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly KASRKIN operativos' melee weapons (to a maximum of 4). Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is fighting, the first time you strike during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage.

Select one friendly KASRKIN operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: KASRKIN, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, DEMO-TROOPER

abilities.description:
This operativo is carrying your Melta Mine marker.
It can perform the Recoger Marcador action on that marker, and whenever it performs the Colocar Marcador action on that marker, it can immediately perform a free Carrera action.
That marker cannot be placed within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control (if this operativo is incapacitado while carrying that marker and that marker cannot be placed, it's removed with this operativo).

The first time your Melta Mine marker is within another operativo's alcance de control, remove that marker and inflict 2D6+3 damage on that operativo;
if it is not incapacitado, end its action (if any), even if that action's effects are not fulfilled.
If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount to do so.
Note that this operativo is ignored for these effects (i.e. it cannot set it off or take damage from that marker).

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead.]
This is not cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

abilities.description:
You can do each of the following once per punto de inflexión:

- One friendly KASRKIN TROOPER operativo can perform the Smoke Grenade action.
- One friendly KASRKIN TROOPER operativo can perform the Stun Grenade action.

The rules for these actions are found in universal equipment. Performing these actions using this rule does not count towards their action limits (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment).

- **For Cadia!**  
 Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly KASRKIN operativos' melee weapons (to a maximum of 4). Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is fighting, the first time you strike during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage.

Select one other friendly KASRKIN operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3 after all APL stat changes have been totalled).


This operativo can perform this action twice during its activación, but cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

ploys.description: Place your Clearance Sweep marker in the zona de combate. Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo within 5" horizontally of that marker is shooting Un operativo also within 5" horizontally of that marker, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule. In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly KASRKIN operativo that's in cover, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.

Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is shooting with a hot-shot weapon against a target that's is either not in cover or is being scanned (see Reconocimiento-TROOPER), that weapon has the Piercing Crits 1 weapon rule, or Piercing 1 instead if it's a hot-shot volley gun.  
 **Piercing 1:** The defender collects 1 less Defence die.  
 **Piercing Crits 1:** If you retain any éxitos críticos, the defender collects 1 less Defence die.

Select one friendly KASRKIN operativo that is more than 3" from operativos enemigos.
That operativo, and each other friendly KASRKIN operativo that is both within 3" of that operativo and more than 3" from operativos enemigos,
can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice. You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly KASRKIN operativo performs the Retirada action while visible to and within 6" of another friendly KASRKIN operativo that is not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.
After that operativo amigo has finished moving, but before that Retirada action ends, that other operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Disparar action (you can change its order to Engage to do so).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly KASRKIN operativo's activación, or at the end of the Firefight phase.
Select one of your mission markers or an objective marker.
Until the end of that activación or until the start of the next punto de inflexión respectively, if the total APL of friendly KASRKIN operativos that contest that marker is 2,
and the total APL of operativos enemigos that contest it is the same, friendly KASRKIN operativos control that marker.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly KASRKIN operativo is shooting, after rolling your dados de ataque if it's shooting Un operativo that's either not in cover or is being scanned (see Reconocimiento-TROOPER). You can re-roll any of your dados de ataque.

Use this firefight ploy at the start of the Firefight phase. One friendly KASRKIN operativo can immediately perform a 1AP action for free, but it cannot move during that action. You cannot use this ploy if you're the player with initiative.

equipments.description:
Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is shooting Un operativo within 3" of it, ranged weapons on its datacard
(excluding weapons that include 'pistol' in their name, e.g. hot-shot laspistol, all profiles of a plasma pistol, etc.) have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.
Whenever a friendly KASRKIN operativo is shooting Un operativo more than 6" from it, that operativo amigo's hot-shot weapons have the Saturate weapon rule.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly KASRKIN operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a éxito normal instead.

Friendly KASRKIN operativos have the following melee weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Combat Dagger|3|4+|3/4|

description:
A Kommando is an Ork Boy specialist who prefers to rely on "kunning trikz" instead of fighting his opponents head-on like most other Greenskins.
  
  

Kommandoz serve as the Orks' infiltrators and saboteurs, and are masters of the arts of stealth, ambush, unconventional tactics and striking at the opponent from a totally unexpected quarter.
composition:
A KOMMANDOS KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 KOMMANDO Boss Nob operativo with one of the following options:
  - Slugga; Big Choppa
  - Slugga; Power Klaw
- 9 KOMMANDO operativos selected from the following list:
  - Bomb Squig (X)
  - Boy
  - Breacha Boy
  - Burna Boy
  - Comms Boy
  - Dakka Boy
  - Grot (X)
  - Rokkit Boy
  - Slasha Boy
  - Snipa Boy

Other than BOY operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

(X) These operativos count as half a selection each, meaning you can select both of them and it's treated as one selection in total.

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, BOSS NOB

abilities.description: Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

**SUPPORT** Select one other friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) visible to and within 6" of this operativo.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
This operativo can perform two Combatir actions during its activación

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, BOY

abilities.description: Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

You can do one of each of the following once per punto de inflexión:  - One friendly KOMMANDO BOY can perform the Smoke Grenade action - One friendly KOMMANDO BOY can perform the Stun Grenade action  The rules for these actions are found in universal equipment.  
 Performing these actions using this rule does not count towards their action limits (i.e, if you select those grenades from equipment).

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, GROT

abilities.description: This operativo cannot have an Engage order. Whenever this operativo is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g, Seek, Vantage Terrain) except being within 2".
Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

Selected a visible point on a terrain feature for this operativo.
Remove this operativo from the zona de combate and set it back up within 1" horizontally of that point in a location it can be placed, not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, and with that point visible to it.
The operativo cannot perform the Operate Hatch action during this action.  

This action is treated as a Reposicionar action.
This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or during an activación in which it performed the Carga or Retirada action (or vice-versa).

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, SLASHA BOY

abilities.description: After this operativo fights or rretaliates, if it was not incapacitado, you can inflict 1D3 damage on the operativo enemigo in that sequence.
Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, BREACHA BOY

abilities.description: Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

Place one of your Breach markers within this operativo's alcance de control as close as possible to a terrain feature dentro del alcance de control of it.
Whenever Un operativo is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible Terrain.
This operativo can perform this action during the Carga or Reposicionar action, and it can do so for 1 less AP during those actions.
Any remaining move distance can be used after it does so.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo or if a terrain feature is not within its alcance de control.

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, SNIPA BOY

abilities.description: Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, DAKKA BOY

abilities.description: Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

Perform a free Carrera action and a free Disparar action with this operativo in any order. You can only select a Dakka Shoota for that Disparar action.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo or while it has a Conceal order.

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, COMMS BOY

Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) visible to and within 6" of this operativo.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
