abilities.description: Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) can perform the Carga action while it has a conceal order.

opTypes.keywords: KOMMANDO, ORK, BOMB SQUIG

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is incapacitado during a battle in which it has not used its explosives, roll 1D6, or 2D6 if you wish.
If any result is a 4+, this operativo performs a free Disparar action with its explosives before it is removed from the zona de combate.

This operativo is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it is incapacitado, and when determining your starting number of operativos). It is also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs that require operativos to "escape", "survive", or be incapacitado by operativos enemigos (if it escapes/survives/is incapacitado, determining how many operativo must escape/survive/ be incapacitado, etc).

In the Firefight Phase, whenever you determine this operativo's order, you cannot select Conceal.
This operativo cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Carrera, Combatir, Reposicionar and Disparar, or use any weapons that are not on its data card.

ploys.description:
Friendly KOMMANDO operativos' ranged weapons have the Punishing weapon Rule.  
**Punishing:** If you retain any éxitos críticos, you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly KOMMANDO operativo that has a Conceal order, you can retain one of your dados de defensa as a éxito normal without rolling it (in addition to a cover save, if any).

Each friendly KOMMANDO operativo that is not a valid target for operativos enemigos, or has a conceal order and is more than 6" from operativos enemigos, can immediately perform a free Carrera action. You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.

Friendly KOMMANDO operativos' melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.
Use this firefight ploy when an dados de ataque inflicts Normal Damage on a friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG and GROT). Ignore that inflicted damage.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly KOMMANDO operativo that has a Conceal order is fighting during an activación in which it has performed the Carga action, you're resolving the first attack die and it is a strike with a éxito normal.
Treat that éxito normal as a éxito crítico instead.
Use this firefight ploy at the end of the Firefight phase. Select one friendly KOMMANDO operativo. It can immediately perform a free Combatir action.
Use this firefight ploy when a friendly Kommando operativo is activated, or when its APL stat is changed. Until the start of the next punto de inflexión, you can ignore any changes to its APL stat.

equipments.description:
Friendly KOMMANDO operativos (excluding BOMB SQUIG and GROT) have the following melee weapon. Note that some operativos already have this weapon but with better stats, in that instance, use the better version.
 
|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Choppa|3|3+|4/5|
Remove the Range weapon rule from the following ranged weapons that friendly KOMMANDO operativos have: - Shokka Pistol - Slugga

Once per battle, a friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG and GROT) can use the following Ranged Weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Dynamite|5|4+|4/5|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Range 4", Blast 1", Heavy (RepositionOnly), Saturate|

Once per punto de inflexión, a friendly KOMMANDO operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG and GROT) can use the following Ranged Weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Harpoon|4|4+|4/5|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Range 8", Lethal 5+, Stun|

description:
Legionary kill teams are bitter veterans who possess centuries of combat experience. Some are little more than
ravening killers who desire only to reave, slaughter and despoil. Others are devoted worshippers of the Dark Gods,
seeking to conduct fell rituals in the hope of pleasing their infernal patrons and attaining greater power.
composition:
A LEGIONARIES KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 LEGIONARY operativo selected from the following list:
  - ASPIRING CHAMPION with one option from each of the following:
    - Plasma pistol or tainted bolt pistol
    - Power fist, power maul, power weapon or tainted chainsword  
  - CHOSEN with one of the following options:
    - Plasma pistol; daemon blade
    - Tainted bolt pistol; daemon blade
- 5 LEGIONARY operativos selected from the following list:
  - ANOINTED
  - BALEFIRE ACOLYTE
  - BUTCHER
  - ICON BEARER with one of the following options:
    - Boltgun; fists
    - Bolt pistol; chainsword  
  - SHRIVETALON
    - WARRIOR with one of the following options:
    - Boltgun; fists
    - Bolt pistol; chainsword    
  - GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Bolt pistol; flamer; fists
      - Bolt pistol; meltagun; fists
      - Bolt pistol; plasma gun; fists   
  - HEAVY GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - Bolt pistol; heavy bolter; fists
    - Bolt pistol; missile launcher; fists
    - Bolt pistol; reaper chaincannon; fists

Other than WARRIOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: LEGIONARY, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, LEADER, ASPIRING CHAMPION

abilities.description:
During each friendly LEGIONARY operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or tainted bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.  

Each friendly LEGIONARY operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

abilities.abilityName: In The Eyes Of The Gods
abilities.description: Once during each of this operativo's activations, if it incapacitates an operativo enemigo, add 1 to its APL stat until the end of that activación.

Whenever you select a LEGIONARY operativo for the battle, you must select one of the following keywords for it to have for that battle: KHORNE, NURGLE, SLAANESH, TZEENTCH, UNDIVIDED.
Each operativo's keyword can be different, but a BALEFIRE ACOLYTE operativo cannot have the KHORNE keyword.  

Friendly LEGIONARY operativos have an additional rule determined by this keyword. In addition, LEGIONARY ploys have additional benefits for operativos with the relevant keyword.

options.description:
This operativo's melee weapons have the Severe weapon rule.  
**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.
Whenever Normal Dmg of 3 or more is inflicted on this operativo, roll one D6: on a 5+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.
Add 1" to this operativo's Move stat.

This operativo's ranged weapons have the Severe weapon rule.  
**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.
Whenever this operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo within 6" of it, this operativo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: LEGIONARY, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, LEADER, CHOSEN

abilities.description:
During each friendly LEGIONARY operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or tainted bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.  

Each friendly LEGIONARY operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever an operativo enemigo performs the Retirada action while dentro del alcance de control of this operativo, you can use this rule.
If you do, roll one D6: on a 3+, that operativo enemigo cannot perform that action during that activación/contrataque (the AP spent on it is refunded).

Whenever you select a LEGIONARY operativo for the battle, you must select one of the following keywords for it to have for that battle: KHORNE, NURGLE, SLAANESH, TZEENTCH, UNDIVIDED.
Each operativo's keyword can be different, but a BALEFIRE ACOLYTE operativo cannot have the KHORNE keyword.  

Friendly LEGIONARY operativos have an additional rule determined by this keyword. In addition, LEGIONARY ploys have additional benefits for operativos with the relevant keyword.
After this operativo fights or retaliates, if it is not incapacitado, but it incapacitado an operativo enemigo during that sequence, it regains D3+1 lost wounds.

Each friendly LEGIONARY operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Once per battle, when this operativo is activated, you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of the battle:  - This operativo cannot perform the Recoger Marcador or mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch). If it's carrying a marker, it must immediately perform the Colocar Marcador action for 0AP (this takes precedence over all other rules). - Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on this operativo.  
If this operativo has the NURGLE keyword, you cannot reduce the damage of an dados de ataque by more than 1. In other words, you cannot use both rules to reduce Normal Dmg of 4 or more by 2. - Its daemonic claw has the Ceaseless and Lethal 5+ weapon rules.

If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or tainted bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.  

Each friendly LEGIONARY operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, if this operativo controls an objective marker that isn't tainted, that objective marker is tainted for the battle and you gain 1CP. Note that if any operativo (including operativos enemigos) has tainted an objective marker, you cannot taint that objective marker.
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 higher. Note this is not a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

Whenever you select a LEGIONARY operativo for the battle, you must select one of the following keywords for it to have for that battle: KHORNE, NURGLE, SLAANESH, TZEENTCH, UNDIVIDED.

During each friendly LEGIONARY operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or tainted bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.  

Each friendly LEGIONARY operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever this operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo while fighting or retaliating, select one other operativo enemigo visible to and within 3" of either this operativo or the incapacitado enemy
operativo. Subtract 1 from that operativo enemigo's APL stat until the end of its next activación.

Whenever you select a LEGIONARY operativo for the battle, you must select one of the following keywords for it to have for that battle: KHORNE, NURGLE, SLAANESH, TZEENTCH, UNDIVIDED.
Each operativo's keyword can be different, but a BALEFIRE ACOLYTE operativo cannot have the KHORNE keyword.  

Friendly LEGIONARY operativos have an additional rule determined by this keyword. In addition, LEGIONARY ploys have additional benefits for operativos with the relevant keyword.
Whenever this operativo is retaliating, you resolve the first dados de ataque (i.e. defender instead of attacker).

Place your Grisly marker within this operativo's alcance de control.

- Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 3" of your Grisly marker, your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that operativo enemigo to perform the Recoger Marcador and mission actions.
- Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of operativos enemigos that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those operativos enemigos is within 3" of your Grisly marker.
Note this is not a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Once per battle, when a friendly LEGIONARY WARRIOR operativo is activated, you can use this rule. If you do, change that operativo's Marks of Chaos keyword.

ploys.description: Whenever a friendly LEGIONARY operativo (excluding KHORNE) is fighting, the first time you strike during that sequence, inflict 1 additional damage (to a maximum of 7).    Add 1 to both Dmg stats of friendly LEGIONARY KHORNE operativos' melee weapons (to a maximum of 7).

Whenever a friendly LEGIONARY operativo is shooting a ready operativo enemigo, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.   
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a ready friendly LEGIONARY TZEENTCH operativo, in the Roll dados de defensa step, if you retain any éxitos críticos, you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.   
 
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly LEGIONARY operativo, weapons with the Piercing 1 weapon rule have the Piercing Crits 1 weapon rule instead.

You can ignore any changes to the stats of friendly LEGIONARY NURGLE operativos from being injured (including their weapons' stats).

Whenever a friendly LEGIONARY operativo that performed an action in which it moved during this punto de inflexión is fighting, worsen the Hit stat of the operativo enemigo's melee weapons by 1.  
 Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly LEGIONARY SLAANESH operativo more than 6" from it that performed an action in which it moved during this punto de inflexión, worsen the Hit stat of the operativo enemigo's weapons by 1.  
 In all cases for this ploy, this is not cumulative with being injured.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly LEGIONARY NURGLE operativo is performing the Disparar action, when you select a valid target.
Until the end of that action, whenever that operativo amigo is shooting an operativo enemigo within 3" of it (i.e. including secondary targets, if any),
that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Piercing 1 weapon rule.  

**Piercing 1:** The defender collects 1 less Defence die.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly LEGIONARY TZEENTCH operativo is activated. Until the end of that operativo's activación, add 1 to its APL stat, but it cannot perform the same action more than once during that activación.
If it's a WARRIOR operativo, that operativo's Marks of Chaos keyword cannot be changed during this punto de inflexión (see Infernal Pact additional rule).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly LEGIONARY SLAANESH operativo's activación, before or after it performs an action.
Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 4" of that operativo amigo. Until the end of that operativo enemigo's next activación, subtract 1 from its APL stat.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly LEGIONARY KHORNE operativo is incapacitado while fighting or retaliating.  

You can strike the operativo enemigo in that sequence with one of your unresolved successes before it's removed from the zona de combate.

equipments.description: **STRATEGIC GAMBIT** Select one friendly LEGIONARY operativo. Until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, change that operativo's Save stat to 2+.

Friendly LEGIONARY operativos have the following melee weapon for the battle:
|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Malefic Blade|5|3+|3/4|

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly LEGIONARY operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a bolt pistol or boltgun, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Rending weapon rule.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT**
Select one Marks of Chaos keyword.
Once during each of their activations, when a friendly LEGIONARY operativo that has that keyword is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails,
you can inflict D3 damage on that operativo amigo to discard one of them and retain the other as a éxito normal instead.
Note that if it is the Disparar action and that damage incapacitates that operativo amigo, the action does not end (continue the sequence with your successful dados de ataque).

description:
The Mandrakes can be found in Aelindrach, a region of Commorragh. Literally fallen into shadow, it is one of the several districts of Commorragh that exists in more than one dimension at once. In Aelindrach, shadows thicken and writhe as living things, flowing into one another and attempting to capture those that venture into the district.
  
  

It is in Aelindrach that Mandrakes and Shaderavens make their lairs. Rumour has it that somewhere in Aelindrach lies a portal to a world where shade-daemons exist who can freeze the soul with but a touch.
composition:
A MANDRAKE killteam is composed of:

- 1 MANDRAKE Nightfiend
- 8 MANDRAKE operativos selected from the following list:  
  - Abyssal
  - Chooser of the Flesh
  - Dirgemaw
  - Shadeweaver
  - Warrior

Other than Warrior operativos, your Killteam can only include each operativo once.

opTypes.keywords: MANDRAKE, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, LEADER, NIGHTFIEND

abilities.description: Whenever your opponent would activate an operativo enemigo within 6" of this operativo, you can roll one die (you cannot do so if you also interrupted that operativo's activación with the DIRGEMAW operativo's Haunting Focus additional rule during this punto de inflexión). If the result is higher than the operativo enemigo's APL stat, they cannot activate it during this activación. If there are no other operativos enemigos eligible to be activated, this rule has no effect.

Whenever this operativo is readied, or if this operativo incapacitates an enemy with its huskblade, its Oubliex becomes active.
Whenever its oubliex is active and an dados de ataque would inflict damage on this operativo, you can roll one d6, on a 5+ ignore the damage inflicted from that dados de ataque and the oubliex is no longer active.

Once per punto de inflexión, one friendly MANDRAKE operativo WITHIN SHADOW can use a SHADOW PASSAGE when it performs the Reposicionar action. If it does, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up WITHIN SHADOW. When you set it back up it cannot:  - Be dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. - Be a valid target for an operativo enemigo. - Perform the Disparar or Combatir action until the start of the next punto de inflexión.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly MANDRAKE operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule. Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is WITHIN SHADOW, improve its Save stat by 1.

Un operativo is WITHIN SHADOW if any of the following are true:

- It is within 1" of Heavy Terrain that is not lower than it.
- Any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
- A Shadow Portal marker is within its alcance de control (See SHADEWEAVER operativo).

opTypes.keywords: MANDRAKE, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, CHOOSER OF THE FLESH

abilities.description: Whenever an operativo enemigo performs the Retirada action while dentro del alcance de control of this operativo, you can use this rule. If you do, inflict 2D3 damage on that operativo enemigo before it moves.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is incapacitado as a result of this operativo's Part Collector rule or Baleblade, you gain 1 Soul Harvest point, or 2 if the operativo enemigo had an APL stat of 3 or more.
Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is activated, you can spend 1 of your Soul Harvest points to either add 1 to its APL stat until the end of the battle, or to have it regain 2D3 lost wounds.
Note you can spend your Soul Harvest points even if this operativo is incapacitado.

Once per punto de inflexión, one friendly MANDRAKE operativo WITHIN SHADOW can use a SHADOW PASSAGE when it performs the Reposicionar action. If it does, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up WITHIN SHADOW. When you set it back up it cannot:  - Be dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. - Be a valid target for an operativo enemigo. - Perform the Disparar or Combatir action until the start of the next punto de inflexión.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly MANDRAKE operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule. Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is WITHIN SHADOW, improve its Save stat by 1.

Un operativo is WITHIN SHADOW if any of the following are true:

- It is within 1" of Heavy Terrain that is not lower than it.
- Any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
- A Shadow Portal marker is within its alcance de control (See SHADEWEAVER operativo).

opTypes.keywords: MANDRAKE, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, ABYSSAL

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo that has one of your Balefire tokens add 1 to both DMG stats of that operativo amigo's ranged weapons and they have the Saturate weapon rule.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly MANDRAKE operativo that has one of your Balefire tokens, subtract 1 from both DMG stats of that operativo's ranged weapons (to a minimum of 1).

Once per punto de inflexión, one friendly MANDRAKE operativo WITHIN SHADOW can use a SHADOW PASSAGE when it performs the Reposicionar action. If it does, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up WITHIN SHADOW. When you set it back up it cannot:  - Be dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. - Be a valid target for an operativo enemigo. - Perform the Disparar or Combatir action until the start of the next punto de inflexión.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly MANDRAKE operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule. Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is WITHIN SHADOW, improve its Save stat by 1.

Un operativo is WITHIN SHADOW if any of the following are true:

- It is within 1" of Heavy Terrain that is not lower than it.
- Any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
- A Shadow Portal marker is within its alcance de control (See SHADEWEAVER operativo).

Select one operativo visible to this operativo that does not have one of your Balefire tokens.
Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it is incapacitado, or until it performs this action again (Whichever comes first), that selected operativo gains one of your Balefire tokens.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: MANDRAKE, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, DIRGEMAW

abilities.description: Select one operativo enemigo. Until the ready step of the next strategy phase, it gains your Haunting Focus token. The next time your opponent would activate an operativo enemigo that has your Haunting Focus token, if this operativo is ready, you can activate this operativo first (you cannot do so if you also rolled to prevent that operativo's activación with the NIGHTFIEND operativo's Harrowing Whispers additional rule during this punto de inflexión). If you do, during that activación, this operativo must Combatir against or Disparar against that operativo enemigo, and cannot do so against any other operativos enemigos until it does (if this is not possible, the activación is cancelled). After completing this operativo's activación, your opponent activates that operativo enemigo (if possible), or activates a different operativo enemigo if they can't.

Once per punto de inflexión, one friendly MANDRAKE operativo WITHIN SHADOW can use a SHADOW PASSAGE when it performs the Reposicionar action. If it does, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up WITHIN SHADOW. When you set it back up it cannot:  - Be dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. - Be a valid target for an operativo enemigo. - Perform the Disparar or Combatir action until the start of the next punto de inflexión.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly MANDRAKE operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule. Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is WITHIN SHADOW, improve its Save stat by 1.

Un operativo is WITHIN SHADOW if any of the following are true:

- It is within 1" of Heavy Terrain that is not lower than it.
- Any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
- A Shadow Portal marker is within its alcance de control (See SHADEWEAVER operativo).

Select one operativo enemigo that is a valid target for this operativo or is WITHIN SHADOW.
Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it is incapacitado, or until it performs this action again (whichever comes first),
worsen the HIT stat of that operativo enemigo's weapons by 1 and subtract 2" from its Move stat (these are not cumulative with being injured).
In addition, that operativo enemigo's APL stat cannot be added to (remove all positive APL stat changes it has).

opTypes.keywords: MANDRAKE, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, SHADEWEAVER

abilities.description: Once per punto de inflexión, one friendly MANDRAKE operativo WITHIN SHADOW can use a SHADOW PASSAGE when it performs the Reposicionar action. If it does, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up WITHIN SHADOW. When you set it back up it cannot:  - Be dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. - Be a valid target for an operativo enemigo. - Perform the Disparar or Combatir action until the start of the next punto de inflexión.

Whenever this operativo performs the Reposicionar action using a SHADOW PASSAGE, you can use this rule.
If you do so, remove your Shadow Portal markers from the zona de combate (if any), then place one of your Shadow Portal markers within this operativo's alcance de control before it is removed
and one within its alcance de control after it is set up.  

Each friendly MANDRAKE operativo can use a SHADOW PASSAGE each punto de inflexión (taking precedence over one operativo once per punto de inflexión)
if one of your Shadow Portal markers is within that operativo's alcance de control when it is removed, and the other when it is set up.
Note that operativos amigos can do this even if this operativo has been incapacitado, and doing so does not prevent the operativo from using a SHADOW PASSAGE in the normal manner.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly MANDRAKE operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule. Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is WITHIN SHADOW, improve its Save stat by 1.

Un operativo is WITHIN SHADOW if any of the following are true:

- It is within 1" of Heavy Terrain that is not lower than it.
- Any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
- A Shadow Portal marker is within its alcance de control (See SHADEWEAVER operativo).

Remove your Weave Darkness marker from the zona de combate (if any).
Then place your Weave Darkness marker visible to this operativo, or on vantage terrain of a feature visible to this operativo.
That marker creates an area of smoke with the same size and effects of a smoke grenade, except you do not remove it during the following punto de inflexión.
If this operativo is incapacitado, remove your Weave Darkness marker from the zona de combate.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: MANDRAKE, AELDARI, DRUKHARI, WARRIOR

abilities.description: Once per punto de inflexión, one friendly MANDRAKE operativo WITHIN SHADOW can use a SHADOW PASSAGE when it performs the Reposicionar action. If it does, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up WITHIN SHADOW. When you set it back up it cannot:  - Be dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. - Be a valid target for an operativo enemigo. - Perform the Disparar or Combatir action until the start of the next punto de inflexión.
Whenever this operativo is WITHIN SHADOW, add 1 to the critical damage stat of its Glimmersteel Blade.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly MANDRAKE operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule. Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is WITHIN SHADOW, improve its Save stat by 1.

Un operativo is WITHIN SHADOW if any of the following are true:

- It is within 1" of Heavy Terrain that is not lower than it.
- Any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
- A Shadow Portal marker is within its alcance de control (See SHADEWEAVER operativo).

ploys.description: Each friendly MANDRAKE operativo can perform the Carga action while it has a Conceal order if it starts or ends that action WITHIN SHADOW.

After each operativo enemigo's activación, before the next operativo is activated, you can perform a free Carrera action with one friendly MANDRAKE operativo that has a Conceal order if it starts and ends that action WITHIN SHADOW.
You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión, and each operativo amigo can only be selected for this ploy once per punto de inflexión.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly MANDRAKE operativo that is WITHIN SHADOW, you can retain one of your dados de defensa as a éxito normal without rolling it (In addition to a cover save, if any).
Whenever a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if it is WITHIN SHADOW you can re-roll one of your dados de ataque.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly MANDRAKE operativo's activación, when it performs an action in which it moves. Until the end of that activación, that operativo can move through parts of terrain features as if they were not there, but must end those moves in a location it can be placed.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo performs the Combatir action in an activación in which it has performed the Carga action,
and selects a friendly MANDRAKE operativo WITHIN SHADOW to Combatir against.
In the Resolve dados de ataque step of that sequence, you resolve the first dados de ataque (i.e, defender instead of attacker).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo within 6" of it, at the end of the Resolve dados de ataque Step.
That operativo amigo regains a number of lost wounds equal to that operativo enemigo's APL stat, multiplied by the number of your dados de ataque that inflicted damage during that sequence.
Excess dados de ataque are ignore (i.e, if the operativo enemigo is incapacitado before remaining dados de ataque are resolved).  

You cannot use this ploy if that friendly MANDRAKE operativo is incapacitado.

Use this firefight ploy at the end of any operativo's activación.
Select one friendly MANDRAKE operativo that has an Engage order and is WITHIN SHADOW.
Change that operativo's order to Conceal.

equipments.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, a friendly MANDRAKE operativo can use the following ranged weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Bone Dart|4|3+|2/4|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Range 6", Rending, Silent|

Whenever an operativo enemigo would perform the Retirada action while dentro del alcance de control of a friendly MANDRAKE operativo,
if no other operativos enemigos are within that operativo amigo's alcance de control, you can use this rule.
If you do, roll 2D6, or 1D6 if that operativo enemigo has a higher Wounds stat than that operativo amigo.
If any result is a 4+, that enemy cannot perform that action during that activación or contrataque (No AP are spent on it).

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is activated WITHIN SHADOW, you can use this rule. If you do, until the start of its next activación, while that operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g, Seek, Vantage Point) except being within 2".

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly MANDRAKE operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a Baleblast, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Blast 1" rule.

description:
The Night Lords are synonymous with terror and murder, for their favoured mode of warfare is the unfettered application of brutal, overwhelming force. They show no mercy whatsoever, eschewing all subtlety and guile for wanton bloodshed and destruction.
  
  

The Night Lords do not worship any of the four major Chaos Gods individually, but acknowledge them equally in the form of Chaos Undivided as they ruthlessly spread terror and fear amongst the galaxy's inhabitants. The Night Lords are experts in the use of terror tactics to win battles and demoralise their foes before the main combat even begins.
composition:
A NEMESIS CLAW KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 NEMESIS CLAW Visionary with one of the following options:
  - Bolt pistol, power fist
  - Bolt pistol, power maul
  - Bolt pistol, power weapon
  - Plasma Pistol, Nostraman Chainblade
- 5 Nemesis Claw operativos selected from the following list:
  - Fearmonger
  - Gunner with one of the following options:
    - Bolt Pistol, Flamer, Fists
      - Bolt Pistol, Meltagun, Fists
      - Bolt Pistol, Plasma Gun, Fists   
  - Heavy Gunner with one of the following options:
    - Bolt Pistol, Heavy Bolter, Fists
    - Bolt Pistol, Missile Launcher, Fists    
  - Screecher
  - Skinthief
  - Ventrilokar
  - Warrior with one of the following options:
    - Bolt pistol, Chainsword
    - Boltgun, Fists

opTypes.keywords: NEMESIS CLAW, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, LEADER, PSYKER, VISIONARY

abilities.description:
During each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or scoped bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.
Each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo amigo is obscured if both of the following are true:  - It is more than 8" from operativos enemigos it is visible to. - It has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.

*PSYCHIC*    In the ready step of each Strategy phase, you gain 1D3 Prescience points. At the end of each punto de inflexión, discard your Prescience points. You can spend your Prescience points in the Firefight phase as follows (you cannot use each of the following rules more than once per punto de inflexión).  - Foreboding: *PSYCHIC* Whenever it is your turn to activate a operativo amigo, you can spend 1 of your Prescience points to skip that activación. - Portent: *PSYCHIC* Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts normal damage on this operativo, you can spend 1 of your Prescience points to ignore that inflicted damage.  You cannot gain or spend your Prescience points if this operativo is incapacitado.

*PSYCHIC* Spend 1 of your Prescience points to gain 1CP.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or during an activación in which it performed the Carga or Retirada action (or vice-versa).

opTypes.keywords: NEMESIS CLAW, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, FEARMONGER

abilities.description:
During each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or scoped bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.
Each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo amigo is obscured if both of the following are true:  - It is more than 8" from operativos enemigos it is visible to. - It has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
Whenever Un operativo that has one of your Terrorchem tokens is activated, inflict 1D3 damage on it.

Select one objective marker this operativo controls to gain one of your Terrorchem tokens.
It cannot be an objective marker dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or one that already has one of your Terrorchem tokens.
The first time that objective marker is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo that does not have one of your Terrorchem tokens, that operativo gains that Terrorchem token, then inflicts 2D3 damage on it
(if it is during an action, at the end of that action).

opTypes.keywords: NEMESIS CLAW, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, GUNNER

abilities.description:
During each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or scoped bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.
Each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo amigo is obscured if both of the following are true:  - It is more than 8" from operativos enemigos it is visible to. - It has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.

opTypes.keywords: NEMESIS CLAW, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, HEAVY GUNNER

abilities.description:
During each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or scoped bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.
Each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo amigo is obscured if both of the following are true:  - It is more than 8" from operativos enemigos it is visible to. - It has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.

opTypes.keywords: NEMESIS CLAW, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, SCREECHER

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo is fighting against a wounded operativo enemigo, this operativo's lightning claws gain the Lethal 4+ weapon Rule.

During each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or scoped bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.
Each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo amigo is obscured if both of the following are true:  - It is more than 8" from operativos enemigos it is visible to. - It has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
Whenever an operativo enemigo within 3" of this operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque.

opTypes.keywords: NEMESIS CLAW, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, SKINTHIEF

abilities.description:
During each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or scoped bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.
Each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Once per punto de inflexión, when this operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo within its alcance de control, you can select one other operativo enemigo visible to and within 6" of either this operativo or the incapacitado operativo.
Until the start of the next punto de inflexión, that other operativo enemigo cannot control markers or perform the Recoger Marcador or mission actions.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo amigo is obscured if both of the following are true:  - It is more than 8" from operativos enemigos it is visible to. - It has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.
Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating, Normal and Critical damage of 3 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

opTypes.keywords: NEMESIS CLAW, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, VENTRILOKAR

abilities.description:
During each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or scoped bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.
Each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 higher. Note this is not a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo amigo is obscured if both of the following are true:  - It is more than 8" from operativos enemigos it is visible to. - It has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.

*PSYCHIC*  

Select one operativo enemigo within 6" of this operativo, then select one of the following for that operativo enemigo (you can only select each option once per battle):

- Until the end of the next activación, subtract 1 from its APL stat
- Change its order
- Perform a free Carrera with it (specify the location for your opponent to move it to)

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: NEMESIS CLAW, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
During each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or scoped bolt pistol must be selected for at least one of them.
Each friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

Whenever this operativo is shooting against, fighting against, or retaliating against an injured operativo enemigo, or an operativo enemigo that has a wounds stat of 7 or less, its weapons have the Lethal 5+ rule.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo amigo is obscured if both of the following are true:  - It is more than 8" from operativos enemigos it is visible to. - It has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base is underneath Vantage terrain.

ploys.description:
Whenever you are selecting a valid target for a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, operativos enemigos within 6" cannot use Light terrain for cover.
While this can allow such operativos to be targeted (assuming they are visible), it does not remove their cover save (if any).

One friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo can immediately perform a free Retirada or Reposicionar action, but it must end that move with Heavy terrain within its alcance de control, or any part of its base underneath Vantage terrain. In addition, it cannot move more than 4" during that action and it cannot end that move closer to operativos enemigos (in a zona de combate that uses the close quarters rules, e.g. zona de combate: Gallowdark, ignore Wall terrain when determining this).
Whenever a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a wounded operativo enemigo, you can re-roll one of your dados de ataque.

Whenever a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo is activated, if the first action it performs during that activación is the Carga action, when it ends its move during that action, you can inflict D3 damage on one operativo enemigo within its alcance de control.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo is retaliating, at the start of the Resolve dados de ataque step.
You can resolve one of your successes before the normal order. If you do you cannot resolve any other successes during that sequence.

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dados de ataque for a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, if it's shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that has the IMPERIUM keyword. That operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule until the end of the sequence; if that operativo enemigo also has the Adeptus Astartes keyword, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Relentless weapon rule until the end of that sequence instead.  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)  
**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dados de ataque.

Use this firefight ploy after a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo whin its alcance de control.
That operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carga or Carrera action (for the former, it cannot move more than 3") even if it has performed an action that prevents it from performing the Carga or Carrera action.

Use this firefight ploy when your opponent would activate an operativo enemigo that's visible to a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo. Roll one D6; if the result is higher than that operativo enemigo's APL stat, your opponent cannot activate it during this activación; if the result is less than or equal to that operativo enemigo's APL stat, this ploy isn't used, the CP spent on it is refunded and you cannot use this ploy again during this punto de inflexión. If there are no other operativos enemigos eligible to be activated, this ploy has no effect.

equipments.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo would perform the Retirada action while dentro del alcance de control of a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, if no other operativos enemigos are within that operativo amigo's alcance de control, you can use this rule.
If you do, roll 2D6, or 1D6 if that operativo enemigo has a higher Wounds stat than that operativo amigo.
If any result is a 4+, that operativo enemigo cannot perform that action during that activación or contrataque (No AP are spent on it).

Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 3" of a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo, that operativo enemigo's APL stat cannot be added to. Note that this does not affect APL stats that have already been changed.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo within 2" of it, your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque results of 1.

Once per Battle, when a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo within 2" of it, you can use this rule.
If you do, that operativo amigo gains one of your Grisly Trophy tokens (if it does not already have one).
Whenever a friendly NEMESIS CLAW operativo that has one of your Grisly Trophy tokens is visible to and within 2" of an operativo enemigo, subtract 1 from the ATK stat of that operativo enemigo's weapons.

description: Non-player operativos for joint operations in KT2024.

abilities.description:
When activated, if this NPO can perform either of its first two actions during that activación, give it an Engage order. If it cannot, give it a Conceal order.

- Combatir
- Carga the closest operativo enemigo via the shortest possible route
- Reposicionar toward the closest operativo enemigo, to cover if possible (a subsequent Carrera action can fulfil this, if able)
- Carrera towards the closest operativo enemigo, to cover if possible

When activated, if this NPO can perform either of its first two actions during that activación, give it an Engage order. If it cannot, give it a Conceal order.

- Combatir
- Carga the closest operativo enemigo via the shortest possible route
- Reposicionar toward the closest operativo enemigo, to cover if possible (a subsequent Carrera action can fulfil this, if able)
- Carrera towards the closest operativo enemigo, to cover if possible
This operativo can perform two Combatir actions during its activación.

When activated, if this NPO can perform either of its first two actions during that activación, give it an Engage order. If it cannot, give it a Conceal order.

- Combatir
- Carga the closest operativo enemigo via the shortest possible route
- Reposicionar toward the closest operativo enemigo, to cover if possible (a subsequent Carrera action can fulfil this, if able)
- Carrera towards the closest operativo enemigo, to cover if possible

When activated, if this NPO can perform the Disparar action during that activación, give it an Engage order. If it cannot, give it a Conceal order.

- Retirada to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO
- Disparar
- Reposicionar to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO (a subsequent Carrera action can fulfil these, if able)
- Carrera to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO
Only 1 in 3 Marksman Trooper operativos can have this weapon.

When activated, if this NPO can perform the Disparar action during that activación, give it an Engage order. If it cannot, give it a Conceal order.

- Retirada to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO
- Disparar
- Reposicionar to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO (a subsequent Carrera action can fulfil these, if able)
- Carrera to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO
This operativo can perform two Disparar actions during its activación.

When activated, if this NPO can perform the Disparar action during that activación, give it an Engage order. If it cannot, give it a Conceal order.

- Retirada to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO
- Disparar
- Reposicionar to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO (a subsequent Carrera action can fulfil these, if able)
- Carrera to cover. If possible, to a location where there is a valid target that is not obscured. If not, where there is an objective marker visible to this NPO

This operativo cannot move, have an Engage order, be readied or be activated. Whenever an NPO would activate, if this operativo has reloaded (see below) and there's a valid target for it, perform the Disparar action with this operativo instead of activating an NPO, then it has no longer reloaded.

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, this operativo has reloaded. Each time after this operativo performs the Disparar action, roll one D6: after a number of player operativos have been activated this punto de inflexión equal to the result, this operativo has reloaded.

Whenever this operativo is shooting, operativos cannot be obscured. Whenever determining visibility from this operativo (but not to it), the line can also be drawn from any part of the Vantage terrain it's on, or the rampart touching that Vantage terrain.

description:
New inductees into the ranks of the Adepta Sororitas, Sisters Novitiate who display great zeal and determination are
often deployed together in kill teams to hunt down apostates or root out heretics. In performing such duties, they may one day rise to become full Sisters, spreading the Emperor's light ever further.
composition:
A NOVITIATES killteam is composed of:

- 1 NOVITIATE SUPERIOR operativo with one of the following options:
  - Plasma pistol; power weapon
  - Relic boltgun; gun butt
  - Relic bolt pistol; power weapon
- 9 NOVITIATE operativos selected from the following list:
  - CONDEMNOR
  - DIALOGUS
  - DUELLIST
  - EXACTOR
  - HOSPITALLER
  - PENITENT
  - PRECEPTOR
  - PRONATUS
  - PURGATUS
  - RELIQUARIUS
  - MILITANT with one of the following options:
    - Autopistol; Novitiate blade
    - Autogun; gun butt

Other than MILITANT and PURGATUS operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to two PURGATUS operativos.

opTypes.keywords: NOVITIATE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, LEADER, SUPERIOR

abilities.description:
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you gain a number of Faith points equal to half the number of friendly NOVITIATE operativos that have not been incapacitado (rounding up).
Whenever a friendly NOVITIATE operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, or Un operativo is shooting it, in the Roll dados de ataque (or Roll dados de defensa step if Un operativo is shooting it),
you can spend your Faith points to use one ACT OF FAITH.  

You cannot use more than one ACT OF FAITH per sequence, and their costs and effects are as follows:  


- **GUIDANCE - 1 FAITH POINT**  
You can re-roll one of your dice.
- **BLESSING - 2 FAITH POINTS**  
 You can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.
- **INTERVENTION - 3 FAITH POINTS**  
You can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.

Whenever this operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo, you gain 1 Faith point, or 2 Faith points if that operativo enemigo had a Wounds stat of 12 or more.
This rule has no effect when using the Glorious Martyrdom firefight ploy.

opTypes.keywords: NOVITIATE, IMPERIUM, ADEPTA SORORITAS, CONDEMNOR

PSYCHIC ranged weapons cannot inflict damage on this operativo.
For the effects of PSYCHIC actions, this operativo cannot be selected and is never treated as being within those actions' required distances.
Whenever Un operativo is within 6" of this operativo:

- That operativo cannot perform PSYCHIC actions or use PSYCHIC additional rules.
- That operativo cannot use PSYCHIC ranged weapons.
- PSYCHIC melee weapons have no weapon rules and cannot have Dmg stats higher than 3/4.

If your Auto-broadcaster marker isn't in the zona de combate, place it within 8" horizontally of this operativo; otherwise, move your Auto-broadcaster marker up to 8" horizontally.
If this operativo is removed from the zona de combate, remove your Auto-broadcaster marker from the zona de combate.  

Whenever an operativo enemigo within 3" of your Auto-broadcaster marker is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly NOVITIATE operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo, or within 6" of your Auto-broadcaster marker.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat (to a maximum of 3 after all APL stat changes have been totalled).  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly NOVITIATE operativo would be incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. If you do, that operativo amigo isn't incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining, and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of that action. After that action, that operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control. Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends. You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado, or if it is a Disparar action and this operativo would be a primary or secondary target.

Select one friendly NOVITIATE operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds. It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

If this operativo is benefitting from the effects of the Whip Into Frenzy action (see EXACTOR), this applies to each of the Combatir actions from those effects.

abilities.description:
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you gain a number of Faith points equal to half the number of friendly NOVITIATE operativos that have not been incapacitado (rounding up).
Whenever a friendly NOVITIATE operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, or Un operativo is shooting it, in the Roll dados de ataque (or Roll dados de defensa step if Un operativo is shooting it),
you can spend your Faith points to use one ACT OF FAITH.

- **GUIDANCE - 1 FAITH POINT**  
You can re-roll one of your dice.
- **BLESSING - 2 FAITH POINTS**  
 You can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.
- **INTERVENTION - 3 FAITH POINTS**  
You can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 higher. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

You gain 1 Faith point. If this operativo controls an objective marker, you also gain a number of Faith points equal to the punto de inflexión number.  

This operativo can only perform this action once per punto de inflexión, and cannot perform it while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly NOVITIATE operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against an expended operativo enemigo, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Punishing weapon rule.  
**Punishing:** If you retain any éxitos críticos, you can retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it.

Whenever you spend Faith points, at the end of that action, the operativo amigo you spent them oncan regain up to D3 lost Wounds. Note this ploy has no effect if the ACT OF FAITH doesn't cost any Faith points, e.g. Auto-chastisers equipment.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting against, fighting against or retaliating against a friendly NOVITIATE operativo that contests an objective marker, in the Resolve dados de ataque step of that sequence, you can halve the damage inflicted (rounding up and to a minimum of 2) on that operativo amigo from one éxito normal.

Up to one third of the friendly NOVITIATE operativos in the zona de combate (rounding down, to a minimum of 1) can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice,
but each that does so must end that move closer to its closest operativo enemigo, its closest objective marker or your opponent's drop zone (you can choose separately for each).  

You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo is performing the Disparar action and selects a friendly NOVITIATE operativo as the valid target.
Until the end of that activación/contrataque, while that operativo amigo is more than 2" from that operativo enemigo, your opponent cannot select it as a valid target.
If there are no other valid targets that your opponent can select, that action ends (it's not cancelled, so that operativo has still performed it).
Note this ploy has no effect if it's not the selected operativo, e.g. if it's a secondary target from the Blast weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly NOVITIATE operativo is shooting with a Ministorum flamer and you inflict damage with any éxitos críticos. The target gains one of your Blaze tokens (if it doesn't already have one). Whenever Un operativo that has one of your Blaze tokens is activated:  - Inflict D3 damage on it. - Its controlling player can subtract 1 from that operativo's APL stat until the end of that activación to remove that token. Note that this must be done before that operativo performs any actions during that activación.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly NOVITIATE operativo is performing the Disparar action and you're selecting a ranged weapon.
Until the end of that action, whenever that operativo is shooting Un operativo within 6" of it, that weapon has the Seek Light weapon rule.  

**Seek Light:** When selecting a valid target, operativos cannot use light terrain for cover. While this can allow such operativos to be targeted (assuming they are Visible), it does not remove their Cover save (if any).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly NOVITIATE operativo is incapacitado, before it is removed from the zona de combate. For each operativo enemigo visible to and within 2" of it, you gain 1 Faith point and inflict D3 damage on that operativo enemigo (roll separately for each).

equipments.description: Once per punto de inflexión, you can use up to two ACTS OF FAITH during a sequence, but each one must be different. This takes precedence over the normal ACTS OF FAITH rules.

Whenever a friendly NOVITIATE operativo is shooting with an autogun, autopistol, relic bolt pistol or relic boltgun, if you spend a Faith point, that weapon has the Piercing Crits 1 weapon rule until the end of that sequence.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly NOVITIATE operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, in the Roll dados de ataque step,
you can inflict 1-3 damage on that operativo amigo (but not enough to incapacitate it).
If you do, you can use one ACT OF FAITH for free during that sequence with a Faith points cost no more than the damage you inflicted from this rule.
You can ignore any changes to the Move stat of friendly NOVITIATE operativos from being injured.

description:
Specialist reconnaissance infantry, T'au Pathfinders range far ahead of their allies. Pathfinder kill teams are capable
of operating independently of the main T'au force, and are equipped for almost any situation. Their advanced wargear
and potent weaponry enable them to disrupt communications, perform acts of sabotage and destroy targets.
composition:
A PATHFINDERS KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 PATHFINDER SHAS'UI operativo
- 11 PATHFINDER operativos selected from the following list:
  - ASSAULT GRENADIER
  - BLOODED
  - COMMS SPECIALIST
  - DRONE CONTROLLER
  - MARKSMAN
  - MEDICAL TECHNICIAN
  - SHAS'LA
  - TRANSPECTRAL INTERFERENCE
  - MB3 Reconocimiento DRONE (counts as two selections)
  - MV31 PULSE ACCELERATOR DRONE
  - MV33 GRAV-INHIBITOR DRONE
  - MV1 GUN DRONE
  - MV4 SHIELD DRONE
  - MV7 MARKER DRONE
  - WEAPONS EXPERT with one of the following:
    - Ion rifle; gun butt
    - Rail rifle; gun butt
        
Other than SHAS'LA and WEAPONS EXPERT operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to two WEAPONS EXPERT operativos.  

Some PATHFINDER rules refer to a 'pulse weapon'. The following weapons are pulse weapons: burst cannon, pulse carbine, suppressed pulse carbine, twin pulse carbine.

opTypes.keywords: PATHFINDER, T'AU EMPIRE, LEADER, SHAS'UI

abilities.description:
Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one of the following and apply its rules until the end of the punto de inflexión:

- Mont'ka: Add 1" to the Move stat of friendly PATHFINDER operativos.
- Kauyon: Friendly PATHFINDER operativos can perform a free Markerlight action during their activación if they have a Conceal order

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. That operativo enemigo gains one of your Markerlight tokens (to a maximum of four).  

Un operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
If Un operativo (excluding MB3 Reconocimiento) would perform the Disparar action (excluding Vigilancia) and this action during the same activación, only the target of that Disparar action can be selected for this action (and vice versa).

Once during each of their activations, whenever an operativo enemigo that has any of your Markerlight tokens performs the Carrera, Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action, remove one of its Markerlight tokens.  

While only some PATHFINDER operativos can perform the Markerlight action, all PATHFINDER operativos can benefit from its effects.
Whenever a friendly PATHFINDER operativo is shooting with a weapon from its datacard (excluding ASSAULT GRENADIER'S fusion grenade), it has additional rules determined by the number of your Markerlight tokens the target has.
These are cumulative, so if an operativo enemigo has two of your Markerlight tokens, the operativo amigo shooting it has the rules for 1 and 2 tokens during that sequence.

|**Tokens**|**Additional Rules**|
|:---:|-----|
|**1**|Saturate and Balanced weapon rules.|
|**2**|Improve the Hit stat of that operativo amigo's ranged weapons by 1 (to a maximum of 3+).|
|**3**|The target cannot be obscured.|
|**4**|Seek Light weapon rule.|


**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain salvaciones de cobertura.  

**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die  

**Seek Light:** When selecting a valid target, operativos cannot use light terrain for cover. While this can allow such operativos to be targeted (assuming they are Visible), it does not remove their Cover save (if any).

opTypes.keywords: PATHFINDER, T'AU EMPIRE, ASSAULT GRENADIER

abilities.description:
Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. That operativo enemigo gains one of your Markerlight tokens (to a maximum of four).  

Un operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
If Un operativo (excluding MB3 Reconocimiento) would perform the Disparar action (excluding Vigilancia) and this action during the same activación, only the target of that Disparar action can be selected for this action (and vice versa).

Once during each of their activations, whenever an operativo enemigo that has any of your Markerlight tokens performs the Carrera, Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action, remove one of its Markerlight tokens.  

While only some PATHFINDER operativos can perform the Markerlight action, all PATHFINDER operativos can benefit from its effects.
Whenever a friendly PATHFINDER operativo is shooting with a weapon from its datacard (excluding ASSAULT GRENADIER'S fusion grenade), it has additional rules determined by the number of your Markerlight tokens the target has.
These are cumulative, so if an operativo enemigo has two of your Markerlight tokens, the operativo amigo shooting it has the rules for 1 and 2 tokens during that sequence.

|**Tokens**|**Additional Rules**|
|:---:|-----|
|**1**|Saturate and Balanced weapon rules.|
|**2**|Improve the Hit stat of that operativo amigo's ranged weapons by 1 (to a maximum of 3+).|
|**3**|The target cannot be obscured.|
|**4**|Seek Light weapon rule.|


**Saturate:** The defender cannot retain salvaciones de cobertura.

**Seek Light:** When selecting a valid target, operativos cannot use light terrain for cover. While this can allow such operativos to be targeted (assuming they are Visible), it does not remove their Cover save (if any).

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly PATHFINDER operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

abilities.description:
The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly PATHFINDER operativo (excluding DRONE) would be incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. If you do, that operativo amigo is not incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining, and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of that action. After that action, that operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move within this operativo's alcance de control. Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends.  
 You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado, or if it is a Disparar action and this operativo would be a primary or secondary target.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly PATHFINDER operativo (excluding DRONE) is shooting or retaliating with a ranged weapon (see Point-Blank Fusillade firefight ploy), if it's within 3" of another friendly PATHFINDER operativo (excluding DRONE),
that first operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.

Select one zona de combate edge (excluding your own). Each friendly PATHFINDER operativo that's wholly within 6" of that edge can immediately perform a free Carrera action in an order of your choice, but each that does so must end that move wholly within 6" of a zona de combate edge (excluding your own). You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is performing the Disparar action, if the target (the primary target if the weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rules) isn't the closest valid target,
your opponent cannot re-roll their dados de ataque. Ignore friendly PATHFINDER operativos that have a Conceal order or are obscured when determining this.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly PATHFINDER operativo, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, improve that operativo amigo's Save stat by 1.
Use this firefight ploy at the start of the Firefight phase. One friendly PATHFINDER operativo (excluding DRONE) can immediately perform a free mission action.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly PATHFINDER operativo (excluding DRONE) is retaliating, if it wasn't dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos at the start of that activación/contrataque. You can use one of its ranged weapons as a melee weapon (excluding a weapon that has the word 'grenade' in its name) during that sequence. If you do, you cannot block during that sequence, and the following weapon rules have no effect on its weapons until the end of that sequence: Devastating, Piercing, Torrent.  
If that operativo amigo is ready, has an Engage order and is retaliating with a pulse weapon, you resolve the first dados de ataque (i.e. defender instead of attacker).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly PATHFINDER operativo is performing the Disparar action and you're selecting a valid target within 6" of it. Having other friendly PATHFINDER
operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control doesn't prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly PATHFINDER operativo (excluding DRONE) is selected as the valid target of a Disparar action. Select one friendly PATHFINDER DRONE operativo visible to and within 3" of that first operativo amigo to become the valid target instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this). That friendly DRONE operativo is only in cover if the originatl target was. This ploy has no effect if the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

equipments.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly PATHFINDER operativo (excluding DRONE) is performing the Disparar action and you're selecting a valid target, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, if the target has at least one of your Markerlight tokens, it is treated as having one more. If the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule, only the primary target is affected.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly PATHFINDER operativo performs the Markerlight action, you can use this rule.
If you do, you can select one operativo enemigo in the zona de combate to gain one of your Markerlight tokens instead (it doesn't need to be visible).
This is not cumulative with the high-intensity Markerlight or Analyse rules.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly PATHFINDER operativo (excluding MV7 MARKER DRONE) performs the Markerlight action, you can use this rule.
If you do, the operativo enemigo you select gains two of your Markerlight tokens (instead of one).

Once per punto de inflexión, a friendly PATHFINDER operativo that has the Markerlight action on their datacard (excluding DRONE) can perform the following unique action:  

**PHOTON GRENADE (1 AP):**  

Select a valid target for this operativo and roll one D6:  

On a 3+, until the end of that operativo's next activación, subtract 2" from its Move stat and it cannot perform the Carrera action.</br>
Un operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

description:
Masters of stealth and subterfuge, Phobos Strike Teams consist of Marine Espacial Infiltrators, Incursors and Reivers.
Possessed of transhuman strength and equipped with a range of explosives, communications equipment and precise weaponry, they are capable of outmanoeuvring and overwhelming enemy forces many times their own size.
composition:
A PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo selected from the following list:
  - INFILTRATOR SERGEANT
  - INCURSOR SERGEANT
  - REIVER SERGEANT with one of the following options:
    - Special issue bolt pistol; combat knife
    - Bolt carbine; fists
- 5 PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativos selected from the following list:
  - INFILTRATOR COMMSMAN
  - INFILTRATOR HELIX ADEPT
  - INFILTRATOR SABOTEUR
  - INFILTRATOR VETERAN
  - INFILTRATOR VOXBREAKER
  - INFILTRATOR WARRIOR
  - INCURSOR MARKSMAN
  - INCURSOR MINELAYER
  - INCURSOR WARRIOR
  - REIVER WARRIOR with one of the following options:
    - Special issue bolt pistol; combat knife
    - Bolt carbine; fists

Other than WARRIOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, LEADER, INFILTRATOR, SERGEANT

abilities.description:
During each friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt weapon must be selected for at least one of them.
A bolt weapon is any ranged weapon that includes 'bolt' in its name, e.g. marksman bolt carbine, special issue bolt pistol, etc.  

Each friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** if a friendly INFILTRATOR operativo is in the zona de combate.
Select one operativo enemigo visible to a friendly INFILTRATOR operativo, or within 6" of a friendly VOXBREAKER operativo.
In the following Firefight phase, that operativo enemigo cannot be activated or perform actions until one of the following is true:

- Your opponent has activated a number of operativos enemigos equal to the number of friendly INFILTRATOR operativos in the zona de combate when this STRATEGIC GAMBIT was used.
- It is the last operativo enemigo to be activated.

You can do each of the following once per battle:

- When rolling-off to decide initiative, if this operativo is in the zona de combate, you can re-roll your dice.
- You can use a firefight ploy for 0CP if this is the specified PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo (including Command Re-roll if the attack or dados de defensa was rolled for this operativo),
or the Patient Ambush firefight ploy for 0CP if this operativo is ready and not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.

opTypes.keywords: PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, INFILTRATOR, COMMSMAN

abilities.description:

Once per punto de inflexión, during a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo's activación or contrataque, before or after it performs an action,
if this operativo is in the zona de combate, you can change one strategy ploy you have used this punto de inflexión (it does not cost you any CP to do so).

**STRATEGIC GAMBIT** if a friendly INFILTRATOR operativo is in the zona de combate.
Select one operativo enemigo visible to a friendly INFILTRATOR operativo, or within 6" of a friendly VOXBREAKER operativo.
In the following Firefight phase, that operativo enemigo cannot be activated or perform actions until one of the following is true:

- Your opponent has activated a number of operativos enemigos equal to the number of friendly INFILTRATOR operativos in the zona de combate when this STRATEGIC GAMBIT was used.
- It is the last operativo enemigo to be activated.

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, when you gain CP, if this operativo is in the zona de combate and not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, you can use this rule.
If you do, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain one additional CP.

opTypes.keywords: PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, MEDIC, INFILTRATOR, HELIX ADEPT

abilities.description:

The first time during each punto de inflexión that another friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo would be incapacitado while visible to and within 3" of this operativo, you can use this rule, providing neither this nor that operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo. If you do, that operativo amigo is not incapacitado, has 1D3 wounds remaining, and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of that action.  
 After that action, that operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action, but must end that move with this operativo's alcance de control. Subtract 1 from this and that operativo's APL stats until the end of their next activations respectively, and if this rule was used during that operativo amigo's activación, that activación ends.  
 You cannot use this rule if this operativo is incapacitado, or if it is a Disparar action and this operativo would be a primary or secondary target.

- Your opponent has activated a number of operativos enemigos equal to the number of friendly INFILTRATOR operativos in the zona de combate when this STRATEGIC GAMBIT was used.
- It is the last operativo enemigo to be activated.

Select one friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 1D3+3 lost wounds.
It cannot be Un operativo that the Medic! rule was used on during this punto de inflexión.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, INFILTRATOR, SABOTEUR

Roll each sequence separately in an order of your choice.

It can perform the Vigilancia action while it has a Conceal order, but when you perform the free Disparar or Combatir action during the interruption, you must change its order to Engage.
