This operativo is carrying your Haywire Mine marker.
It can perform the Recoger Marcador action on that marker, but that marker cannot be placed within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control
(if this operativo is incapacitado while carrying that marker and that marker cannot be placed, it is removed with this operativo).
Whenever a friendly INCURSOR operativo is shooting, operativos enemigos cannot be obscured.

The first time your Haywire Mine marker is within another operativo's alcance de control,
remove that marker, subtract 1 from that operativo's APL stat until the end of its next activación, and inflict 2D3+3 damage on it;
if it is not incapacitado, end its action (if any), even if that action's effects aren't fulfilled.
If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount to do so.
Note that this operativo is ignored for these effects (i.e. it cannot set it off or take damage from that marker).

- When rolling-off to decide initiative, if this operativo is in the zona de combate, you can re-roll your dice.
- You can use a firefight ploy for 0CP if this is the specified PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo (including Command Re-roll if the attack or dados de defensa was rolled for this operativo),

ploys.ployName: And They Shall Know No Fear
ploys.description: You can ignore any changes to the stats of friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativos from being injured (including their weapons' stats).

Whenever a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo is shooting during an activación in which it has not performed the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action, or against Un operativo that is not in cover and is more than 6" from it, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.    Note that for the first requirement, that operativo is not restricted from performing those actions after shooting.   **Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativos can perform the following unique action:  
 **Guerrila Warfare (1 AP):** Change this operativo's order.  
 Un operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Whenever a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo is fighting, its melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
If that operativo amigo is doing so during an activación in which it performed the Carga action, its melee weapons also have the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.
Use this firefight ploy when you resolve a éxito crítico for a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo that is shooting with a bolt weapon. Inflict D3 additional damage.
Use this firefight ploy when it is your turn to activate a operativo amigo. You can skip that activación.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo that has a Conceal order is activated, is given an Engage order, performs the Carga and then the Combatir action,
and you're resolving your first dados de ataque from this activación.
After doing so, you can immediately resolve another of your dados de ataque (before your opponent). The operativo cannot have performed any other actions during this activación (but can do so after resolving this ploy).

Use this firefight ploy when Un operativo is shooting a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo, in the Roll dados de defensa step.
You can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.

equipments.description: Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a éxito normal instead.

This equipment allows you to select four utility grenades from the utility grenades equipment (see universal equipment).  

You cannot also select that equipment as normal (i.e. to give you six).

Friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativos have the following melee weapon:
 
|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Combat Blade|5|3+|3/4|

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly PHOBOS STRIKE TEAM operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a bolt carbine, marksman bolt carbine or occulus bolt carbine,
you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of the punto de inflexión, that weapon has the Piercing 1 weapon rule.

description: Corrupted sons of Mortarion, Plague Marines are suffused and bloated with rot and disease. Though compact and slow moving, Plague Marines are horrifyingly resilient, trudging relentlessly towards their objectives while spreading contagion in their wake.
composition:
A PLAGUE MARINES KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 PLAGUE MARINE CHAMPION operativo
- 5 PLAGUE MARINE operativos selected from the following list:
  - BOMBARDIER
  - FIGHTER
  - HEAVY GUNNER
  - ICON BEARER
  - MALIGNANT PLAGUECASTER
  - WARRIOR

Your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once

opTypes.keywords: PLAGUE MARINE, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, LEADER, CHAMPION

abilities.description:
During each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or PSYCHIC weapon must be selected for at least one of them.
You cannot select the same PSYCHIC ranged weapon more than once per activación.  

Each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

Whenever an operativo enemigo that has one of your Poison tokens loses one or more wounds within 7" of this operativo, this operativo regains up to an equal number of lost wounds (to a maximum of 3 lost wounds per punto de inflexión, and only if this operativo isn't incapacitado).

opTypes.keywords: PLAGUE MARINE, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, PSYKER, MALIGNANT PLAGUECASTER

abilities.description:
During each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or PSYCHIC weapon must be selected for at least one of them.
You cannot select the same PSYCHIC ranged weapon more than once per activación.  

Each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

**PSYCHIC**
Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 7" of this operativo, or one operativo enemigo that's a valid target for this operativo.
That operativo enemigo gains one of your Poison tokens (if it does not already have one). If it already has one, inflict 3 damage on that operativo enemigo instead.  

Un operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**PSYCHIC** Select one operativo amigo visible to and within 3" of this operativo, then roll 2D6: if the result is 7, the selected operativo regains 7 lost wounds; otherwise, the selected operativo regains lost wounds equal to the highest D6.  
 Un operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or more than once per punto de inflexión.

opTypes.keywords: PLAGUE MARINE, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, BOMBARDIER

abilities.description:
During each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or PSYCHIC weapon must be selected for at least one of them.
You cannot select the same PSYCHIC ranged weapon more than once per activación.  

Each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

This operativo can use blight and krak grenades (see faction and universal equipment).
Doing so doesn't count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other operativos).
Whenever it's doing so, improve the Hit stat of that weapon by 1 and blight grenades have the Toxic weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: PLAGUE MARINE, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, FIGHTER

abilities.description:
During each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.

Each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

Inflict D3+2 damage on each other operativo that's both visible to and within 2" of this operativo. Roll separately for each: if it's an operativo enemigo, if the D3 result is a 3, that operativo enemigo also gains one of your Poison tokens (if it doesn't already have one).  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or during an activación in which it has performed more than one Combatir action, and it cannot perform more than one Combatir action during an activación in which it performs this action.

Each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 higher. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
Whenever this operativo is within your opponent's territory, the Contagion strategy ploy costs you 0CP.

opTypes.keywords: PLAGUE MARINE, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
During each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it is two Disparar actions, a bolt pistol, boltgun or PSYCHIC weapon must be selected for at least one of them.
You cannot select the same PSYCHIC ranged weapon more than once per activación.  

Each friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.
Whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, dados de defensa results of 5+ are éxitos críticos.

ploys.description: Place one of your Cloud of Flies markers in the zona de combate. Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo that is more than 3" from it, if that operativo amigo is wholly within 1" of that marker, that operativo amigo is obscured. In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.

Subtract 2" from the Move stat of an operativo enemigo and worsen the Hit stat of its weapons by 1 (this is not cumulative with being injured) whenever any of the following are true:  - It has one of your Poison tokens and is visible to (or vice versa) and within 3" of friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativos. - It is visible to (or vice versa) and within 3" of a friendly PLAGUE MARINE ICON BEARER operativo.

Whenever a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo is shooting or fighting during an activación in which it has not moved more than 3", or whenever it is retaliating, its weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.<hr/>
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)

Select one operativo enemigo within 3" of a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo, or one operativo enemigo that has one of your Poison tokens and is within 7" of a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo.
Until the end of the selected operativo's next activación, subtract 1 from its APL stat.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo is fighting against or shooting against an operativo enemigo within 3" of it (or within 7" of it if that operativo enemigo has one of your Poison tokens),
after your opponent rolls their attack or dados de defensa. For each result of 3 they roll, inflict 1 damage on that operativo enemigo, that result is treated as a fail and they cannot re-roll it.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo is incapacitado, before it is removed from the zona de combate. Each operativo enemigo visible to and within 3" of that operativo gains one of your Poison tokens (if they don't already have one); for each of those operativos enemigos that already has one of your Poison tokens (including if they gained one during this action), inflict 1 damage on them instead.

Use this firefight ploy when an dados de ataque inflicts damage on a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo.
Until the end of the activación/contrataque, for the purposes of the Disgustingly Resilient rule for that operativo, always subtract 1 from the damage inflicted (to a minimum of 2) - you do not need to roll.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo's activación or contrataque, before or after it performs an action.
Select one of the following:

- One operativo enemigo within 3" of that operativo gains one of your Poison tokens (if it does not already have one).
- Roll 2D6: if the result is 7+, one operativo enemigo within 7" of that operativo gains one of your Poison tokens (if it does not already have one).

equipments.description: You can ignore any changes to the stats of friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativos from being injured (including their weapons' stats).

Friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativos have the following ranged weapon (you cannot select it for use more than twice during the battle):
 
|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Blight Grenade|4|4+|2/4|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Range 6", Blast 2", Saturate, Severe, *Poison|
Friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativos' boltguns and bolt pistols have the Poison and Severe weapon rules.
Whenever an operativo enemigo that has one of your Poison tokens is activated within 3" of a friendly PLAGUE MARINE operativo, inflict D3 damage on it (instead of the normal 1).

description: Though less resilient than their baseline Human comrades, Ratlings are naturally excellent shots. It is said that Ratling marksmen can take the head off a Heretic from over a kilometre away. Coupled with their knack for staying out of harm's way, this makes Ratlings formidable snipers who can exact a withering toll upon superior enemy forces.
composition:
A RATLING KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 RATLING FIXER operativo with one of the following options:  
  - Battle Rifle, Fists
  - Sniper Rifle, Fists
- 10 RATLING operativos selected from the following list:
  - BATTLEMUTT
  - BULLGRYN* with one from each of the following:
    - Grenadier Gauntlet or Power Maul
    - Brute Shield or Slabshield  
  - OGRYN*
  - BIG SHOT
  - BOMBER
  - HARDBIT
  - RAIDER
  - SNEAK
  - SNIPER
  - SPOTTER
  - STASHMASTER
  - VOX-THIEF

*You cannot select more than three of these operativos combined. Up to three times, instead of selecting one of these operativos, you can select one RATLING ploy to cost you 0CP for the battle.  

Other than BULLGRYN, OGRYN, and SNIPER operativos, your KillTeam can only include each operativo above once.

opTypes.keywords: RATLING, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, LEADER, FIXER

abilities.description: You can select one additional equipment option.

After each operativo enemigo's activación, before the next operativo is activated, you can perform a free Carrera action with one friendly RATLING operativo (excluding BULLGRYN, OGRYN, and SNEAK), 
but it cannot finish that move within 3" of an operativo enemigo unless it is not visible to every operativo enemigo when it finishes that move.
  

Each operativo amigo can only do this once per punto de inflexión, and cannot do so after the final activación of the punto de inflexión.

**Strategic Gambit**
Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo.
Until the end of the punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly RATLING operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo with a Rifle, that weapon has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.

Whenever this operativo is retaliating while Light or Heavy terrain is within its alcance de control, you resolve the first attack die (i.e. defender instead of attacker).

opTypes.keywords: RATLING, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, BOMBER

abilities.description:
Mines you select from Univeral Equipment inflict 2D3+3 damage instead, and fiendly RATLING operativos (excluding OGRYN and BULLGRYN) are ignored for its effects (i.e. they cannot trigger it or take damage from it).
This takes precedence over the normal mines rules.

After each operativo enemigo's activación, before the next operativo is activated, you can perform a free Carrera action with one friendly RATLING operativo (excluding BULLGRYN, OGRYN, and SNEAK), 
but it cannot finish that move within 3" of an operativo enemigo unless it is not visible to every operativo enemigo when it finishes that move.
  

Each operativo amigo can only do this once per punto de inflexión, and cannot do so after the final activación of the punto de inflexión.

When setting up equipment before the battle, you can set up to two of your Tripwire markers up wholly within your territory and more than 2" from other markers, access points, and Accessible terrain. The first time that marker is within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control, remove that marker, subtract 1 from that operativo's APL stat until the end of its next activación and end its action (if any), even if that action's effects aren't fulfilled. If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount to do so.

opTypes.keywords: RATLING, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, STASHMASTER

After each operativo enemigo's activación, before the next operativo is activated, you can perform a free Carrera action with one friendly RATLING operativo (excluding BULLGRYN, OGRYN, and SNEAK), 
but it cannot finish that move within 3" of an operativo enemigo unless it is not visible to every operativo enemigo when it finishes that move.
  

Each operativo amigo can only do this once per punto de inflexión, and cannot do so after the final activación of the punto de inflexión.
If you select an Ammo Cache from Univeral Equipment, you can set up an additional Ammo Cache marker.

After each operativo enemigo's activación, before the next operativo is activated, you can perform a free Carrera action with one friendly RATLING operativo (excluding BULLGRYN, OGRYN, and SNEAK), 
but it cannot finish that move within 3" of an operativo enemigo unless it is not visible to every operativo enemigo when it finishes that move.
  

Each operativo amigo can only do this once per punto de inflexión, and cannot do so after the final activación of the punto de inflexión.

**SUPPORT**
Select one other friendly RATLING operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo.
Until the end of its next activación, add 1 to that operativo's APL stat.
  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: RATLING, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, SNEAK

abilities.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, after an operativo enemigo performs an action, you can interrupt that action (or contrataque) and perform a free Carrera action with this operativo.
Note this operativo cannot use the Scarper faction rule (it has this rule instead).

After each operativo enemigo's activación, before the next operativo is activated, you can perform a free Carrera action with one friendly RATLING operativo (excluding BULLGRYN, OGRYN, and SNEAK), 
but it cannot finish that move within 3" of an operativo enemigo unless it is not visible to every operativo enemigo when it finishes that move.
  

Each operativo amigo can only do this once per punto de inflexión, and cannot do so after the final activación of the punto de inflexión.

Until the start of this operativo's next activación, whenever it is shooting, operativos enemigos cannot be Obscured and the stationary profile of this operativo's suppressed sniper rifle has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.


This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: RATLING, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, OGRYN

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo finishes moving during the Carga action, you can inflict 1D3+1 damage on one operativo enemigo within its alcance de control.

Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, if this operativo has a Conceal order, it cannot use Light terrain for cover.
Whilst this can allow this operativo to be targeted (assuming it is visible), it does not remove its cover save (if any).
You must spend 1 additional AP for this operativo to perform the Recoger Marcador and Mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).

opTypes.keywords: RATLING, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, BULLGRYN

abilities.description:
Whenever your opponent is selecting a valid target, if this operativo has a Conceal order, it cannot use Light terrain for cover.
Whilst this can allow this operativo to be targeted (assuming it is visible), it does not remove its cover save (if any).

If this operativo has a Slabshield, it has a 3+ Save stat;
if it has a Brute Shield, whenever it is fighting or retaliating, each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).
You must spend 1 additional AP for this operativo to perform the Recoger Marcador and Mission actions (excluding Operate Hatch).

options.description: If this operativo has a Slabshield, it has a 3+ Save stat.
If this operativo has a Brute Shield, whenever it is fighting or retaliating, each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).

opTypes.keywords: RATLING, IMPERIUM, ASTRA MILITARUM, BATTLEMUTT

abilities.description:
This operativo cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Carrera, Retirada, Combatir, and Reposicionar.
It cannot use any weapons that are not on its datacard.

Once per punto de inflexión, after an operativo enemigo performs an action in which it moves, you can interrupt that activación (or contrataque) to use this rule. If you do, each friendly RATLING operativo (excluding OGRYN and BULLGRYN) within 6" of this operativo and within 2" of that operativo enemigo can perform a free Carrera action or a free Retirada action, but it cannot move more than 3". In either case, each one cannot finish that move within 2" of an operativo enemigo unless it is not visible to every operativo enemigo when it finishes that move (if this is not possible for Un operativo, it cannot move).

After each operativo enemigo's activación, before the next operativo is activated, you can perform a free Carrera action with one friendly RATLING operativo (excluding BULLGRYN, OGRYN, and SNEAK), 
but it cannot finish that move within 3" of an operativo enemigo unless it is not visible to every operativo enemigo when it finishes that move.
  

Each operativo amigo can only do this once per punto de inflexión, and cannot do so after the final activación of the punto de inflexión.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly RATLING operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo more than 6" from it, if that operativo amigo has not performed the Carga, Retirada, or Reposicionar action during the activación,
or it is a contrataque, its rifle (if any) has the Balanced weapon rule.  

Note that operativo is not restricted from performing those actions after shooting.

Whenever a friendly RATLING BULLGRYN or friendly RATLING OGRYN operativo is shooting within, fighting within, or retaliating within your opponent's territory or within 3" of an objective marker, its weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.

Whenever a friendly RATLING operativo (excluding OGRYN or BULLGRYN) has a Conceal order and is in Cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Vantage terrain) except being within 2".

Whenever a friendly RATLING operativo is more than 6" from operativos enemigos and has Heavy Terrain within its alcance de control, the Stationary profile of its rifle (if any) has the Silent weapon rule.

Use this Firefight Ploy during a friendly RATLING operativo's activación (excluding OGRYN or BULLGRYN).
Until the end of that activación, that operativo does not have to control a marker to perform the Recoger Marcador or Mission actions that usually require this
(taking precedence over that action's conditions - it only needs to contest the marker), and having an operativo enemigo dentro del alcance de control of it does not prevent it from doing so.

Use this Firefight Ploy after a friendly RATLING operativo that has an Engage order perfoms the Disparar action with a rifle. If it is more than 3" from operativos enemigos, or not visible to every operativo enemigo, you can change its order to Conceal.

Use this Firefight Ploy when a friendly RATLING operativo if performing the Disparar action with a rifle and you are selecting a valid target.
Having other friendly RATLING operativos within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control does not prevent that operativo enemigo from being selected.

equipments.description: Once per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly RATLING operativo is shooting with a rifle and you've rolled your dados de ataque,you can use this rule if you haven't used the Lucky Round equipment during this activación. If you do, improve the Hit stat of its rifle by 1 until the end of that sequence.

Once per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly RATLING operativo is shooting with a rifle and you've rolled your dados de ataque, you can use this rule if you have not used the Purloined Rations equipment this activación.
If you do, that weapon has the Severe weapon rule for that sequence.

At the end of the Select operativos step, roll 1D3. If the result is:

- 1, you lose 1 CP
- 2, you gain 1 CP
- 3, your opponent loses 1CP
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly RATLING BULLGRYN or friendly RATLING OGRYN operativo, dados de defensa results of 5+ are éxitos críticos.

description: Ravener kill teams are hyperadapted to such an extent that they are able to overcome all manner of a prey species' defences. Driven by alien synaptic imperatives, Raveners burrow with horrific speed to strike at prey from vulnerable angles, before using razor-sharp talons, chitinous claws and virulent biotoxins to enact the Hive Mind's will.
composition:
A RAVENERS KillTeam  is composed of:

- 1 RAVENER PRIME
- 4 RAVENER operativos selected from the following list:
  - FELLTALON
  - TREMORSCYTHE
  - VENOMSPITTER
  - WARRIOR
  - WRECKER

Other than WARRIOR operativos, your KillTeam can only include each operativo on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: RAVENER, GREAT DEVOURER, TYRANID, LEADER, PRIME

abilities.description:
Whenever determining control of a marker, treat the total APL stat of operativos enemigos that contest it as 1 lower if at least one of those operativos enemigos is within 3" of this operativo.
Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this. Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 3" of this operativo:

- Your opponent must spend 1 additional AP for that operativo enemigo to perform the Recoger Marcador and mission actions.
- Your opponent cannot re-roll their attack or dados de defensa for that operativo.

During each friendly RAVENER operativo's activación, it can perform two Combatir actions.  

Each friendly RAVENER operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order. Whenever it does:

- You can change its order first, or change its order instead of performing an action (for the latter, still treat it as having counteracted this punto de inflexión).
- During that contrataque, if it doesn't perform a mission action it can perform a free Burrow action.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT if this operativo isn't incapacitado.  

Roll one D6 and compare the result to the number of the current punto de inflexión; if the result is:

- Twice as high or higher, you gain 1CP.
- Less: inflict damage on this operativo equal to the result.

- Any other result, nothing happens.

At the end of the Set Up operativos step, place your Tunnel marker numbered '0' on the zona de combate floor, wholly within your drop zone and touching your zona de combate edge.
As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first four turning points, you can place your next numbered Tunnel marker on the zona de combate floor wholly within 5" of your preceding Tunnel marker.
This means that, as the battle progresses, you can have a series of sequentially numbered Tunnel markers (0, 1, 2, 3 and 4).
Once you have placed five Tunnel markers, don't place any more (i.e. if your battle lasts more than four turning points).  

Your Tunnel markers and the area between your sequentially numbered markers (i.e. between 0 and 1, 1 and 2, etc.), create your TUNNEL.  

In a zona de combate that uses the close quarters rules (e.g. zona de combate: Tomb World), your TUNNEL and the distance between your Tunnel markers can be measured through Wall terrain. In a zona de combate that uses the hazardous areas rules (e.g. zona de combate: Bheta Decima), for the purposes of the Restricted Movement rule, parts of a Tunnel marker that are touching a hazardous area are treated as a hazardous area.

When setting up a RAVENER kill team before the battle, your first two operativos must be set up as normal.
Each other friendly RAVENER operativo thereafter can be set up underground: place it to one side instead of in the zona de combate.  

In the Firefight phase, friendly RAVENER operativos set up underground are activated and can Contraatacar as normal. Whenever a friendly RAVENER operativo is underground, it cannot perform any actions other than Burrow.
At the end of the battle, each friendly RAVENER operativo that's underground is incapacitado.  

Friendly RAVENER operativos can perform the following action:  

**BURROW (1 AP)**:  

If this operativo is underground, set it up on your TUNNEL in a location it can be placed (it's no longer underground, and it can be set up dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos).
Until the end of the activación/contrataque, subtract 2" from its Move stat.
Alternatively, instead of resolving the above effect, if this operativo is in the zona de combate and on your TUNNEL, remove it from the zona de combate: it's now underground.
Un operativo cannot perform this action while carrying a marker.

opTypes.keywords: RAVENER, GREAT DEVOURER, TYRANID, FELLTALON

abilities.description:
During each friendly RAVENER operativo's activación, it can perform two Combatir actions.  

Each friendly RAVENER operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order. Whenever it does:

- You can change its order first, or change its order instead of performing an action (for the latter, still treat it as having counteracted this punto de inflexión).
- During that contrataque, if it doesn't perform a mission action it can perform a free Burrow action.

In the Resolve dados de ataque step, if you inflict damage with any éxitos críticos, the operativo this weapon is being used against gains one of your Poison tokens (if it doesn't already have one).
Whenever Un operativo that has one of your Poison tokens is activated, inflict D3 damage on it.

At the end of the Set Up operativos step, place your Tunnel marker numbered '0' on the zona de combate floor, wholly within your drop zone and touching your zona de combate edge.
As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first four turning points, you can place your next numbered Tunnel marker on the zona de combate floor wholly within 5" of your preceding Tunnel marker.
This means that, as the battle progresses, you can have a series of sequentially numbered Tunnel markers (0, 1, 2, 3 and 4).
Once you have placed five Tunnel markers, don't place any more (i.e. if your battle lasts more than four turning points).  

Your Tunnel markers and the area between your sequentially numbered markers (i.e. between 0 and 1, 1 and 2, etc.), create your TUNNEL.  

In a zona de combate that uses the close quarters rules (e.g. zona de combate: Tomb World), your TUNNEL and the distance between your Tunnel markers can be measured through Wall terrain. In a zona de combate that uses the hazardous areas rules (e.g. zona de combate: Bheta Decima), for the purposes of the Restricted Movement rule, parts of a Tunnel marker that are touching a hazardous area are treated as a hazardous area.

When setting up a RAVENER kill team before the battle, your first two operativos must be set up as normal.
Each other friendly RAVENER operativo thereafter can be set up underground: place it to one side instead of in the zona de combate.  

In the Firefight phase, friendly RAVENER operativos set up underground are activated and can Contraatacar as normal. Whenever a friendly RAVENER operativo is underground, it cannot perform any actions other than Burrow.
At the end of the battle, each friendly RAVENER operativo that's underground is incapacitado.  

Friendly RAVENER operativos can perform the following action:  

**BURROW (1 AP)**:  

If this operativo is underground, set it up on your TUNNEL in a location it can be placed (it's no longer underground, and it can be set up dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos).
Until the end of the activación/contrataque, subtract 2" from its Move stat.
Alternatively, instead of resolving the above effect, if this operativo is in the zona de combate and on your TUNNEL, remove it from the zona de combate: it's now underground.
Un operativo cannot perform this action while carrying a marker.

- Select one operativo enemigo within 2" of this operativo. Alternatively, if this operativo is underground, select one operativo enemigo on your TUNNEL. Inflict D3+2 damage on that operativo enemigo and it gains one of your Poison tokens (if it doesn't already have one).
- This operativo can perform this action while underground (this takes precedence over the normal Burrow rules).

opTypes.keywords: RAVENER, GREAT DEVOURER, TYRANID, TREMORSCYTHE

abilities.description: This operativo can perform the Carga action while it has a Conceal order if it performed the Burrow action during the same activación/ contrataque.

During each friendly RAVENER operativo's activación, it can perform two Combatir actions.  

Each friendly RAVENER operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order. Whenever it does:

- You can change its order first, or change its order instead of performing an action (for the latter, still treat it as having counteracted this punto de inflexión).
- During that contrataque, if it doesn't perform a mission action it can perform a free Burrow action.

Once per punto de inflexión, after an operativo enemigo performs an action in
which it moves more than 2" and ends within 2" of your TUNNEL, if this operativo is underground
and is either ready or hasn't counteracted during this punto de inflexión, you can interrupt that enemy
operativo's activación/contrataque to use this rule.  

If you do, activate or Contraatacar with this operativo (as appropriate), but during its activación/
contrataque it must Combatir against or Disparar against that operativo enemigo, and cannot do so
against any other operativos enemigos until it does (if this isn't possible, this operativo's activación/
contrataque is cancelled and this rule hasn't been used). After completing this operativo's
activación/contrataque, continue that operativo enemigo's activación/contrataque (if possible).

ploys.description: Whenever a friendly RAVENER operativo is on your TUNNEL it's in cover, unless it's within 2" of el operativo activo. Treat this as cover provided by Light terrain (therefore it's affected by rules that prevent this, e.g. Seek Light and Vantage terrain).

Select one friendly RAVENER operativo in the zona de combate. That operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Burrow action. If it's within 2" of your TUNNEL, it can immediately perform a free Retirada or Reposicionar action before it does so.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly RAVENER operativo:

- f that operativo amigo has performed the Burrow action during that punto de inflexión, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
- f that operativo amigo is on your TUNNEL, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa.

Whenever a friendly RAVENER operativo is fighting:

- If it's performed the Burrow action during that activación/contrataque, its melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
- If it's on your TUNNEL, its melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy when an operativo enemigo is performing the Combatir action and selects a friendly RAVENER operativo on your TUNNEL to Combatir against.
In the Resolve dados de ataque step of that sequence, you resolve the first dados de ataque (i.e. defender instead of attacker).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly RAVENER operativo's activación or contrataque, before or after it performs an action. During that activación/ contrataque, that operativo can:

- Perform the Retirada action for 1 less AP.
- Perform the Carga action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, and can leave that operativo's alcance de control to do so (but then normal requirements for that move apply).

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly RAVENER operativo is incapacitado. Before that operativo is removed from the zona de combate, inflict D3 damage on each operativo enemigo within its alcance de control (roll separately for each).
If that operativo amigo is a VENOMSPITTER that's currently benefitting from the effects of its Distend Dorsal Sac action, inflict 2D3 damage instead.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly RAVENER operativo performs the Burrow action. Before that operativo is removed from the zona de combate, or after setting it up on your TUNNEL, inflict D3+1 damage on each operativo enemigo within its alcance de control (roll separately for each).
You cannot use this ploy in the Strategy phase, or during a FELLTALON operativo's activación or contrataque if it performs the Toxic Lunge action (and vice versa).

equipments.description: Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly RAVENER operativo, if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save. This isn't cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.
Whenever a friendly RAVENER operativo is fighting or retaliating, whenever an dados de ataque inflicts damage on it, roll one D6: on a 5+, inflict 1 damage on the operativo enemigo in that sequence.
Whenever a friendly RAVENER operativo is activated, it regains up to D3 lost wounds.
Once per battle, after rolling off to decide initiative, if a friendly RAVENER operativo is underground and an operativo enemigo is within 5" of your TUNNEL, you can re-roll your dice.

description: As the Great Gun reloads and its hallowed ammunition is transported across Hive Fissilicus, great processions of pilgrims and preachers accompany these holy relics to their final assembly points. They are far from a peaceful congregation, and any who seek to disrupt the great Day of Firing will find themselves lit by the flames and faith wielded by the Sanctifiers.
composition:
A SANCTIFIER kill team is composed of:

- 1 SANCTIFIER CONFESSOR
- 1 SANCTIFIER CHERUB
- 9 SANCTIFIER operativos selected from the following list:
  - CONFLAGRATOR
  - DEATH CULT ASSASSIN
  - DRILL ABBOT
  - MIRACULIST
  - MISSIONARY with one of the following options:
    - Ministorum flamer; brazier of holy fire
    - Ministorum flamer; gun butt; holy relic
  - MISSIONARY with one of the following options:
    - Meltagun; chainsword; holy relic
    - Plasma gun; chainsword; brazier of holy fire
  - PERSECUTOR
  - PREACHER
  - RELIQUANT
  - SALVATIONIST

Other than PREACHER operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo above once.  

Your kill team can only include up to four PREACHER operativos.  

You cannot select an option that includes a brazier of holy fire more than once per battle.

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, LEADER, CONFESSOR

abilities.description:
Whenever an operativo enemigo would perform an action during an activación or contrataque while visible to and within 6" of this operativo, you can use this rule.
If you do, roll one D6: if the result is higher than that operativo enemigo's APL stat:

- It cannot perform that action during that activación/contrataque (the AP spent on it isn't refunded). If it's a contrataque, that contrataque ends.
- You cannot use this rule again during the battle.

In each punto de inflexión after the first, whenever this operativo is an ORATOR and performs the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action during its activación, you can use this rule before it moves. If you do, determine each other friendly SANCTIFIER operativo that's benefitting from the SERMON and is visible to this operativo (or vice versa). After this operativo ends that action, each of those friendly SANCTIFIER operativos can immediately perform a free Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action in an order of your choice (choose separately for each), but each cannot move more than 3" and must end that move in a location where they are still benefitting from the SERMON. If this operativo is incapacitado before this rule is fully resolved, e.g. from the Vigilancia action's interruption (see close quarters rules, kill team Core Book), don't remove it from the zona de combate until this rule has been resolved.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo. If a friendly CONFESSOR operativo hasn't been incapacitado, you must select it.
Until you use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT again during the battle, that operativo has the ORATOR keyword.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is activated within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting
from the SERMON until the end of that activación (i.e. even if it then moves more than the distance requirement from the ORATOR operativo).  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, CHERUB

abilities.description:
- Whenever determining control of an objective marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.
- Whenever this operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Vantage terrain).
- This operativo cannot use any weapons that aren't on its datacard, or perform unique actions other than Incentivise.

Whenever this operativo is performing the Carga, Retirada or Reposicionar action, it can FLY. If it does, don't move it.
Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat horizontally of its original location (in a zona de combate that uses the close quarters rules, e.g. zona de combate: Gallowdark, this distance cannot be measured over or through Wall terrain).
Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Carga action. It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it's the Carga action, it cannot be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo. If a friendly CONFESSOR operativo hasn't been incapacitado, you must select it.
Until you use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT again during the battle, that operativo has the ORATOR keyword.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is activated within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting
from the SERMON until the end of that activación (i.e. even if it then moves more than the distance requirement from the ORATOR operativo).  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

SUPPORT. Select one other friendly SANCTIFIER operativo (excluding CONFESSOR, DEATH CULT ASSASSIN, MIRACULIST and ORATOR) visible to and within 2" of this operativo.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.
  
This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, CONFLAGRATOR

abilities.description:
STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo. If a friendly CONFESSOR operativo hasn't been incapacitado, you must select it.

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

This operativo can perform the Sanctification Orb action (see faction equipment). Doing so in this manner doesn't count towards the once per punto de inflexión limit (i.e. if you also select that equipment for other operativos).

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, DEATH CULT ASSASSIN

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating, you can resolve one of your successes before the normal order. If you do, that success must be used to block.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo. If a friendly CONFESSOR operativo hasn't been incapacitado, you must select it.

Change this operativo's order.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is within 4" of this operativo, that operativo enemigo's APL stat cannot be added to (remove all positive APL stat changes it has). If an operativo enemigo that's more than 4" from this operativo has a positive APL stat change and your opponent spends its final AP to move that operativo within 4" of this operativo, this can cause your opponent to have spent more AP than its APL stat - this is permitted in this situation.
Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is within 6" of this operativo, you can ignore any changes to that operativo's stats from being injured (including its weapons' stats).

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, PERSECUTOR

abilities.description: If this operativo is incapacitado during the Combatir action, you can strike the operativo enemigo in that sequence with one of your unresolved successes before this operativo is removed from the zona de combate.

The first time this operativo performs the Combatir action during each of its activations, if neither it nor the operativo enemigo in that sequence is incapacitado, this operativo can immediately perform a free Combatir action afterwards, but you cannot select any other operativo enemigo to Combatir against during that action (and only if it's still valid to Combatir against).
This takes precedence over action restrictions.

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is activated within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting
from the SERMON until the end of that activación (i.e. even if it then moves more than the distance requirement from the ORATOR operativo).  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, MIRACULIST

abilities.description:
The first time this operativo would be incapacitado during the battle, it's not incapacitado, has 1 wound remaining and cannot be incapacitado for the remainder of the action.
All remaining dados de ataque are discarded (including yours if this operativo is fighting or retaliating), then this operativo can immediately perform a free Carrera or Retirada action (for the latter, it cannot move more than 3"), even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing those actions.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo. If a friendly CONFESSOR operativo hasn't been incapacitado, you must select it.
Until you use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT again during the battle, that operativo has the ORATOR keyword.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON.

from the SERMON until the end of that activación (i.e. even if it then moves more than the distance requirement from the ORATOR operativo).  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, MISSIONARY

abilities.description: If this operativo has a holy relic, it's always benefitting from the SERMON

Until you use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT again during the battle, that operativo has the ORATOR keyword.

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo is more than 6" from other operativos amigos, its weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, RELIQUANT

abilities.description:
Whenever determining control of a marker within 4" of this operativo, treat the total APL stat of friendly SANCTIFIER operativos that contest it as 1 higher if at least one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo contests that marker.
Note this isn't a change to the APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a ready friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is incapacitado while visible to and within 6" of this operativo, you can use this rule. If you do, before that operativo is removed from the zona de combate, it can perform one free action (excluding Combatir), and you can change its order to do so. It's then removed from the zona de combate as normal.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo. If a friendly CONFESSOR operativo hasn't been incapacitado, you must select it.
Until you use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT again during the battle, that operativo has the ORATOR keyword.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is activated within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting
from the SERMON until the end of that activación (i.e. even if it then moves more than the distance requirement from the ORATOR operativo).  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

opTypes.keywords: SANCTIFIER, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS MINISTORUM, SALVATIONIST

abilities.description: Whenever Un operativo more than 6" from this operativo is shooting a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo within 6" of this operativo, improve that operativo amigo's Save stat by 1.

STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo. If a friendly CONFESSOR operativo hasn't been incapacitado, you must select it.
Until you use this STRATEGIC GAMBIT again during the battle, that operativo has the ORATOR keyword.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON.  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is activated within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR), that friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting
from the SERMON until the end of that activación (i.e. even if it then moves more than the distance requirement from the ORATOR operativo).  

Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is benefitting from the SERMON, Normal and Critical Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.

Select one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo within this operativo's alcance de control to regain up to 2D3 lost wounds.   
This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

ploys.description: Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo that's benefitting from the SERMON is fighting or retaliating, its melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

Each friendly SANCTIFIER operativo (excluding ORATOR) that's benefitting from the SERMON can immediately perform a free Carrera or Retirada action in an order of your choice (choose separately for each and, for the latter, it cannot move more than 3").
Each that does so must end that move closer and visible to (or vice versa) a friendly ORATOR operativo. You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo that's benefitting from the SERMON, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa results of one result (e.g. results of 2).
Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is fighting during an activación in which it performed the Carga action, its melee weapons have the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy after rolling your dados de ataque for a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo, if it's shooting against or fighting against an operativo enemigo that's within 3" of a friendly ORATOR operativo (or 6" if the ORATOR is a CONFESSOR).
You can re-roll any of your dados de ataque.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo that has a weapon with the Blaze weapon rule is incapacitado, before it's removed from the zona de combate.
Each operativo enemigo visible to and within 2" of it gains one of your Blaze tokens (if it doesn't already have one).
Use this firefight ploy when an dados de ataque inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo. Ignore that inflicted damage.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly SANCTIFIER ORATOR or SANCTIFIER MIRACULIST operativo is selected as the valid target of a Disparar action or to Combatir against during the Combatir action.
Select one other friendly SANCTIFIER operativo (excluding CONFESSOR, MIRACULIST and ORATOR) visible to and within 3" of that first operativo amigo to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate)
instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this).
If it's the Combatir action, treat that other operativo as being within the fighting operativo's alcance de control for the duration of that action.
If it's the Disparar action, that other operativo is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  

This ploy has no effect if it's the Disparar action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

equipments.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, one friendly SANCTIFIER operativo (excluding CHERUB, DEATH CULT ASSASSIN and MIRACULIST) can perform the following unique action:  

**SANCTIFICATION ORB (1AP):**

- Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. That operativo and each other operativo enemigo within 1" of it takes a doused test.
For Un operativo to take a doused test, roll one D6: on a 3+, it gains one of your Doused tokens.
- Whenever a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is shooting against Un operativo that has one of your Doused tokens with a weapon that has the Blaze weapon rule, that weapon also has the Seek weapon rule.
- After a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo uses a weapon that has the Blaze weapon rule against an operativo enemigo that has one of your Doused tokens, remove that token (even if the Seek weapon rule wasn't used).  

- This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo is shooting or fighting, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a éxito normal instead.

In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, roll 3D6: if the result is less than the remaining wounds of a friendly ORATOR operativo, you gain 1CP.
Note that this is done before the Gambit step, so if there isn't a valid ORATOR operativo, you cannot use this rule during that punto de inflexión (e.g. during the first punto de inflexión).

Once per punto de inflexión, when Un operativo is shooting a friendly SANCTIFIER operativo that's benefitting from the SERMON, when you collect your dados de defensa, you can use this rule.
If you do, change one of the attacker's retained éxitos críticos to a éxito normal (any weapon rules they've already resolved aren't affected, e.g. Piercing Crits).

description:
Scouts are the new recruits of a Marine Espacial chapter who have advanced far enough in the early stages of their training and biological transformation to take part in battle with the rest of the Chapter.
  
  

More lightly armed and armoured than full Battle brothers, their role is to range ahead of the main Marine Espacial force, preparing the way for the main advance by infiltrating enemy lines, sabotaging and gathering intelligence - causing as much chaos and disruption as possible.
composition:
A SCOUT SQUAD killteam is composed of:

- 1 SCOUT SQUAD Sergeant operativo with one of the following options:
  - Astartes shotgun, fists
  - Boltgun, fists
  - Bolt Pistol, Chainsword
- 8 SCOUT SQUAD operativos selected from the following list:
  - Heavy Gunner with Fists, Bolt Pistol and Heavy Bolter
  - Heavy Gunner with Fists, Bolt Pistol and Missile Launcher
  - Hunter
  - Sniper
  - Tracker
  - Warrior with one of the following options:
    - Astartes Shotgun, fists
    - Boltgun, Fists
    - Bolt Pistol, Combat Blade

Other than Warrior operativos, your Killteam can only include each operativo once.

opTypes.keywords: SCOUT SQUAD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, LEADER, SERGEANT

abilities.description:
During this operativo's activación, it can perform either 2 Disparar actions or 2 Combatir actions.
If it is 2 Disparar actions, an Astartes Shotgun, Bolt Pistol, or Boltgun must be selected for at least one of them.
This operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.

At the end of the Set Up operativos step, you can select and resolve up to six Forward Scouting options.
Each option has a number in brackets which is the maximum number of times you can select and resolve it for the battle.
For example, your five selections could be Reposicionar (2), Trip Alarm (1), Booby Trap (1) and Diversion (1).
If both players have this rule, alternate resolving selection by selection, starting with the player that has initiative.  
  

**BOOBY TRAP (1):**  

Place one of your Booby Trap markers more than 6" from your opponent's drop zone and more than 2" from other markers, access points, and Accessible terrain.
The first time your Booby Trap marker is within an operativo enemigo's alcance de control, remove that marker and inflict 2D3 damage on that operativo.
If it is not incapacitado, end its action (if any), even if that action's effects are not fulfilled.
If it cannot be placed, move it the minimum amount to do so.  
  

**DESIGNATE TARGET (1):**  

Select one operativo enemigo to gain one of your Target tokens.
Whenever a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo is shooting against, fighting against, or retaliating against an operativo enemigo that has one of your Target tokens, you can re-roll once of your dados de ataque.  
  

**DEVISE PLAN (1):**  

You gain 1CP.  



**DIVERSION (1):**  

Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one operativo enemigo within 6" of a zona de combate edge.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación, subtract 1 from its APL stat.  
  

**REDEPLOY (1):**  

Change the set up of one third of your operativos (Rounding up).  
  

**Reposicionar (2):**  

Perform a free Reposicionar action with one operativo amigo that is wholly within your drop zone.
It must end that move wholly within 3" of your drop zone.  
  

**SPY (1):**  

APPROVED OPS ONLY. Your opponent must reveal their selected tac op.  
  

**TRIP ALARM (2):**  

Place one of your Trip Alarm markers more than 6" from your opponent's drop zone.
During the first and second punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly Scout Squad operativo is shooting an enemy that is within 2" of that marker, its range weapons have the Seek Weapon rule.
In the ready step of the third Strategy phase, remove that marker.  
  

**TACTICAL MANOEUVRE (1):**  

Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. Select one operativo amigo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.

Once during each of this operativo's activations, you can select one other friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo visible to it.
Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.

opTypes.keywords: SCOUT SQUAD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, HEAVY GUNNER
SCOUT SQUAD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, HUNTER

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo performs the Carga action during its activación, if it climbs, drops, jumps, or its base moves underneath Vantage terrain during that action, its melee weapons have the Lethal 3+ weapon rule until the end of that activación.
Whenever this operativo is climbing up, you can treat the vertical distance as 2" (regardless of how far the operativo moves vertically).

opTypes.keywords: SCOUT SQUAD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, SNIPER

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo:

- Ignore the Saturate weapon rule.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead. This is not cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from vantage terrain.

Until the start of this operativo's next activación, whenever it is shooting, operativos enemigos cannot be obscured.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: SCOUT SQUAD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, TRACKER

abilities.description:
Until the start of this operativo's next activación or until it is incapacitado (whichever comes first),
whenever a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo within 8" of this operativo,
that operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.
If that operativo amigo is a SNIPER that is currently benefitting from the effects of its Optics action, its ranged weapons also have the Seek Light weapon rule.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Select one expended operativo enemigo within 8" of this operativo. Until the end of the punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo is shooting that operativo enemigo, its ranged weapons have the Seek Light rule.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: SCOUT SQUAD, IMPERIUM, ADEPTUS ASTARTES, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
You can do one of each of the following once per punto de inflexión.

- One friendly SCOUT SQUAD WARRIOR can perform the Smoke Grenade action.
- One friendly SCOUT SQUAD WARRIOR can perform the Stun Grenade action.

The rules for these actions are found in universal equipment. Performing these actions using this rule does not count towards their action limits (i.e, if you select those grenades from equipment).

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it was not visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación:

- Its weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
- If the target is expended, its  weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule instead.
  
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.
You can change the order of up to D3 friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativos that are more than 6" from operativos enemigos to Engage.

Whenever an operativo enemigo is shooting a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo, if that operativo amigo is in cover and more than 6" from operativos enemigos it is visible to, you can re- roll one of your dados de defensa.

Up to D3 friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativos that have a Conceal order and are more than 6" from operativos enemigos can immediately perform a free Carrera action. You cannot use this ploy during the first punto de inflexión.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo's activación.
Until the end of that activación, that operativo can either perform 2 Combatir actions, or 2 Disparar actions if an Astartes Shotgun, Bolt Pistol, or Boltgun is selected for at least one of them.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo's activación. Until the start of its next activación, while that operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2".

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo performs the Combatir or Disparar action. If it is the first operativo amigo to perform either of those actions during this punto de inflexión, or if the operativo enemigo in that action (Primary target, if relevant) has a higher Wounds stat than that friendly Scout Squad operativo, you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead.

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo's activación.
Until the start of its next activación, you can ignore any changes to that operativo's stats from being injured (including its weapons' stats).

equipments.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo (excluding SNIPER), if you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save.  
 This is not cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from vantage terrain.

Friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativos have the following melee weapon. Note that some operativos already have this weapon but with better stats; in that instance, use the better version.

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|Combat Blade|3|3+|4/5|

Whenever a friendly SCOUT SQUAD HEAVY GUNNER operativo is shooting with a heavy bolter or missile launcher, if it has not moved during the activación, or if it is a contrataque, that weapon has the Ceaseless rule; if the weapon already has that weapon rule it has the Relentless weapon rule. Note that operativo is not restricted from moving after shooting.<hr/>
**Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)  

**Relentless:** Can re-roll any or all dados de ataque

Up to twice per punto de inflexión, when a friendly SCOUT SQUAD operativo is performing the Disparar action and you are selecting a valid target, you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, its ranged weapons have the Lethal 5+ and Saturate weapon rules.<hr/> **Saturate:** The defender cannot retain salvaciones de cobertura.

description:
"It doesn't matter who or what the enemy are. If they stand between us and following our orders, they'll die for it."  

*--Tempestus Aquilon Therka Drayv, prior to the Ossinium Drop*
composition:
A TEMPESTUS AQUILON KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 TEMPESTUS AQUILON TEMPESTOR operativo with one of the following options:
  - Hot-Shot Laspistol; Power Weapon
  - Relic Bolt Pistol; Chainsword
  - Hot-Shot Lascarbine; Fists
- 1 SERVO-SENTRY with one of the following options:
  - Flamer
  - Grenade Launcher
  - Hot-Shot Volley Gun
- 9 TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativos selected from the following list:
  - GRENADIER
  - GUNFIGHTER
  - GUNNER with Melta Carbine and Fists
  - GUNNER with Plasma Carbine and Fists
  - MARKSMAN
  - PRECURSOR
  - TROOPER

Other than TROOPER operativos, your killteam can only include each operativo above once.

opTypes.keywords: TEMPESTUS AQUILON, IMPERIUM, LEADER, TEMPESTOR

abilities.description:
When setting up a TEMPESTUS AQUILON kill team before the battle, the first third of your kill team must be set up as normal.
Each third thereafter can be set up above: place them to one side instead of in the zona de combate.
For each third that is set up above, you must set up the whole third in this way (not some of them), then place your Drop markers wholly within your drop zone.
  

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first and second punto de inflexión, you can move your Drop markers up to 4", measuring the horizontal distance only. In close quarters, this can be measured and moved through walls.
  

During the Firefight Phase, friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativos set up above are activated as normal.
When you do, you can either expend or land that operativo. If it lands, set it up in the zona de combate in a location it can be placed as follows (it is no longer set up above):

- Within 3" of one of your Drop markers, measuring the horizontal distance only, or wholly within your drop zone.
- Not dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo (unless you're setting up a PRECURSOR operativo, which can be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo)
- With no part of its base underneath Vantage terrain
- With an order of your choice

The operativo is treated as performing the Reposicionar action (spent the AP accordingly), then continue its activación as normal. It is Obscured until the end of the next activación or the end of the punto de inflexión (whichever comes first).  

Less than half of your operativos can be set up above by the end of the first punto de inflexión. In other words, by the end of the first punto de inflexión, more than half of your operativos must have been set up in the zona de combate during the battle.  

When readying your operativos during the second and third Turning Points, remove one of your Drop markers. This means operativos still set up above are incapacitado at the end of the second punto de inflexión.
Whenever a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo is dropping, ignore the vertical distance.

Once per battle, you can either use a Firefight Ploy for 0 CP if this is the specific TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo, or the Command Re-Roll Firefight Ploy for 0 CP if this is the operativo the attack or defence die was rolled for.

**Support:** Select one friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo (excluding SERVO-SENTRY) Visible To and within 6" of this operativo. Until the end of that operativo's next activación, add 1 to its APL stat.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: TEMPESTUS AQUILON, IMPERIUM, GRENADIER

- Within 3" of one of your Drop markers, measuring the horizontal distance only, or wholly within your drop zone.
- Not dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo (unless you're setting up a PRECURSOR operativo, which can be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo)
- With no part of its base underneath Vantage terrain
- With an order of your choice

When readying your operativos during the second and third Turning Points, remove one of your Drop markers. This means operativos still set up above are incapacitado at the end of the second punto de inflexión.
Whenever a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo is dropping, ignore the vertical distance.

This operativo can use Frag, Krak, Smoke, and Stun Grenades (see universal equipment). Doing so does not count towards any limited uses you have (i.e. if you also select those grenades from equipment for other operativos). Whenever this operativo is using a Frag or Krak Grenade, improve the HIT stat of that weapon by 1.

When readying your operativos during the second and third Turning Points, remove one of your Drop markers. This means operativos still set up above are incapacitado at the end of the second punto de inflexión.
Whenever a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo is dropping, ignore the vertical distance.

Whenever an operativo enemigo within 8" of this operativo shoots this operativo, keep track of each Attack die that is discarded as a fail.
After the action, before incapacitado operativos are removed (including this one, if relevant), this operativo can perform a free Disparar action (change its order to Engage to do so), but it can only target that operativo enemigo with its Hot-Shot Laspistols (Focused), and you only roll a number of dados de ataque equal to the opponent's discarded dados de ataque plus one (to a maximum of four).

When setting up a TEMPESTUS AQUILON kill team before the battle, the first third of your kill team must be set up as normal.
Each third thereafter can be set up above: place them to one side instead of in the zona de combate.
For each third that is set up above, you must set up the whole third in this way (not some of them), then place your Drop markers wholly within your drop zone.
  

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first and second punto de inflexión, you can move your Drop markers up to 4", measuring the horizontal distance only. In close quarters, this can be measured and moved through walls.

- Not dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo (unless you're setting up a PRECURSOR operativo, which can be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo)
- With no part of its base underneath Vantage terrain
- With an order of your choice

Whenever a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo is dropping, ignore the vertical distance.
Whenever this operativo is fighting, after resolving your first Attack die, you can immediately resolve another (before your opponent).
