STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first Strategy Phase. Each friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON TROOPER operativo wholly within your drop zone can immediately perform a free Reposicionar action, but must finish that action wholly within 3" of your drop zone.
When this operativo lands, you can set it up within 4" of one of your Drop markers (measuring horizontal distance only), taking precedence over the normal distance requirement.

ploys.description: Select one marker.  - Until the Ready step of the next punto de inflexión, when determining control of that marker, treat the total APL stat of friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativos that contest it as 1 higher, as long as at least one friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo actually contests it. - Whenever a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo is within 3" of that marker, add 1 to the Atk stat of its Melee weapons (to a maximum of 4).

Select one operativo enemigo. That operativo and all other operativos enemigos within 3" of it gain one of your Detected tokens until the end of the punto de inflexión.
Whenever an operativo enemigo with a Detected token:

- Is shooting a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
- Is fighting or retaliating against a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo, one of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).

Whenever a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo is shooting against or fighting against a ready operativo enemigo, its weapons have the Severe weapon rule.  
**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.

Count the number of friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativos that are not incapacitado, then halve the result (rounding up) to give you x.
Until the end of their activación, friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativos' weapons have the Balanced weapon rule if they are the first operativos amigos activated this punto de inflexión equal to x.
For example if you have five operativos, the first three activated will benefit.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Use this Firefight Ploy when a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo lands. You can set it up within 5" of one of your Drop markers (measuring horizontal distance only), taking precedence over the normal distance requirement.
It cannot perform the Carrera, Combatir, or Disparar actions during this punto de inflexión.

Use this Firefight Ploy after rolling dados de ataque for a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo that is wholly within your opponent's territory, or either landed or dropped from Vantage terrain at least 2" higher than the zona de combate floor during this activación. If the target is within 6" of it, you can re-roll any of your dados de ataque.

Use this Firefight Ploy when a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo (excluding SERVO-SENTRY) is activated.
It regains 2D3 lost Wounds, and during that activación you can ignore any changes to its APL stat.

Use this Firefight Ploy during a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo's activación (excluding SERVO-SENTRY and any operativo with an APL stat greater than 2).
During that activación, it can perform the Recoger Marcador, Colocar Marcador, or a mission action for 1 less AP.

equipments.description:
Friendly Tempestus Aquilon operativos (excluding SERVO-SENTRY) have the following Melee weapon:

|**Name**|**ATK**|**HIT**|**DMG**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Tempestus Dagger|3|4+|3/4|
You can ignore any changes to the Move stat of friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativos from being injured.

Once during the battle, when a friendly TEMPESTUS AQUILON operativo that is set up above is activated, before expending or landing that operativo, you can move one of your Drop markers again. However, it cannot be moved closer to your opponent's drop zone.
Once during the battle, when rolling off to decide initiative, you can re-roll your D6.

description: The Lieutenant Titus Mission Pack is a spin-off of Warhammer 40,000: kill team. Its parent game includes an expanded range of detailed miniatures, evocative terrain and unique rules. Combatir tactical battles against opponents with your team of elite operativos, all set within the grim darkness of the far future.
composition:
One of each of the Space Marines.

1 Tyranid Warrior and 6 NPOs containing any combination of Hormagaunts and Termagants. Set them up within 3" of objective marker 1, with intervening terrain within their alcance de control when viewed from the player drop zone.

abilities.description:
Player operativos within 6" of this operativo regain up to D3+3 lost wounds (roll separately for each), then remove all Mortal Wound tokens from those operativos.  
 This operativo cannot perform this action more than once per battle.

Inflict D3+3 damage on each operativo enemigo within 3" of this operativo (roll separately for each).  
This operativo cannot perform this action more than once per battle.

Until the end of this operativo's next activación, whenever a player operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, add 1 to the Critical Dmg stat of its weapons, and its successes equal to or greater than 5 are éxitos críticos.  
This operativo cannot perform this action more than once per battle.

1. Combatir.  

2. Carga the closest player operativo via the shortest possible route.  

3. Reposicionar towards the closest player operativo via the shortest possible route.  

4. Carrera towards the closest player operativo via the shortest possible route.

1. Retirada. If possible, to a location where there's a valid target.  

2. Reposicionar towards the closest player operativo, to cover if possible. Additionally, to a location where there's a valid target if possible.  

3. Disparar.  

4. Carrera towards the closest player operativo, to cover if possible.  

5. Combatir

1. Combatir  

2. Carga the closest player operativo via the shortest possible route.  

3. Disparar the closest player operativo.  

4. Reposicionar towards the closest player operativo.  

5. Carrera towards the closest player operativo.
Whenever this operativo is incapacitado, before it is removed from the zona de combate, inflict D3 damage on each Hormagaunt and Termagant within 3" of it (roll separately for each).
Whenever a Hormagaunt or Termagant NPO is shooting or fighting within 3" of this operativo, retain one dados de ataque as a éxito normal for that operativo without rolling it.

1. Combatir.  

2. Carga the closest player operativo via the shortest possible route.  

3. Reposicionar towards the closest player operativo, to cover if possible (a subsequent Carrera action can fulfil this, if able).  

4. Carrera towards the closest player operativo, to cover if possible.

After this operativo performs the Combatir action, it immediately performs a free Retirada action, to cover if possible. Whenever this operativo is in cover from a player operativo, it is not visible to that player operativo.

description:
"So swift and so deadly are the Mal'Kor, it is as though they fury of the D'Yangi moon tempests had swept the enemy away. I almost pity those who stand against them"  

*--Shas'o Vior'la Shem*
composition:
A VESPID STINGWINGS killteam is composed of:

- 1 VESPID STINGWING STRAIN LEADER operativo
- 1 VESPID STINGWING OVERSIGHT DRONE operativo
- 9 VESPID STINGWING operativos selected from the following list:
  - LONGSTING
  - SHADESTRAIN
  - SKYBLAST
  - SWARMGUARD
  - WARRIOR

Other than WARRIOR operativos, your killteam can only include each operativo above once.

opTypes.keywords: VESPID STINGWING, T'AU EMPIRE, STRAIN, LEADER

abilities.description: Neutron weapons are any weapons that have the word "Neutron" in their name. Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo moves or uses FLY, its Neutron weapons have the Piercing 1 weapon rule until the end of the punto de inflexión.
Once during each of this operativo's activations, you can spend one Communion Point for free.

When selecting your operativos for the battle, also select one VESPID STINGWING Strategy Ploy. Whenever this operativo is in the zona de combate and not dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, that Ploy costs you 0CP.

Communion points are used to maintain the tactical focus of friendly VESPID STINGWING operativos.
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you gain 1D3 Communion points, plus 1 if a friendly OVERSIGHT DRONE operativo is in the zona de combate.
Communion points are used as follows (OVERSIGHT DRONE operativos are unaffected by the following):

- Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING ooperative is performing the Disparar action, it can only target the closest operativo enemigo within 8" of it (excluding operativos enemigos dentro del alcance de control of other friendly VESPID STINGWING operativos) unless you spend 1 of your Communion points. For weapons with the Blast and Torrent weapon rules, only the first target must be selected in this way.
- Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo performs the Carga action, it must finish the action dentro del alcance de control of the closest operativo enemigo unless you spend 1 of your Communion points.
- Whenever you would perform the Recoger Marcador or a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch) with a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo, you must also spend one of your Communion points to do so.
- Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo is shooting, you can spend one (and only one) of your Communion points to re-roll one Attack Die.

Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo performs an action in which it moves, it can FLY.
If it does so, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat (or 3" if it was a Carrera) of its original location, measuring horizontal distance only.
Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Carga action.  

It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it was the Carga action, it cannot be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
In a zona de combate that uses the Close Quarters rules (e.g. zona de combate Gallowdark), you cannot measure the distance over or through wall terrain, and that operativo cannot be set up on the other side of an access point (in other words, it cannot FLY through an open hatchway).

- This operativo cannot perform any action other than Aerial Guidance, Carga, Carrera, Retirada, Combatir, or Reposicionar. - Whenever determining control of objective markers, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 lower. - Whenever determining what is Visible To this operativo, the round disc at the top of the miniature is its head. - Whenever this operativo has a Conceal order and is in Cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2". - Whenever Un operativo is shooting this operativo, ignore the Piercing weapon rule.

**SUPPORT:** Until the start of this operativo's next activación, whenever another friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo within 6" of this operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo Visible To this operativo, that operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Lethal 5+ and Saturate weapon rules. This has no effect while this operativo is dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

- Whenever you would perform the Recoger Marcador or a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch) with a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo, you must also spend one of your Communion points to do so.
- Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo is shooting, you can spend one (and only one) of your Communion points to re-roll one Attack Die.

Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo performs an action in which it moves, it can FLY.
If it does so, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat (or 3" if it was a Carrera) of its original location, measuring horizontal distance only.
Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Carga action.  

It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it was the Carga action, it cannot be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
In a zona de combate that uses the Close Quarters rules (e.g. zona de combate Gallowdark), you cannot measure the distance over or through wall terrain, and that operativo cannot be set up on the other side of an access point (in other words, it cannot FLY through an open hatchway).

While this operativo has a Conceal order, your opponent cannot select it as a valid target unless it is within 6" of the operativo trying to target it. Note that this rule has no effect if this operativo is not selected as the valid target, e.g. if it is a secondary target from the Blast weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: VESPID STINGWING, T'AU EMPIRE, SKYBLAST

abilities.description: Neutron weapons are any weapons that have the word "Neutron" in their name. Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo moves or uses FLY, its Neutron weapons have the Piercing 1 weapon rule until the end of the punto de inflexión.

Communion points are used to maintain the tactical focus of friendly VESPID STINGWING operativos.
In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, you gain 1D3 Communion points, plus 1 if a friendly OVERSIGHT DRONE operativo is in the zona de combate.
Communion points are used as follows (OVERSIGHT DRONE operativos are unaffected by the following):

- Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING ooperative is performing the Disparar action, it can only target the closest operativo enemigo within 8" of it (excluding operativos enemigos dentro del alcance de control of other friendly VESPID STINGWING operativos) unless you spend 1 of your Communion points. For weapons with the Blast and Torrent weapon rules, only the first target must be selected in this way.
- Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo performs the Carga action, it must finish the action dentro del alcance de control of the closest operativo enemigo unless you spend 1 of your Communion points.
- Whenever you would perform the Recoger Marcador or a mission action (excluding Operate Hatch) with a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo, you must also spend one of your Communion points to do so.
- Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo is shooting, you can spend one (and only one) of your Communion points to re-roll one Attack Die.

Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo performs an action in which it moves, it can FLY.
If it does so, do not move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat (or 3" if it was a Carrera) of its original location, measuring horizontal distance only.
Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Carga action.  

It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it was the Carga action, it cannot be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
In a zona de combate that uses the Close Quarters rules (e.g. zona de combate Gallowdark), you cannot measure the distance over or through wall terrain, and that operativo cannot be set up on the other side of an access point (in other words, it cannot FLY through an open hatchway).
Once during each operativo enemigo's activación, as soon as it is within 2" of one of your Neutron Fallout markers, inflict 1D3 damage on it (multiple markers are not cumulative).

opTypes.keywords: VESPID STINGWING, T'AU EMPIRE, SWARMGUARD

Perform a free Reposicionar action with this operativo. During that action, it must FLY and can move an additional 2". Then perform a free Disparar action. You can only select a flamer (skytorch) for that Disparar action.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while it has a Conceal order, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo

opTypes.keywords: VESPID STINGWING, T'AU EMPIRE, WARRIOR

Whenever this operativo is shooting, if you do not spend Communion points during that sequence, its Neutron Blaster has the Accurate 1 weapon rule until the end of that sequence.

ploys.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo while counteracting, or during an activación in which that shooting operativo moved or was setup, roll 1D6 whenever a normal sucess would inflict damage.
On a 5+, ignore that inflicted damage. A maximum of one Attack Die can be ignored per shooting sequence.

Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo moves or uses FLY, its weapons have the Balanced weapon rule until the end of that activación.  
**Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.
Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo (excluding OVERSIGHT DRONE) is fighting or retaliating, Normal Damage of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on it.
Improve the Hit stat of friendly VESPID STINGWING operativos' claws by 1, and those weapons have the Lethal 5+ and Shock weapon rules.
Use this Firefight Ploy when a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo (excluding OVERSIGHT DRONE) is fighting and strikes with a éxito crítico. Inflict D3 additional damage.

Use this Firefight Ploy when a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo performs the Disparar action during an activación in which it has used FLY. Until the end of that action, it gains all benefits from the first and second main features of Vantage terrain. When determining the height difference between operativos for Vantage terrain rules, treat that operativo amigo as being 3" higher than it currently is (but not when determining the distance for Communion).

Use this Firefight Ploy when you resolve a éxito crítico for a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo that is shooting with a Neutron weapon during an activación in which it has moved or used FLY. If the target is within 4" of it, inflict D3 additional damage.

Use this Firefight Ploy when a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo performs the Reposicionar action. Until the end of that action, it can move an additional D3", or be set up an additional D3" away if it uses FLY. In either case, it cannot perform Combatir or Disparar actions for the rest of the punto de inflexión.

equipments.description: In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, when determining how many Communion points to gain, you can roll two D3 and select one D3 to use.
Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo (excluding OVERSIGHT DRONE) is fighting, its melee weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

Whenever a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo (excluding OVERSIGHT DRONE) performs the Carga or Carrera action, it can move an additional 1". If it uses FLY for this action, you can set it back up 1" further away.
Once per punto de inflexión, a friendly VESPID STINGWING operativo can perform the Recoger Marcador or a mission action without spending a Communion point.

description: Even amongst the agile Aeldari, the Harlequins of the Void-dancer Troupes display an almost preternatural level of dexterity and skill. Performance and war merge in their actions, precisely directed to shape the fate of their race.
composition:
A VOID-DANCER TROUPE killteam is composed of:

- 1 VOID-DANCER TROUPE LEAD PLAYER operativo with one option from each of the following:
  - Fusion pistol, neuro disruptor or shuriken pistol
  - Blade, caress, embrace, kiss or power weapon
- 7 VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativos selected from the following list:
  - DEATH JESTER
  - PLAYER with one option from each of the following:
    - Fusion pistol, neuro disruptor or shuriken pistol
    - Blade, caress, embrace or kiss    
  - SHADOWSEER with hallucinogen grenade and one of the following options:
    - Neuro disruptor; miststave
    - Shuriken pistol; miststave

Other than PLAYER operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to one fusion pistol and up to one neuro disruptor.

opTypes.keywords: VOID-DANCER TROUPE, AELDARI, HARLEQUINS, LEADER, LEAD PLAYER

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo, and no dados de ataque are retained as éxitos críticos, worsen the x of the Piercing weapon rule by 1 (if any). Note that Piercing 1 would therefore be ignored.  
 Whenever a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo is climbing up, you can treat the vertical distance as 2" (regardless of how far the operativo actually moves vertically).  
 Friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativos can move dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos (they must still start and end the move following all requirements for that move).

Once per battle STRATEGIC GAMBIT. If this operativo is in the zona de combate, change the ALLEGORY you selected for your kill team. Note that the ACCOLADE rule operativos amigos have will also change.

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first punto de inflexión, you must select an ALLEGORY (Epic or Melodrama below) for your kill team for the battle, and one friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo to have the PIVOTAL ROLE for the battle.
Whenever a operativo amigo has the PIVOTAL ROLE, it has the ACCOLADE rule of your ALLEGORY for the battle.  

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in each subsequent punto de inflexión, you can select one friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo to gain the ACCOLADE rule of your ALLEGORY for the battle.  

Once per punto de inflexión, when a operativo amigo that has the PIVOTAL ROLE completes the performance of your ALLEGORY, you can select a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo to gain the ACCOLADE rule of your ALLEGORY for the battle.  

**Epic**  

- Performance:  
The operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo while fighting.
- Accolade:  
Whenever this operativo is fighting, its melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.

**Melodrama**  

- Performance:  
The operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo while shooting.
- Accolade:  
The operativo's ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.

**Epic**  

- Performance:

- Accolade:  
Whenever this operativo is fighting, its melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.

**Melodrama**  

- Performance:  
The operativo incapacitates an operativo enemigo while shooting.
- Accolade:  
The operativo's ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.

**PSYCHIC** Select one ready operativo enemigo visible to this operativo and roll one D6.
Until the end of the punto de inflexión, that operativo enemigo cannot be activated or perform actions until it is the last operativo enemigo to be activated,
or until your opponent has activated a number of operativos enemigos after this action equal to the result of the D6 (whichever comes first).  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

**PSYCHIC** Select one operativo enemigo that's a valid target for and within 8" of this operativo. Both players roll five D6. Pair your dice with your opponent's dice based on matching results. For each matching pair, inflict D3 damage on that operativo enemigo (to a maximum of 8). For example, if you rolled 6, 5, 5, 4, 2, 1 and your opponent rolled 6, 5, 4, 4, 3, 1, you would inflict 4D3 damage on that operativo enemigo.  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo is fighting or retaliating and your opponent strikes with a éxito normal, you can roll one D6:  

if the result is less than the Hit stat of your opponent's selected weapon, that strike is a block instead (ignore the Brutal weapon rule, if relevant) and you cannot use this rule for the rest of the sequence.

Whenever a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo performs the Reposicionar action during its activación, it can perform the Disparar action during that action
(it must do so in a location it can be placed, and any remaining move distance it had from that Reposicionar action can be used after it does so).
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo that performed an action in which it moved during this punto de inflexión, you can re-roll one of your dados de defensa.
Friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativos can perform the Carrera action during the same activación in which they performed the Carga action, but not vice versa (i.e. not Carrera then Carga).

Use this firefight ploy when Un operativo is shooting a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo, during the Resolve dados de defensa step.
You can allocate one of your rolled successful dice to block all of your opponent's dados de ataque with matching results (e.g. one of your successful dados de defensa results of 5 can be used to block all successful dados de ataque results of 5).

Use this firefight ploy during a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo's activación. Until the start of its next activación, while that operativo has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2".

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo is fighting during an activación in which it performed the Carga action, after you strike.
You can immediately resolve another of your éxitos normales as a strike (before your opponent), or a éxito crítico if there are none.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo is fighting, after you strike with a éxito crítico, if the enemyu operativo isn't incapacitado.
End that sequence (any remaining dados de ataque are discarded) and immediately perform a free Retirada action up to 3" with that operativo (then the Combatir action ends).
That operativo can do so even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing the Retirada action.

equipments.description: Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a éxito normal instead.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a shuriken pistol or shrieker cannon (focused), you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Devastating 1 weapon rule.

Keep a Tragedy tally. Whenever a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo that has an ACCOLADE rule is incapacitado, add 1 to your Tragedy tally. When your Tragedy tally reaches 3, you gain 1CP and stop that tally.

Once per battle, when you activate a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operativo, if the operativo amigo that has the PIVOTAL ROLE has been incapacitado, you can use this rule.
If you do, that activated operativo has the PIVOTAL ROLE for the battle.

description:
Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering
relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep
aside those who stand in their way.
composition:
A WARP COVEN KillTeam is composed of 5 WARPCOVEN operativos selected from the following list:

- SORCERER OF DESTIN *(1)*
- SORCERER OF TEMPYRION *(1)*
- SORCERER OF WARPFIRE *(1)*
- RUBRIC MARINE GUNNER with one of the following options:
  - Warpflamer; fists
  - Soulreaper cannon *(2)*; fists
- RUBRIC MARINE ICON BEARER
- RUBRIC MARINE WARRIOR
- TZAANGOR CHAMPION *(3)* with one of the following options:
  - Greataxe
  - Greatblade
- TZAANGOR HORN BEARER *(3)*
- TZAANGOR ICON BEARER *(3)*
- TZAANGOR WARRIOR *(3)* with one of the following options:
- Tzaangor blades
  - Tzaangor blade & shield
  - Autopistol; chainsword

**(1):** With force stave, PSYCHIC weapons on their datacard and one of the following options:
- Inferno bolt pistol
- Prosperine khopesh
- Warpflame pistol

**(2):** Your kill team can only include up to one warpflame pistol and up to one soulreaper cannon.  

**(3):** These operativos count as half a selection each.  

You must select at least one friendly SORCERER operativo.

Other than WARRIOR and GUNNER operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.

opTypes.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, PSYKER, SORCERER, DESTINY

abilities.description:
During each friendly WARPCOVEN HERETIC ASTARTES operativo's activación, it can perform either two Disparar actions or two Combatir actions.
If it's two Disparar actions and a soulreaper cannon or a warpflamer is selected for both, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action.
You cannot select the same PSYCHIC ranged weapon more than once per activación.
Each friendly WARPCOVEN HERETIC ASTARTES operativo can Contraatacar regardless of its order.
Whenever you select a SORCERER operativo for the battle, you must select a BOON OF TZEENTCH (below) for it to have for the battle. You cannot select each BOON OF TZEENTCH more than once per battle.

**PSYCHIC** Select one friendly WARPCOVEN operativo visible to this operativo. Until the start of this operativo's next activación,
until it is incapacitado or until this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first),
whenever Un operativo is shooting that selected operativo, you can re-roll any of your dados de defensa.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an
operativo enemigo.

**PSYCHIC** Select one operativo enemigo visible to and within 9" of this operativo.
Until the start of this operativo's next activación, until it is incapacitado or until this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first),
whenever that operativo enemigo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, your opponent must re-roll their dados de ataque results of 6, and whenever determining control of a marker,
treat that operativo enemigo's APL stat as 1 lower. Note this is not a change to its APL stat, so
any changes are cumulative with this.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

options.description:
You must select at least one friendly SORCERER operativo, and one of your selected SORCERER operativos must have the LEADER keyword for the battle.
Add 1 to that LEADER operativo's Wounds stat for the battle.

This operativo's ranged weapons have
the Saturate weapon rule. Whenever
this operativo is shooting, enemy
operativos cannot be obscured.
Add 1" to this operativo's Move stat.
Once per battle, when you Contraatacar with this operativo, you can change its order, and it can perform an additional 1AP action for free during that contrataque, but both actions must be different.
Add 1 to the Normal Dmg stat of this operativo's melee weapons.

Once per punto de inflexión, when this operativo is performing the Carga or Reposicionar action during its activación, it can FLY.

abilities.description:

Whenever you select a SORCERER operativo for the battle, you must select a BOON OF TZEENTCH (below) for it to have for the battle. You cannot select each BOON OF TZEENTCH more than once per battle.

**PSYCHIC** Select one friendly WARPCOVEN operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo. That operativo regains up to 2D3 lost wounds.  
 This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a operativo amigo has already performed this action during this punto de inflexión.

**PSYCHIC** Select one friendly WARPCOVEN operativo visible to and within 6" of this operativo and place your Temporal Flux marker within that operativo's alcance de control.  

At the end of that operativo's next activación, if it hasn't been incapacitado and is still wholly within 6" of your Temporal Flux marker, remove that operativo from the zona de combate and set it back up in a
location it can be placed;
when it is set back up, it must have your Temporal Flux marker within its alcance de control (or as close as possible).
Then remove your Temporal Flux marker from the zona de combate. If that operativo is not wholly within 6" of your Temporal Flux marker (including if it's incapacitado), remove that marker from the zona de combate.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if your
Temporal Flux marker is currently in the zona de combate.

If you select Firestorm or Mindburn (SORCERER OF WARPFIRE), whenever that operativo performs the Disparar action, select the Seek Light or Devastating 1 weapon rule for that weapon to have until the end of the action (it cannot have both).

Select one of this operativo's PSYCHIC ranged weapons. That weapon has the Devastating 1 weapon rule. If you select a doombolt, it has the 2" Devastating 2 weapon rule instead of Devastating 2.  
If you select Firestorm or Mindburn (SORCERER OF WARPFIRE), whenever that operativo performs the Disparar action, select the Seek Light or Devastating 1 weapon rule for that weapon to have until the end of the action (it cannot have both).

Add 3" to the distance requirements of this operativo's PSYCHIC actions that have a distance requirement.   
Note that for the SORCERER OF TEMPYRION's Temporal Flux action, this boon only affects the distance in the first effect of that rule.

opTypes.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, TZAANGOR, WARRIOR

abilities.description: Once per battle, one friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR WARRIOR can perform the Recoger Marcador, Colocar Marcador or a mission action for 1 less AP if that operativo amigo is within your opponent's territory.
This operativo has a 4+ Save stat, and whenever it's fighting or retaliating with this weapon, each of your blocks can be allocated to block two unresolved successes (instead of one).

options.description:
This operativo's ranged weapons have
the Saturate weapon rule. Whenever
this operativo is shooting, enemy
operativos cannot be obscured.
Add 1" to this operativo's Move stat.
Once per battle, when you Contraatacar with this operativo, you can change its order, and it can perform an additional 1AP action for free during that contrataque, but both actions must be different.
Add 1 to the Normal Dmg stat of this operativo's melee weapons.

Once per punto de inflexión, when this operativo is performing the Carga or Reposicionar action during its activación, it can FLY.
If it does, don't move it. Instead, remove it from the zona de combate and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat of its original location, measuring the horizontal distance only.
In a zona de combate that uses the close quarters rules (e.g. zona de combate: Gallowdark), this distance cannot be measured over or through Wall terrain, and that operativo cannot be set up on the other side of an access point
(in other words, it cannot FLY through an open hatchway).  

Note that it gains no additional distance when performing the Carga action. It must be set up in a location it can be placed, and unless it's the Carga action, it cannot be set up dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
This operativo's PSYCHIC ranged weapons have the Piercing Crits 1 weapon rule.

Having an operativo enemigo within this operativo's alcance de control does not prevent it from performing the Recoger Marcador or mission actions.  

Once per activación, this operativo can perform the Recoger Marcador, Colocar Marcador or a mission action for 1 less AP.

Select one of this operativo's PSYCHIC ranged weapons. That weapon has the Devastating 1 weapon rule. If you select a doombolt, it has the 2" Devastating 2 weapon rule instead of Devastating 2.  
If you select Firestorm or Mindburn (SORCERER OF WARPFIRE), whenever that operativo performs the Disparar action, select the Seek Light or Devastating 1 weapon rule for that weapon to have until the end of the action (it cannot have both).

Select one of this operativo's PSYCHIC ranged weapons. That weapon has the Devastating 1 weapon rule. If you select a doombolt, it has the 2" Devastating 2 weapon rule instead of Devastating 2.  
If you select Firestorm or Mindburn (SORCERER OF WARPFIRE), whenever that operativo performs the Disparar action, select the Seek Light or Devastating 1 weapon rule for that weapon to have until the end of the action (it cannot have both).

Add 3" to the distance requirements of this operativo's PSYCHIC actions that have a distance requirement.   
Note that for the SORCERER OF TEMPYRION's Temporal Flux action, this boon only affects the distance in the first effect of that rule.

ploys.description: Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly WARPCOVEN operativo, weapons with the Piercing 1 weapon rule have the Piercing Crits 1 weapon rule instead.

Friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativos' PSYCHIC weapons have the Balanced weapon rule if another friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativo is within 9" of that operativo.   **Ceaseless:** Can re-roll any or all results of one value (e.g. all results of 2)   **Balanced:** Can re-roll one Attack die.

Roll 2D6 and reserve them (put them to one side). In the following Firefight phase, whenever Un operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, after you or your opponent roll their dados de ataque, but before re-rolls, you can use one of your reserved dice to replace one of the D6 rolled for that sequence (yours or your opponent's); that replacement die cannot be re-rolled or retained as a success or éxito crítico if it is not, and is discarded at the end of that sequence. Then, if the combined result of both reserved dice was less than 9, discard the other die. You cannot use more than one reserved dice per sequence. Discard any remaining reserved dice at the end of the punto de inflexión.

Friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR operativos' melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.
Whenever a friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR operativo is assisted by a friendly WARPCOVEN operativo, or is fighting while visible to and within 6" of a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativo,
that friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR operativo's melee weapons also have the Severe weapon rule.  
**Severe:** If you do not retain any éxitos críticos, you can change one of your éxitos normales to a éxito crítico. Any rules that take effect as a result of retaining a éxito crítico (e.g. Devastating, Piercing Crits, etc.) still do.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.
Use this firefight ploy when an attack die inflicts Normal Dmg on a friendly WARPCOVEN RUBRIC MARINE operativo. That attack die inflicts 1 damage instead.

Use this firefight ploy at the end of a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativo's activación. That operativo amigo can immediately perform a free Carrera action (even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing the Carrera action), or you can change its order instead.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR operativo is activated. Select one other ready friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR operativo visible to and within 2" of it to activate at the same time.
Complete their activations action by action in any order.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativo is activated. Select one other friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativo visible to and within 9" of that operativo, then select one of that other operativo amigo's PSYCHIC unique actions or PSYCHIC ranged weapons for that first operativo amigo to have until the end of its activación.  
You cannot select a PSYCHIC ranged weapon that has been used by that other operativo amigo during this punto de inflexión, and that other operativo amigo cannot use the selected weapon during this punto de inflexión.

equipments.description: Friendly WARPCOVEN operativos' inferno boltguns, inferno bolt pistols and autopistols have the Devastating 1 weapon rule.

Add 1 to the Atk stat of friendly WARPCOVEN RUBRIC MARINE operativos' melee weapons. Whenever a friendly WARPCOVEN RUBRIC MARINE operativo is retaliating, its melee weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.

Once per battle, when a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativo is activated or counteracts, you can select a different BOON OF TZEENTCH for it to have until the end of the battle (it loses any it previously had). It cannot be the same BOON OF TZEENTCH any other operativo amigo has. Note that if you use this rule when a operativo amigo counteracts and you select Echoes from the Warp, it can be used immediately to change the operativo's order and perform a free action during that contrataque.

Whenever an dados de ataque would inflict Critical Dmg on a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativo, you can choose for that dados de ataque to inflict Normal Dmg instead.
You cannot use this rule for each friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operativo more than once per punto de inflexión.

description: Wrecka Crews are infamous Ork kill team Units, that love to commit explosive combat during their murderous rampages. They are considered the best of their species and are larger and stronger than the typical Ork. Wrecka Crews also make use of weapons that create explosions and the thought of this empowers them to become Tanked Up and ready to Combatir. These attributes and their use of 'eavy Armour, makes the Wrecka Crews incredibly durable and deadly in battle.
composition:
A WRECKA KREW KillTeam is composed of:

- 1 WRECKA KREW BOSS NOB operativo with one of the following options:
  - Rokkit Pistol; Smash Hammer
  - Two Rokkit Pistols; Choppa
- 2 WRECKA KREW BOMB SQUIG operativos
- 5 WRECKA KREW operativos selected from the following list:
  - BREAKA BOY DEMOLISHA
  - BREAKA BOY FIGHTER
  - BREAKA BOY KRUSHA
  - TANKBUSTA GUNNER with one of the following options:
    - 'Eavy Rokkit Launcha; Fists
    - Rokkit Launcha; Fists    
  - TANKBUSTA ROKKITEER with one of the following options:
    - Rokkit Launcha; Pusla Rokkit; Fists
    - Rokkit Launcha; Rokkit Rack; Fists

Other than BOMB SQUIG, BREAKA BOY FIGHTER, and TANKBUSTA GUNNER operativos, your KillTeam can only include each operativo above once.

opTypes.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, LEADER, BOSS NOB

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo performs a Combatir or Disparar action (excluding Vigilancia), you gain 1 Wrecka point.

Whenever a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo is shooting, fighting, or retaliating, in the Roll dados de ataque step:

- For each attack die result of 6 you retain, you gain one Wrecka point
- You can spend up to 3 of your Wrecka points (unless it's a BOMB SQUIG). For each point you spend this way, retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it

You can gain and spend Wrecka points during the same action and can do so in an order of your choice, unless you started the action with 6, in which case you can only spend them.
If you start an action with 6 Wrecka points, you cannot gain any more during that action.

Select up to two valid targets. Disparar this weapon against both primary targets in an order of your choice, then against all remaining secondary targets in the same manner (roll each sequence separately).
Each target (primary or secondary) cannot be shot more than once during the action.

The first time a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) that has an Engage order performs either the Carga, Disparar or Combatir action (excluding Vigilancia) during each of its activations/counteractions, add 1 to its APL stat until the start of its next activación.

opTypes.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, BREAKA BOY, FIGHTER

Select a terrain feature within this operativo's alcance de control.
If it is Equipment terrain, remove it. Otherwise, place one of your Breach markers within this operativo's alcance de control as close as possible to that terrain.
Whenever Un operativo is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible terrain.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo, or if a terrain feature is not within its alcance de control.

opTypes.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, BREAKA BOY, DEMOLISHA

abilities.description: The first time this operativo would inflict damage on an operativo enemigo with this weapon profile during the battle, separately inflict 1D6+6 damage on that operativo and each other operativo within that operativo enemigo's alcance de control if it is a éxito normal, or 2D6+6 damage if it is a éxito crítico. Then the action ends and you gain 1 Wrecka point, plus 1 for each operativo that was incapacitado during that action. Damage from this weapon rule cannot be ignored or reduced.

- You can spend up to 3 of your Wrecka points (unless it's a BOMB SQUIG). For each point you spend this way, retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it

Normal Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on this operativo; if this operativo has an Engage order, Critical Dmg or 4 or more also inflicts 1 less damage on this operativo.

The first time a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) that has an Engage order performs either the Carga, Disparar or Combatir action (excluding Vigilancia) during each of its activations/counteractions, add 1 to its APL stat until the start of its next activación.

- You can spend up to 3 of your Wrecka points (unless it's a BOMB SQUIG). For each point you spend this way, retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it

Determine this when you select a valid target, but you can include any secondary targets when doing so (e.g. from the Blast weapon rule).

- For each attack die result of 6 you retain, you gain one Wrecka point
- You can spend up to 3 of your Wrecka points (unless it's a BOMB SQUIG). For each point you spend this way, retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it

- For each attack die result of 6 you retain, you gain one Wrecka point
- You can spend up to 3 of your Wrecka points (unless it's a BOMB SQUIG). For each point you spend this way, retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it

You can gain and spend Wrecka points during the same action and can do so in an order of your choice, unless you started the action with 6, in which case you can only spend them.
If you start an action with 6 Wrecka points, you cannot gain any more during that action.

Whenever Un operativo is withing x" of your Pulsa marker, worsen the Hit stat of its weapons by 1 and subtract 2" from its Move stat.
This is cumulative with being injured.
X is that marker's Pulsa points. In the Ready step of each Strategy phase, subtract 1 from your Pulsa marker's points.
If a Pulsa marker ever has 0 points, remove it.

The first time a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) that has an Engage order performs either the Carga, Disparar or Combatir action (excluding Vigilancia) during each of its activations/counteractions, add 1 to its APL stat until the start of its next activación.

opTypes.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, BOMB SQUIG

abilities.description:
Whenever this operativo is incapacitado during a battle in which it has not used its Explosives, roll 1D6, or 2D6 if you wish.
If any result is a 4+, this operativo performs a free Disparar action with its Explosives before it is removed from the zona de combate.

This operativo can perform the Disparar action with this weapon while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.
Do not select a valid target. Instead, this operativo is always the primary target and cannot be in Cover or Obscured.

This operativo is ignored for your opponent's kill/elimination op (when it is incapacitado, and when determining your starting number of operativos). It is also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require operativos to "escape", "survive", or be incapacitado by operativos enemigos (if it escapes/survives/is incapacitado, determining how many operativos must escape/survive/be incapacitado, etc.).

Whenever a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo is shooting, fighting, or retaliating, in the Roll dados de ataque step:

- For each attack die result of 6 you retain, you gain one Wrecka point
- You can spend up to 3 of your Wrecka points (unless it's a BOMB SQUIG). For each point you spend this way, retain one of your fails as a éxito normal instead of discarding it

You can gain and spend Wrecka points during the same action and can do so in an order of your choice, unless you started the action with 6, in which case you can only spend them.
If you start an action with 6 Wrecka points, you cannot gain any more during that action.

During the Firefight phase, whenever you determine this operativo's order, you cannot select Conceal.
This operativo cannot perform any actions other than Carga, Carrera, Combatir, Reposicionar, and Disparar, or use any weapons that are not on its datacard.

The first time a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) that has an Engage order performs either the Carga, Disparar or Combatir action (excluding Vigilancia) during each of its activations/counteractions, add 1 to its APL stat until the start of its next activación.

ploys.description: Each friendly WRECKA KREW operativo that has an Engage order can immediately reagin 1D3+1 lost Wounds (roll separately for each).
Friendly WRECKA KREW operativos' ranged weapons have the Saturate weapon rule.
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo that has an Engage order, you can re-roll one of your Defense dice.
Friendly WRECKA KREW operativos' melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.

Use this Firefight ploy after a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo performs the Combatir or Disparar action; just before incapacitado operativos are removed (if any).
Place one of your Demolition markers within the target's alcance de control (if it is using a Blast weapon, the primary target).
Whenever a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) is shooting against, fighting against, or retaliating against Un operativo that is within 3" of that marker,
you can spend a Wrecka Point for free (even if you have none).
In the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, remove that marker.

Use this Firefight ploy when an attack die inflicts Normal dmg on a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG).
Ignore that inflicted damage.

Use this Firefight ploy when a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo performs the Disparar action and a weapon with the Blast weapon rule is selected.
Until the end of that action, add 1" to that weapons' Blast and it has the Severe weapon rule when shooting the primary target.
You cannot use this ploy and the Drill Rokkit rule (see equipment) during the same action.
Note that Sever does not generate a Wrecka point (as it is not a 6).

Use this Firefight ploy during a friendly WRECKA KREW BREAKA BOY or WRECKA KREW BOSS NOB operativo's activación.
During that activación, that operativo can perform two Combatir actions.

equipments.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo is performing the Disparar action and you select a Rokkit Launcha or 'Eavy Rokkit Launcha, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon loses the Blast weapon rule but has the Piercing 1 weapon rule.

Subtract 1" from the Move stat of friendly WRECKA KREW operativos improve their Save stat by 1. This excludes BOMB SQUIG operativos and isn't cumulative with the Protective rule of a Portable Barricade from universal equipment.

Once per punto de inflexión, whenever a friendly WRECKA KREW operativo (excluding BOMB SQUIG) is activated, you can use this rule.
If you do, until the end of that activación, you can ignore any changes to that operativo's stats from being injured (including its weapons' stats).

When this item of equipment is selected, also select the Waaagh! or Destruction strategy ploy.
The first time you would use that ploy during the battle, it costs 0CP; whenever you would use it thereafter, it costs 0CP if you have any Wrecka points.

description: Genestealer Cults are insidious broods of Human-xenos hybrids that spread unnoticed on Imperial worlds, sometimes for generations. They infiltrate the Imperium's social, industrial and military fabric, and their elite Wyrmblade kill teams squirm undetected into perfect ambush sites.
composition:
A WYRMBLADE killteam is composed of:

- 1 WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE LEADER operativo with one of the following options:  
  - Autogun; gun butt
  - Shotgun; gun butt  
  Or one option from each of the following:
  - Bolt pistol, master-crafted autopistol or web pistol
  - Chainsword, power maul or power pick
- 13 WYRMBLADE operativos selected from the following list: 
  - KELERMORPH*
  - LOCUS*
  - GUNNER with flamer and gun butt
  - GUNNER with grenade launcher and gun butt
  - GUNNER with webber and gun butt
  - HEAVY GUNNER with heavy stubber and gun butt
  - HEAVY GUNNER with mining laser and gun butt
  - HEAVY GUNNER with seismic cannon and gun butt
  - ICON BEARER with one of the following options:
      - Autogun; gun butt
      - Shotgun; gun butt
  - SANCTUS SNIPER*
  - SANCTUS TALON*
  - WARRIOR with one of the following options:
      - Autogun; gun butt
      - Shotgun; gun butt

*These operativos count as two selections each.  
Other than WARRIOR operativos, your kill team can only include each operativo on this list once.  

Your kill team can only include up to two GUNNER operativos, up to two HEAVY GUNNER operativos and up to two CULT AGENT operativos.

opTypes.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, NEOPHYTE, LEADER

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it wasn't visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

When setting up a WYRMBLADE kill team before the battle, one third of your kill team can be set up in HIDING: place them to one side instead of in the zona de combate.
CULT AGENT operativos cannot be set up in HIDING.  

In the Firefight phase, friendly WYRMBLADE operativos set up in HIDING are activated as normal.
When you do, you can either expend that operativo or have it emerge. If it emerges, set it up in the zona de combate in a location it can be placed as follows (it's no longer set up in HIDING):

- Wholly within 6" of your drop zone.
- More than 6" from operativos enemigos.
- With an order of your choice.

The operativo is treated as performing the Reposicionar action (spend the AP accordingly), then continue its activación as normal. If the operativo is a WARRIOR, ignore its Group activación rule.
operativos amigos still in HIDING at the end of the second punto de inflexión are incapacitado.
Once per punto de inflexión, you can use the Slink Into Darkness or Coiled Serpent firefight ploy for 0CP if the specified friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is a NEOPHYTE visible to this operativo.

opTypes.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, CULT AGENT, KELERMORPH

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly WYRMBLADE CULT AGENT operativo:

- Ignore the Piercing and Saturate weapon rules.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead. This isn't cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it wasn't visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.
This operativo can perform two Disparar actions during its activación.

Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operativo visible to and within 3" of this operativo is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if this operativo has incapacitado an operativo enemigo during this punto de inflexión, that operativo amigo's weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

opTypes.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, CULT AGENT, SANCTUS, LOCUS

abilities.description: Whenever this operativo is fighting or retaliating, you can resolve one of your successes before the normal order. If you do, that success must be used to block.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly WYRMBLADE CULT AGENT operativo:

- Ignore the Piercing and Saturate weapon rules.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead. This isn't cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it wasn't visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

This operativo can perform two Combatir actions during its activación. Whenever this operativo ends the Combatir action, if it's no longer dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos, it can immediately perform a free Carga action (even if it's already performed the Carga action during that activación), but it cannot move more than 3" during that action.
Doing so doesn't prevent it from performing the Carrera action afterwards during that activación.

Once per punto de inflexión, after an operativo enemigo performs an action in which it moves or is set up, you can interrupt that activación/contrataque to use this rule.
If you do, this operativo can immediately perform a free Carga action (you can change its order to do so), but it cannot move more than 3", and it must end that move dentro del alcance de control of that operativo enemigo.
If this isn't possible, the interruption is cancelled and this rule hasn't been used.

opTypes.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, NEOPHYTE, GUNNER

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it wasn't visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

When setting up a WYRMBLADE kill team before the battle, one third of your kill team can be set up in HIDING: place them to one side instead of in the zona de combate.
CULT AGENT operativos cannot be set up in HIDING.  

In the Firefight phase, friendly WYRMBLADE operativos set up in HIDING are activated as normal.
When you do, you can either expend that operativo or have it emerge. If it emerges, set it up in the zona de combate in a location it can be placed as follows (it's no longer set up in HIDING):

- Wholly within 6" of your drop zone.
- More than 6" from operativos enemigos.
- With an order of your choice.

The operativo is treated as performing the Reposicionar action (spend the AP accordingly), then continue its activación as normal. If the operativo is a WARRIOR, ignore its Group activación rule.
operativos amigos still in HIDING at the end of the second punto de inflexión are incapacitado.

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it wasn't visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

When setting up a WYRMBLADE kill team before the battle, one third of your kill team can be set up in HIDING: place them to one side instead of in the zona de combate.
CULT AGENT operativos cannot be set up in HIDING.  

In the Firefight phase, friendly WYRMBLADE operativos set up in HIDING are activated as normal.
When you do, you can either expend that operativo or have it emerge. If it emerges, set it up in the zona de combate in a location it can be placed as follows (it's no longer set up in HIDING):

- Wholly within 6" of your drop zone.
- More than 6" from operativos enemigos.
- With an order of your choice.

The operativo is treated as performing the Reposicionar action (spend the AP accordingly), then continue its activación as normal. If the operativo is a WARRIOR, ignore its Group activación rule.
operativos amigos still in HIDING at the end of the second punto de inflexión are incapacitado.

Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operativo's APL stat as 1 higher.
Note this is not a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

Once per punto de inflexión, when a ready friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operativo is incapacitado while visible to and within 6" of this operativo, you can use this rule.
If you do, before that operativo is removed from the zona de combate, it can either perform one free Disparar action (you can change its order to do so), or you can use the A Plan Generations in the Making firefight ploy for 0CP if that incapacitado
operativo is the specified friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operativo.  

It is then removed from the zona de combate as normal.

opTypes.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, CULT AGENT, SANCTUS, SNIPER

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly WYRMBLADE CULT AGENT operativo:

- Ignore the Piercing and Saturate weapon rules.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead. This isn't cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it wasn't visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of the battle, or until this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first),
that operativo enemigo gains one of your Soulsight tokens. Whenever this operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo that has one of your Soulsight tokens,
all profiles of this operativo's Sanctus sniper rifle have the Saturate weapon rule and that operativo enemigo cannot be obscured.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Until the end of this operativo's activación, the stationary profile of its Sanctus sniper rifle has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, CULT AGENT, SANCTUS, TALON

abilities.description:
Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly WYRMBLADE CULT AGENT operativo:

- Ignore the Piercing and Saturate weapon rules.
- If you can retain any salvaciones de cobertura, you can retain one additional cover save, or you can retain one cover save as a éxito crítico instead. This isn't cumulative with improved salvaciones de cobertura from Vantage terrain.

Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it wasn't visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

This operativo can perform the Carga action while it has a Conceal order. Whenever this operativo performs the Combatir action, it can immediately perform a free Carrera or Retirada action afterwards
(for the latter, it cannot move more than 3"), even if it's performed an action that prevents it from performing those actions.

Select one operativo enemigo this operativo isn't visible to.
Perform a free Carga action with this operativo, but do not exceed its Move stat (i.e. do not add 2"), and it must end that move dentro del alcance de control of that operativo enemigo.
Then immediately perform a free Combatir action with this operativo against that operativo enemigo. The first time you strike during that action, you can immediately resolve another of your successes as a strike (before your opponent).  

This operativo cannot perform this action while it has an Engage order, or while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

Select one operativo enemigo visible to this operativo. Until the end of the battle, or until this action is performed again by a operativo amigo (whichever comes first),
that operativo enemigo gains one of your Soulsight tokens. Whenever this operativo is shooting an operativo enemigo that has one of your Soulsight tokens,
its Sanctus bio-dagger has the Brutal and Balanced weapon rules.  

This operativo cannot perform this action while dentro del alcance de control of an operativo enemigo.

opTypes.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, NEOPHYTE, WARRIOR

abilities.description:
Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting during its activación, if its order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación, or it wasn't visible to operativos enemigos at the start of that activación,
that operativo amigo's weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule.

When setting up a WYRMBLADE kill team before the battle, one third of your kill team can be set up in HIDING: place them to one side instead of in the zona de combate.
CULT AGENT operativos cannot be set up in HIDING.  

In the Firefight phase, friendly WYRMBLADE operativos set up in HIDING are activated as normal.
When you do, you can either expend that operativo or have it emerge. If it emerges, set it up in the zona de combate in a location it can be placed as follows (it's no longer set up in HIDING):

- Wholly within 6" of your drop zone.
- More than 6" from operativos enemigos.
- With an order of your choice.

The operativo is treated as performing the Reposicionar action (spend the AP accordingly), then continue its activación as normal. If the operativo is a WARRIOR, ignore its Group activación rule.
operativos amigos still in HIDING at the end of the second punto de inflexión are incapacitado.

Whenever this operativo is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly WYRMBLADE WARRIOR operativo (if able) before your opponent activates.
When that other operativo is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operativos in succession with this rule).

ploys.description:
Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is activated, if its order is changed from Conceal to Engage, until the end of that activación:

- Its ranged weapons have the Rending weapon rule.
- Add 1 to the Atk stat of its melee weapons (to a maximum of 5).
  
**Rending:** If you retain any critical hits, retain 1 normal hit as a critical hit instead.

Whenever Un operativo is shooting a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo that has a Conceal order, if Light terrain is intervening, that operativo amigo is obscured (unless the intervening Light terrain is within 1" of either operativo).

Up to three friendly WYRMBLADE operativos can immediately perform a free Carrera or Carga action in an order of your choice (choose separately for each, and for the latter, it cannot move more than 3").
If a WYRMBLADE CULT AGENT operativo is selected for this ploy, it counts as two operativos, and it can perform a free Retirada action instead (it cannot move more than 3"); if it does, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of its next activación.

Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting Un operativo that another friendly WYRMBLADE operativo has already shot during this punto de inflexión, that first operativo amigo's ranged weapons have the Accurate 1 weapon rule.  
**Accurate 1:** You can retain 1 Attack Die as a éxito normal without rolling it.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly WYRMBLADE CULT AGENT or WYRMBLADE LEADER operativo is selected as the valid target of a Disparar action or to Combatir against during the Combatir action. Select one other friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operativo (excluding LEADER) visible to and within 3" of that first operativo amigo to become the valid target or to be fought against (as appropriate) instead (even if it wouldn't normally be valid for this). If it's the Combatir action, treat that other operativo as being within the fighting operativo's alcance de control for the duration of that action. If it is the Disparar action, that other operativo is only in cover or obscured if the original target was.  
 This ploy has no effect if it's the Disparar action and the ranged weapon has the Blast or Torrent weapon rule.

Use this firefight ploy at the end of a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo's activación. If that operativo has an Engage order, change it to Conceal. You cannot use this ploy for each operativo amigo more than once per battle.

Use this firefight ploy when a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting or fighting, after rolling your dados de ataque.
If that operativo amigo's order was changed from Conceal to Engage at the start of that activación and this is the first time it has performed either the Disparar or Combatir action during that activación,
you can retain one of your éxitos normales as a éxito crítico instead. Note this ploy cannot come into effect more than once per activación (you cannot use it during both the Disparar and Combatir action in the same activación).

ploys.ployName: A Plan Generations In The Making
ploys.description: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operativo is incapacitado. It can perform a free mission action before it's removed from the zona de combate.

equipments.description:
Once per punto de inflexión, a friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operativo can use the following ranged weapon:
 
|**Name**|**Atk**|**Hit**|**Dmg**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Blasting Carga|4|4+|3/5|
|**Weapon Rules**|
|Range 4", Blast 1", Saturate|

Friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operativos have the following melee weapon:
 
|**Name**|**Atk**|**Hit**|**Dmg**|
|-----|:-----:|:-----:|:-----:|
|Cult Knife|3|4+|3/4|

This equipment allows you to select two mines (see universal equipment).
You cannot also select that equipment as normal (i.e. to give you three), and friendly WYRMBLADE operativos are ignored for your mines' effects (i.e. they cannot trigger or take damage from them).
This takes precedence over the normal mines rules.

Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE operativo is shooting, the target cannot be obscured if it is visible to and within 6" of a friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operativo that is not dentro del alcance de control of operativos enemigos.
